1b1(1): // ba po dgu b.ru go gcig du// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nang 'ja
1b2(1): byang chub sems dpa'i gzung snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa'i rgyan de nyid la rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems
1b3(1): dpa'i skad kyi tshul rgya mtsho de nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul phra mo la 'jug pa de nyid
1b4(1): rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems rnam par dag pa de nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang
1b5(1): chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags bsdu zhing bslab pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub semaso
2a1(1): dpa'i yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgo nyid rnam par snang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems
2a2(1): dpa' rnams kyi sems can bsdu ba'i ye shes de nyid shin tu byang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i
2a3(1): bsam pa'i stobs rnam par dag par bya ba de nyid brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i/ 
2a4(1): spobs de nyid nye bar brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ngos po'i rgyud de nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang / byang chub
2a5(1): sems dpa'i sems de nyid gdod mi za bar dge ba bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yid ma chen po de nyid mthar phyin par
2a6(1): byed cing / tshong dpan gyi bu der baphangs yi dpal brtan ning srer lam gyi sems kyis yongs su slo ba med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyar dang
2b1(1): lda pa phyir mi ldog pas rnam par gnod pa'i brtson 'grus can/ yid kyis brtul ba las mi bzlog pa/ dad pa mi 'phrogs
2b2(1): pi'i stozas dang ldan pa rdo rje mthu bo ches mi byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshis gnyen thams cad kyi gdam ngag 'thun par len
2b3(1): pa/ shes rab kha me bab pa'i yul drang ldan pa/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul
2b4(1): thogs pa med pa/ kun tu blta ba'i ye shes kyi tshul snang ba dang ldan pa/ sa'i gzugs kun nas sdang ba rab tu thob pa chos kyi dbyings
2b5(1): gzhi'i bye brag la mngon sum du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhi kun la rten pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dmigs pa// 
2b6(1): bdag gi med pa dang / gnyis su p+pa'i spyod yul le rab tu brtson pa/ 'du shes thams cad las bda' bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi sgo rnam
2b7(1): par dag pa/ chos kyi phyogs dang goni thad da pa'i phyogs las sor rtog pa med pa 'jig rten gyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las bya'i mi ldog pa
3a1(1): chos kyi gzhid dbugs kyi bye brag las byir mi ldog pa// sangs rgyas kyi phyogs dang gzhi tha dad pa mthong ba dang / rnam par rig par bya ba la gnol ba/ 
3a2(1): dus kyi phyogs dang / gzhi' bye brag khong du chud pa'i ye shes can chos kyi 'khor lo yod du 'ong bas yang dag par bsgrub pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ ye shes kun nas snang ba
3a3(1): ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par snang pos sems gsal bar byas pa/ yid kyi lus yul kun dang ldan pa'i sa la zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang bas rgyud
3a4(1): shin tu snang bar byas pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dpa'i rba rlabs kyi shugs kyis rab tu rlob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i shugs dang bral ba med pa
3a5(1): de bzhini gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin tu rlabs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi sems kyi rgyud du khong du chud pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/ 'jig
3a6(1): rten gyi khams kyi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i smon lam dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang gi lus su yang dag par bsdu ba dang / mdo
3a7(1): par bsgrub pa la brtson pa de mthar gyis seng ste/ le bcu gnyis kyis yul nags chel na gnas par phyin nas/ des tshong dben btang brjod de brdul brtsal pa/ 
3a8(1): po// mthing nas gang lus thams cad pab ste phyag pachal nas/ mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces sbas so// 'phags pa bdag dge ba'i bshes
3b1(1): dang / mngal bar gyur pani/ bdag gis thob par bgyi ba legs par thab pa// rdo chub slad du zhe na/ dge ba pa shes gnyen rnams ni mthong bar dkapa'/ 'byung bar
3b2(1): dkab bo// 'jal bar dka po/ bsnyen bkur bgyid par dka gro mnyes par bgyi bar dwa kA b+h+yo/ 'grogs par dkA bI/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni rjes su 'brang
3b3(1): bar dka' ba lags na/ de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa de ring bdag gis thob par gyur to// 'phags pa bdag gis 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams
3b4(1): cad bsnyen bkur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la rim zer bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyin la blta ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs par
3b5(1): ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon
3b6(1): lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ye shes snang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang lus su mngon pa
3b7(1): bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ rang gi spyad par mngon par bsdub par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam 'phrul pa
3b8(1): sum du rtogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang / mi bsnyengs pa yongs dag par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa mnyam pas/ 
4a1(1): mi ngoms par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa mnyan cing blang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yang dag
4a2(1): par gzang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa rnam par dbye bar bgro ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub
4a3(1): sems dpa' thams cad dang tshul gcig tu 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bskal ba mnyam par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
4a4(1): cad kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
4a5(1): sngon lam mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi mdzod rab tu thob par bgyi ba dang / 
4a6(1): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos kyi gter dang / mdzod mi zad pa'i ye shes snang ba 'thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
4a7(1): gter dang / mdzod khong du chud par bkri ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzod chad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dngapa 'a thams cad
4a8(1): snying rje chen pa 'i gter dang me dzad sems can 'dul ba'i mthar phyin par bkri ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par baphrul 'i gter dang / 
4b1(1): rnamapa rang rigs par ba ba dang / byang chub sems thams cad kyi dbadzag ga ter dang / mdzad rang gi sems kyi dbang dru rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dang 'thams
4b2(1): cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gter dang / mdzod dang / rnam pa thams cad du brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 
4b3(1): 'phags pa de lta bu'i sems kyi bdag 'dir mchis so// bsam pa de lta bu dang / yid la ston pa de lta bu dang / mngon par dga' ba de lta bu dang / sems pa de lta bu dang / 
4b4(1): gdon mi 'tshal bar bslab par bsams pa de lta bu dang / spyod yul mngon gsum du bgyi ba de lta bu dang / tshul khong du chud par bgyi ba la mos pa de lta bu dang / rnam par
4b5(1): dag pa la gzhol ba de lta bu dang / rnam par dpyad pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang / rab tu gzhol ba'i sems de lta bu dang / dge ba'i sbyor ba de lta bu dang / mngon tu gyur
4b6(1): pa'i dbang po de lta bus bdag 'dir mchis te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag dang / rjes su ston pa mdzad cing / tshul ni nye bar stong
4b7(1): mdzad/ rtogs parabami ba ni snang bar mdzad/ lam ni bstan pa mdzad/ mu stegs la ni 'jog pa mdzad/ chos kyi sgo rnam par 'byed par mdzad/ the tsom ni yongs su
4b8(1): gcod par mdzad/ nem nur ni sel bar mdzad/ yid gnyis kyi zug rngu ni 'byin par mdzad/ dogs pa'i dri ma ni sbyor bar mdzad/ sems kyi thigs pa na snang bar mdzad
5a1(1): sems patha yongs su sal bar mdzad/ sems pa rgyud de rab tu nga bar mang/ seMs kyi dam sun yongs su sel bar mdzad/ sems kyi bdu
5a2(1): ba yongs su sim par mdzad/ 'khor ba las ni sems rnam par bzlog par mdzad/ mi dge ba las ni phyir bzlog par mdzad/ sems can dmyal ba las ni ldog par
5a3(1): gnas dang ni bral bar ma dzang / mngon par zhen pa las ri med du bstod pa mdzad/ chags pa thams cad las ni yongs su 'brel ba mdzad/ thams su khyen pa nyid du ni bsgru
5a4(1): pa mdzad/ chos kyi grong khyer du 'jug par bgyi ba'i slad du ni mngon tu gyur par mdzad/ snying rje chen po la ni rab tu bsgrub pa mdzad/ byams pa la ni rab tu gsog pa mdza
5a5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ni rab tu sbyor nga mdzad/ ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo bsgom pa la ni 'dzud pa mdzad/ rtogs par 'gyur ba'i sgo la ni gnas par mdzad/ rang
5a6(1): bzhini nges par rdzogs dri mdzud/ sabs dang ldan pas ni khyab par mdzab 'gro ba thams cad mjam pa cing du sems rnam par dbyed mdzad ngo zhes thos na/ 'dags
5a7(1): ri lngar byang chub sems dpes byang chub sems dpe'i snang ba la btsun par brtse/ ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ ji ltar btsun par bgyis na byang chub sems dang snang chu
5a8(1): chang med dpag tu ma pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'gyur ba bdag la bsan drugasol/ de nas tshang dben patang brjid kyis de'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting na
5b1(1): byin pa sangs rgyas kyizhing thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba gzugs kyim blang mtha' yas pa sngon du 'phob la snyan gyi dadage pa'i shugs dang de bzhin gshegs pa
5b2(1): kyis brlabs dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang dag par bsams shing / ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrungs pas snyoms par zhugs so// tshong dpon btang
5b3(1): brjod de ltar snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gzugs kyi lus yongs su dag pa rnam pa 'di lta bur gnas par gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs
5b4(1): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang bcas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas/ bod rnams
5b5(1): par dag pa dang bcas/ sngon gyi spyod pa la zhugs pa dang bcas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas/ smon lam gyi tshogs dang bcas/ spyod pa dang 'byung
5b6(1): ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang bcas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba yongs su ston pa dang bcas/ sems can yongs su shin tu ston pa dang bcas/ sems
5b7(1): can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang bcas/ chos kyi mu'i mthar thug pa dang bcas par kun kyang lus kyi khongs su chud par snang ste/ de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dre
5b8(1): pa dang / phan tshun mchod pa dang / phan chun shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / phan run shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / tshul sna tshogs su zhugs pa dang / yang dag pa ji
6a1(1): lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ning rgyan sna tshogs can bangab ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs
6a2(1): kyi rgyun dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongs su spyod par snang ngo // theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod par mdzad pa dang / smon lam rgyas
6a3(1): sna tshogs yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams la rwa dga' ldan gyi pho brang du skyes shing sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad par snang ngo / la
6a4(1): dge' ldan gyi po byed nas 'phro ba dang / la la na ni yAm gyi spun bzhugs shing rnam par 'phrul pasna tshogs yongs su ston pa dang / la la na ni sreb dang / lal
6a5(1): byis pa'i rtsed ma sten pa dang / la lanan btsun mo'i 'khor mi ni ngan bzhugs pa dang / la lanan mngon par 'byung ba dang / la la rAni sing pe byang chub du
6a6(1): / rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyun chen pos bdud kyi sgrubam par mdzad pa dang / la lan nI lA dang / klu dang / rgan btsun dang / dri ngas yongs su bser cing
6a7(1): da'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor lo bsor bar gsale ba ga ba pa dang / lan d+hi rnaMs kyi Sh+Ta ra la dri phreng bar mdzad pa dang / lalanan sems can thams ca
6a8(1): rnam zugs pa dang / lal ni yongs su su ngan las 'da' ba da / 'dzi na gyi 'ams la yi de chen da gshegs kya nal 'das
6b1(1): rnams kyi rangs la ma bar dgang par srung du// sangs rgyas rgyanang la lan 'dang rnams bzhi ga gags pa mchud ngan la can gyis chung babyung pa
6b2(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can gyi ris rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten gyi rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems
6b3(1): lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi skye gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud rnam pa
6b4(1): tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems kyi mos pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad
6b5(1): pa dang / rgyas kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las kyi bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las mi mthun pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 
6b6(1): can gyi 'jig rten rnam par dbye ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshul lam dang spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang pal rnam par spyod pa dang / sems can rtsa
6b7(1): mchobasam pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po mi mthun pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bag chags sna tshogs bag la
6b8(1): nyal bar gyur pa'i sems can 'byam klas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su bstan pa dang / yul snga tshogs kyi
8a1(1): lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stobs thams cad kyi shugs dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
8a2(1): pa'i sangs rgyas sras kun tu rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
8a3(1): bar thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spros thams cad kyi bod dang ldan pan/ 
8a4(1): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzobs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab mar mo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa myed pa'i sems
8a5(1): la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu zhugs pa yang rig lam du snang ngo // byang brags kyi 'jig
8a6(1): rten gyi khams dad smyig rgyal mtshan na/ de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub
8a7(1): sems dang rdo rdo rje ga pas rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor kyi dkyil 'kha ra thams cad dang thabs gcob tu bzhugs
8a8(1): payang rig la ma dus pa/ bying shir gyi drugs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin patshathangs cad rab tu ba ma ldanan gshegs
8b1(1): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa'i spyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dmigs pa med pa
8b2(1): shin tu sprul pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang
8b3(1): ngo // shar lce'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer rab tu snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
8b4(1): rgyas sas kyi mar me zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi da byings kyi ga ne tha dad pa'i dngul gyi rgyal po lasogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
8b5(1): dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thobs cig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rjen gyi khams nyi ma'i 'od zer ltur
8b6(1): snang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba/ byang chub sems
8b7(1): dpa' me tog gi bod kun nas 'phro bar gtsug pud rab tu 'phyang ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhags pa
8b8(1): yang mig lam du snang ngo // nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba'i snying po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
9a1(1): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho chad med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dang 'a lus kyi 'od zer thogs pa med pa'i gzi brjid
9a2(1): rgyal po'i blo gros las sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa yang rig lam du snang ngo / 'og gi
9a3(1): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng ge snang zhing 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dazer chos kyi dbying
9a4(1): sna snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings 'od 'tsho nang rnam par snang byar 'byung ba'i blo zas la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
9a5(1): krol 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // seng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyi 'ong rnam par snang ban
9a6(1): btsun gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs srungs yon tan grags pa thags pa med pa rnar par thar pa'i bang kyi rgyal zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems
9a7(1): bas dang tsun 'azlas d+hagasupa med pa zas las skyeng byung chungs pas dra ba la phyir la la nga thams cad dang thabs cig tu btsugs pa yang po
9a8(1): so// gros kyi sa gagags pa 'di dag 'i tshigs pa rgyags bcu da pa'an gagags padag mi mang yang dge pa rjems sa
9b1(1): rgyas kyi ning bcu'i rdul shin tum bsed mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir mi byin/ kho ba yang der 'gro ba med de/ nam 'dod pa den bde
9b2(1): yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang snang ba mtha' yas bsgrags pa'ang mthong ngo // can da yong pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin
9b3(1): gshegs pa 'ong srung rdo rje gzugs pa yang mthong ngo // spos dri yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'ad snang rin chen bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo
9b4(1): padu ma yod pa'i 'jog rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen byung ma bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo dro// gser yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na da
9b5(1): bzhin gshegs pa med snang zhi ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskul ba bzhugs pa yang
9b6(1): ngo shin tu brtun pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi
9b7(1): khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zla ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // ri chen dpal gyi dad pas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa
9b8(1): rnam par sngang mdzad bcugs pa yang mang ngo // rigs kyi bu kho bos ni phyogs gang dang gang 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang ba
10a1(1): @mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ngo // dus gang dang gang du dmigs pa gang dang gang la sngoran gyi spyod pa
10a2(1): bad+ma dang bang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa gang dang gang gi don dang / sems can 'dul ba gang drang gang gi do du de
10a3(1): bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhid gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ste/ dbyezhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir gshegs pa ma yin
10a4(1): bdag kyang der phyin pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar khebs de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ga las kyang ston pa med par shes la/ rang gi lus kyang bar
10a5(1): dmed par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegasu pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang r+m+ma lim lta dur shes la/ rang gi sems mu bad+ma migs pa yang tshul
10a6(1): dang 'dra dar rgyu bar shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang ba jigs brnyad lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dman
10a7(1): bla mang rdzo sna bstsal ba lta dur shes pa dang / de bzhin pa shegs bya rnams rnam par dang rigs pa las snum ste byas pa'i gzugs la bur shes par
10a8(1): sems rnam par nga rigs pa yid snyam brer shes padan bldan gshegs pa'i gsungal na rje'i dag chal khring ba gas la/ 
10b1(1): gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang sgra brnyan lta bur shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs
10b2(1): las 'byung ngo // zhes bya bar rjes su rtogs shing khong du chud do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// 
10b3(1): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// sems can thams ljongs smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba ni yang rang gi sems kyi
10b4(1): b+hin+da gyi rlabs so// byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
10b5(1): kyi grong khyer du phyin par bya ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// rnam par thar pA bsam g+his mi khyab pas rnam par rtse ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin
10b6(1): kyi rlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sa du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// chos kyi dbyings kun nas 'dus
10b7(1): par khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung zhing / rnam par 'phrul pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// bskal pa thams cad shin tu phra bar bsdu ba'i ye shes
10b8(1): kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// zhes bya bar khong du chud cing rjes su rtogs so// rigs kyi bu de la kho bo 'di snyan du sems te// dge ba'i
11a1(1): d+ha brnams cad byi na gi sems nyid bar bdun bar byug// chos sbyin gyis rang gi sems nyid yongs su dran par bya// 
11a2(1): pA'i chos rnams lus ni ring gi sems cad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// brdzun 'grus kyis na rang gi sems cad brtan par bya'o// bzod pa yis ni rang gi sems
11a3(1): nyid maHma par bya'o// ye shes khong du chud par bye la ni radrug sems nyid gnil bar bya'o// shes rab kyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// 
11a4(1): dbyung rnams la ni rang gi sems nyid mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa nyid ldan rang gi sems nyid rgyas par bya'o// de drinon gshegs pa
11a5(1): skabs bcus gyi sems nyid sa par bya sar mi// rabs bu kha ba na de bzhin gshegs da'i rnam par thar pa thugasu pa med pa rgyun 'di gas
11a6(1): nga yongs su 'dzin par zad ni// khebs byang chub sems dpa' tshigs pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chags pa med pa rnam par skyed pa'i skad yul dang
11a7(1): ldan pa/ da ltar byed byi sang sa r+b+ba sa thams cad mngon gsum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thub pa/ mya ngan las 'deb pa mdopa'i mtha/ yi la sna
11a8(1): rdzogs pa'i bye chub kyi sgo ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur ba/ gni kun nas byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi tshul shes
11b1(1): pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du lus rnam par bkram pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul tha mi dpal rnam dz+nyA bar skyed pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par phyogs
11b2(1): pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ phyin phyogs med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba de dgra gi lus la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig cing 'dra
11b3(1): bar yang / de dag le bdag dang 'jig rten gyi khams su gnyis kyi 'du shes med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song
11b4(1): rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi 'dzam bu gling go mgo 'gebs par rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan zhes
11b5(1): bya ba bdug gis/ de'i gan du so la ji ltar byang chub dpyas byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ 
11b6(1): de nas tshing dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis chong dpon btang brjod kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon btang brjod la lar brgya stong du mar
11b7(1): g.yas su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te rdzing dpon btang brjod kyi yon tan grangs med pa la snyan par brjod de/ brtag pa dang / mos
11b8(1): par bya ba dang / mi gtang bar bya bar sems shing du ste/ sde sngags bton nas/ dge ba'o bshes gnyen sdug par sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
12a1(1): rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / dge 'bri bshes gnyen bla snyen bkur bar mos pa dang / dge ba bshes gnyen gyis bsgo ba dang ma 'ab
12a2(1): bar byed pa dang / thams cad pa khyen pa nyid dag 'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i rjes su blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rdzas su ngasam pa dang / 
12a3(1): dbyung zhi shes gtsun la sa y-i ste med dpar skyed pa dang drug rab pashes rims pa seM ts+tsha dbang du gro bar byu ba dang ldan pas/ dge nga'i bshes gnyen du
12a4(1): gnod pa thams cad yongs su spong bar byed pas tsam du sems/ dgra nga'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pas patsam du sa mas shing tshong dang nab tang nga rjod kyi drung nas
12a5(1): sang ngo // de nas chad dben mo nor bzangs tshod dang shrI btang brjod kyis bstan pa de la rjes su sems kong cang dupon pa tang brjid kyi gangam dge la nan tan du byed dang / 
12a6(1): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su bzung bar bya ba dang / chub chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba bsamagyis mi khyab pa rjes sna
12a7(1): dran par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cing babang pa bse mgyis mi khyab pa'ang du chud par dru ba dang / rgya chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 'du bar gyi
12a8(1): tshul bas mchis ma khyab pa la 'jub par bya nga /  'du gagags pa rnam par bgro'i phe bas bkyis kyi kyib parjes su bas par byang dang / sangs rgyas
12b1(1): ning yongs su sgrub bsam pas mi khyab pa la myos par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyun rjes sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpabating nge 'dzin dang
12b2(1): rnam par pa'i rna mi par dpyod pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis rmi khyab pa la yongs su brtag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa la bsgribs
12b3(1): pi med pa bri sems kyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las la bsam pa shAn+da tu brtan bde la nan tan tu bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
12b4(1): las dang / smon lam gyi rgyun bsams kyis myi khyab pa de'i rjes su spyod cing thar gyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gang na
12b5(1): ba der phyin nas dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan tshol tsho lnga ba las 'chag po'i gnas zhig gi 'chagasa'i mthar 'dug ste/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhag nas
12b6(1): dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med cing mi g.yol byed pa med cing lus drang por bsrangs ste/ dra na pa mngon tu byas nas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis ri
12b7(1): khyab pas rnam par 'phrul zhing g.yas g.yon dang / steng logs su lus mtha' yas la/ tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/ 
12b8(1): kha dog du ma'i lus dang ldan pa/ sems kyi skad cig re re la kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa yongs su ston pa de de ltar mnyam par bzhig cing zab la zhi / 
13a1(1): g.yong ba med cing dmigs pa med la/ dga' bras lus mtho bar gyur pa/ de'i bsru sgra thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa
13a2(1): rnam par gyur pas/ rnam par baphrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rabatu 'byed pa byed cing 'jug pa mthong ngo // rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa de'i maH
13a3(1): sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can thams thams cad yongs su sdod par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sbyar ba dang / s+yAng
13a4(1): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can+da thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa dang / ngan seng gi lam thas
13a5(1): cad yongs su bcad pa dang / sems can thams chung kyi bde ba'i lam gyi skye dbye ba dang / sems cir thams cad kyi na mongs pa'i gdung du
13a6(1): rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rnam par gtor ba dang / sems ca ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod hUM
13a7(1): bIr rnar par 'phrul pa'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dbyings shing de'i dang po'i mthil gnyis nas
13a8(1): tshong dpon gyi tshogs rim gro dang / bkur ba'i sna tshogs byed pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i tshong dpon deng 'dra ba'i gzug dang ldan pa/ 
13b1(1): lhub pa'i yul la spyad pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu klubs pa/ thor tshugs dang / gtsug gi rin po che dang / cod par sna chags thag
13b2(1): pi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bye ba 'byes pa'i 'khor dang ldan par 'byung ba mthong ngo // bram ze dang khyim bdes
13b3(1): mang po bza' btung rnam pa mang po dang / ro'i yan lag sna tshogs su sbyar ba thams cad dang / rkyen thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang / me
13b4(1): tog thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang / rin po che
13b5(1): thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / snod rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang / yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dbul ba
13b6(1): rnams yongs su sdud cing / 'gro ba sdug bsngal brnams dbugs dbyung ba dang // sems rgyar gyi sems tshim par bya ba dang / sems can gyi bsnam
13b7(1): rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub du yongs su smin par byed cing phyogs bcu'i bkang ste 'dod pa mthong ngo // bus mo'o
13b8(1): lce gnyis nas rgyal rigs khas pa'i gzugs dang bri ze mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten kyi khams na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang // bzo
14a1(1): sna tshugs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / mu 'gro ba'i byud da mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das 'i las
14a2(1): kyi tshul dang rgyas la gsal zhing mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten gyis slob dpon du bya bar mkhas pa'i gzugs che byad rdib pa du ma dang ldan pa/ dbyibs dang
14a3(1): rgyan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas ying mi bde ba'i sems can rab tu dga' bang byed cing / chos kyi nor gyis dngul ba'i sems rbA/ 
14a4(1): rnams la phan pa dgas pA dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams bde bar bya ba dang / legs par ltung bab sems can rnams mngon par bden pa dang theg
14a5(1): zil tsam nyes su myur ba'i sems can rnan skye dbugs dbyung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongs su bsgrubapa pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra na d+ha
14a6(1): bair b+hu ba dang / sdig pa 'i las bajug de'i sku yongs su bsgrags pa dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par byung de la sems can gzung pa dang / den skyed
14a7(1): can dpyod pa dang / dga' pa'i shugs yongs su bskyed pa dang / skyer bar sbe du'i brusmra pa'i das pa yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rdu la de 'thun pa
14a8(1): bslab pa ti byung cing bugs bcuchis par drim / 'ding ba mtho //  dzi kyil po'i nas drang se meng ze'i zing thams cad kyilas kyi tshu
14b1(1): su 'khod pa balpags pa dang / shun pa'i gos gyon pa ril ba thogs pa gzugs dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs sna tshogs can/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag byang
14b2(1): nas/ steng gi bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa byed cing chos kyi sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang / byang chub sems
14b3(1): dba'i dge 'dun yongs su bstan pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyad pa yongs su brjod pa dang / dbang po dben pa la sems can dbod pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i
14b4(1): don rab tu brdeg pa dang / ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongs su brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen
14b5(1): pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul rab tu bstan pa dang / mthar gyis bya ba'i las la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing phyogs bcu bkang ste/ 'dod
14b6(1): ba mthong ngo // 'i legs gnyis su nas k+Sha'i brim 'jig rten rgyurgya thams cad kyi zangs dang mnyam pa lus kyi dbyibs bsam thos mi khyab pad+ma ma dang ldan pa
14b7(1): byung ste/ klu'i rnam par dbul pa bris ma zas mi zla ba pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sras kyi sprin gyi rgyad bsamachis mi khyab pa num mkha'i dbyings la
14b8(1): sa b.rab pa dang / me tig gi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang / phreng ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab ce
15a1(1): rgyan gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rnam par klub dang / ring po che'i gzugs kyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyun gyis chos kyi da
15a2(1): thams cad yongs su khebs par bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sder bsam gyis pa khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i lha'i bdar gyi sbyin pas
15a3(1): gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i phyad 'phrul sna tshogs kyi phrin dang / char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che dam pa'i sprin gyi char dang
15a4(1): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i se mo do sna tshogs dang / me tog go sprin gyi chang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyad dang / rin po che'i dkyi
15a5(1): mo dkrung du 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprir gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bebs pa'i rgyan dang / lA rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyun
15a6(1): sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lnga'o bu po mang po chos kyi glu sa pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi srin gyi chang 'bebs babs ma gyis mi khyab pa dang / rin po che'i pad bze bamadzu
15a7(1): mu tog gi drabs brgyan pa rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i spriran gyi char rnam par 'thar ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud dang / chen po che'i cod panag+ni s+t+ri/ 
15a8(1): ni bu ring po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi snyir mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i lus kyi sprin gyi
15b1(1): tog dang / phreng ba dang rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i lus kyi sprin thal mo sbyar te/ gser gyi me tog si lams
15b2(1): bde bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan dang legs pa thams cad du bstod pa'i sprin gyi 'brug spa 'byin cing char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan ram mkha'i
15b3(1): la byin gyis rlob cing spos kyi phung po'i sbyin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu bdug pa dang / bdug spos kyin bun dang / sprin shin tu rgya che bas de bzhin
15b4(1): pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par khebs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum klas pa thams cad rang du brgyan pa dang / sos
15b5(1): can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bru dang sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pas skad cig skad cig tu chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ chang dpon
15b6(1): banor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // thong kA'i dpal gyi be'u nas lA ma yin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas kyi ning grangs med pa'i rdul shin du pha ba snyed byung ste/ ldum
15b7(1): yin gyi smras rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston cing chu 'dzin chen po yongs su bskum pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stang du rab tu
15b8(1): bskyod pa dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'thab par bya ba dang / lnga'i gnas thams cad yongs su bskyod pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thas
16a1(1): cad zil gyisA gnan pa dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang nga rgyal dang / rlom pa dang / dregs pa thams cad rab tu
16a2(1): gnom pa dang / gnod par sems pa'i sems bzlog cing dag par bye ba dang / the 'chum pa'i sems phyir zlog par bya ba dang / semasan+nar rnams kyi ma
16a3(1): nga'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa khor rnam par gter ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i thab mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba dang / lAm yin gyi sgyus rnam par
16a4(1): daphrul pa dang / rnam par rje bsna tshugs kyi sems can rnams smyo bar bya ba dang sdig pa las gyen du bskyod pa 'khor bas 'jig rten par bya ba dang / srid
16a5(1): ba'i lam b+hi rgyud thams cad na sa gyed tu bstod de/ gnas med pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la sems can rnams rab tu dgong pa
16a6(1): byang chubasam sa pa 'jams pa zung chub sems dpa' skyeng pa rnam par dag pa byud dang / byang chub semaspang ba 'i rnams pa rol du mye byel rab tu dadu dang
16a7(1): bya dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sul rub du gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dngapa 'jungs kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyas kyi rgyal stong ba yongs su bskyed pa du
16a8(1): chos kyi tshul rnam par dmeng pa kyims kyi sems kyis se sa chos kyi kyi sargyas par 'gangs pa byed pa chang tsho thong ba ma
16b1(1): rgyakyu gzung nas nyan zas dang rang sangs rgyas mang ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tupa bskyed byung nas nyan thos dang rang sa rgyas kyis 'dul
16b2(1): ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa yongs su brjod pa byed cing rtag par mngon par zhen pa rnams la/ 
16b3(1): 'dra byed thams cad mi rdeg par yongs su bsten pa dang / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rnams la mi sdug pa dang / zhe sdang gi spyod pa can rnams la byams
16b4(1): padeng gti mug gi spyod pa can rnams la rkyen las byung ba'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung brjod pa dang / tshe mnyam pa'i spyod pa cen rnams la ye shes kyi yul dang
16b5(1): ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul mngon par bstan pa dang / yul la mngon par dga' ba rnams la gnas med par rab tu brjod pa dang / zhi ba la gnas su sems
16b6(1): pa rnams smon lam gyi khyad par gyis spo ba bskyed pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud dang / sgo thams cad du chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang / skra thams cad
16b7(1): sems can thams cad kyi don tu brjod pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dben gyi bu nor bzangs kyis kyis mthong ngo // zag pa
16b8(1): lhun gnyis las gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i dbang po dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / lus mi sdug pa kha dog dang chu zheng sna tshogs can/ spyong
17a1(1): lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ bzhon pa sna tshogs la non pa 'khor sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba sems can gyi khams yongs su
17a2(1): bskyang ba brtson pa 'od sna tshogs kyis snang bar bya ba la brtson pa dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu sgrog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing blangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phrab snyed byung nas
17a3(1): thabs mngon par bsgrub pa sna chags mi 'dres pas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi rnam mkhab rgyas par 'gengs shing dge ba'i spyod pa thabs cad yongs su
17a4(1): bA dang / 'phabs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / lagar rdo rje'i las
17a5(1): kyis yang dag par song ba dang / yang dang par bzhugs pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim zo bya ba dang / 
17a6(1): sems can log par lhung ba rnams kyi ngar song gi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par zlog pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi rang dang / gnod pa dang / 'jigs
17a7(1): pa thams cad ni bar bya ba'i don tu btsun pa/ sems can gyi don tu byabs 'jig rten longs sgra srung ba la brtson pa rnams bsed rnams dang ye shes bya ba'ir la yongs su
17a8(1): rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjes su 'brang bar byeb dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i'i'i cher gtsang pa bred cing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas pa 'gengs
17b1(1): bzung bar drang ba byung ba'angs pas byung // mdun pamanas ma 'aman ba dbyung ba sangs rgyas panyid zangs med pa'i rdul dum du srung du'angs dang 'dunan
17b2(1): b.lang brgya snyeng grangs pa pyacan dang / dri ba'i dbang ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing zangs med pa'i rdul shin tu ma bskyed/ dri ba dbang po'i buma'i 'khor brgya sang grangs med
17b3(1): ts+tshan+da dag blang nas/ lha'i rol ma brgya stong grangs med nga bi ska snyan pa dang / glu'i dbyangs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa brjod pa byed cing byang
17b4(1): kyi sems yongs su bsdigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spong ba yongs su brjod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba'i sde thams cad la mngon par bsod
17b5(1): pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgo thams cad rab tu 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo thams cad la mngon par spo bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
17b6(1): sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can gyi sgo thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / 
17b7(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgra thams cad yangs dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par thub dang / sgrib pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par brtog par
17b8(1): byab ngo / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa thams cad yongs su bskyed pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon mo dri nor bzangs kyis mthing ngo // khadzi na
18a1(1): nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan ning stobs kyi lhag pa ni'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa byung nas/ sbyin pa chen po
18a2(1): bod zer gyi rgyan rab tu 'gyed cing / rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su btang ba dang / nor bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad sbyin pa dang / dbul ba
18a3(1): rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba dang / srog gcod pa las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / byams pa sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / ma byin par len pa
18a4(1): dang rab tu thal ba dang / rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bye ba khag khrig brgya steng yongs su btang ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las rnam par
18a5(1): pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa las rab tu dgod pa dang / brdzun tu smra ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sbu ba med pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang / pha ra'i
18a6(1): tshig las rnam par brlob pa dang / gzhan 'dum par brtson pa'i chog rab tu brjod pa dang / ni bcad pa'i tshig las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / 
18a7(1): zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / gno pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i byang rgyal du smra ba las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / don zab mo'i tshig rab
18a8(1): dbying sa ga ba la yang dag pa dgang pa dang / dgagags thams cad las 'jig rnam par brnag pa dang / sa pa dang ldan pa 'cha bar bdu
18b1(1): par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi stong gi dri ma yongs su sel cing 'dod pa chung ba dang / chos shes pa la brtson par sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chags sems
18b2(1): las 'jig rte rnam par bzlog pa dang / gnan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa la rab tu dgod pa dang / lta ba'i dra ba thams cad las 'jig rten rab tu gdon
18b3(1): pa dang / yid gnyis kyi rab thams cad rnam pa gtor ba dang / the tsom gyi sgo thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / nem nur dang som ci'i rab rib yongs su bas
18b4(1): ba dang / chos rnam par dbye ba'i 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang / rkyen las byung ba rab tu brjod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i tshul la sems can rab tu dpo
18b5(1): pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i tshul la gzud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi don gyi tshul sna tshogs brjod pa byed cing / phyogs
18b6(1): bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bgengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // mig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgya stong sangs rgyas kyi zhing zangs
18b7(1): med pa'i rdul shin tu ma bsnyed byung ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po thams cad yongs su snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang / sems
18b8(1): can rnam kyi gti drug gi rang ring sel ba dang / zang ba'i sems can dmyal bar 'khod pa'i sems can rnams gi zang ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / 
19a1(1): kAsa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od kha dog dkar po can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od be d+haR+Ya'i kha dog
19a2(1): rab tu 'gyeng ba dang / bai rwa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'ad gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyeng ba dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi ning rnams su 'od gser gyi khadag
19a3(1): can dag ca rab tu bcad pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'ang shel gyi la dog can rnams par rab tu 'gyid pa dang / gas tsa'ang bzhin gyi zhing rna
19a4(1): su 'od bu ti 'a bru'i kha dog can rab tu 'thed pa dang / a sa? gar ba'i rang bzhin gyi nings su 'od gser gyi kha dag ce rab tu 'byed pa dang / gser b+h+rUM rang bzhin
19a5(1): zhing rnams su 'od a swa gar ba'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / in dra ri la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal ze tsama'i snying po'i kha dog can
19a6(1): rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po nye ba'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi nong rnams su bong rin po che'i rgyal po ir+yA dra rI la'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / 
19a7(1): matig dmar po'i rlung ban gyi ning rnams su'ang na pa che baN+Dal ba sa 'dza dazer tshong ba'i dang / dkyil 'khor gyi stong pa'i dag can rab tu 'byed bang
19a8(1): ri la che'i rgyal po thang ba'ang ma gyi ba / dkyil 'khang sa sring pa'i rang bzhin gyin rnams su' su ga dbang zag kha ga can rab tu 'byung bdas
19b1(1): rin po che gcig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'ong rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'ong
19b2(1): rin po che gcig gi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can gyi don tshad med pa
19b3(1): la brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi byi nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // smin mtshams kyi mdzod spun zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing
19b4(1): grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu za ba steng phyung nas lha'i dbang po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / 
19b5(1): sangs rgyas blta bar dga' ba la rjes su bsngags pa byed cing / sems can tshad med pa 'dul ba la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par
19b6(1): bgengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo / 'phral ba nas tshangs pa chen po spyod lam rab tu zhi ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra
19b7(1): bsnyed byung nas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs brjod de/ sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba bdab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga'
19b8(1): bar bya ba byed cing / sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson pa byed pa'i phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
20a1(1): mtho dang / mganas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grang sna pa'i rdul shin tu ma ba ste byung nas/ kha dag dang dbyibs sna chag
20a2(1): bcan pa'i lus yongs su su cing / dpe zung ba'ang bas rnam par rjes pa'i lus rab tu bsta pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bya smon pala' dang bang bang pa sa
20a3(1): tu'athe ba dang / baspu'i brag thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sdor gyi byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa nas bzung ste/ gtong ba dang / len pa dang / 
20a4(1): dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang ba'i rnam pa'i srin mang po rab tu kyi bdeng / pha rol tu phyid pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba cwa mtsha yongs su
20a5(1): bstan pa dang / spyod pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du yongs su brjod pa dang / ser sna'i dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang / chags pa thams cad spang ba la sa
20a6(1): can rab tu dbyu dbadang / 'jig rten ri po che sna tshogs thams cad kyirgyan gyis brtan par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lasas
20a7(1): nar ba tung ba dab dang / mtshan thams cad gi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi maN+Dan 'byung ba'i rtswa smon pa mdzang / 
20a8(1): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi mang zas meng ba'i tshul shin tum pa sing byangangs tshul khrims kyi pa la tsun pa yongs su brdad cing
20b1(1): drug thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i stan+da ni slar brnam pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sams
20b2(1): thams cad lam gyi rgyud dang / yul las phyir phyogs par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon tu phyogs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
20b3(1): 'dod pa la rnams par sred pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi ling tog rnam par bsal ba dang / log pa'i rnams par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar bya
20b4(1): nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par dgod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul
20b5(1): khrims rab tu theb par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi lamanan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims la sems can dbod pa dang / skyeng pa'i lam gyi rlung rmi lam lta bur sa
20b6(1): can rnams la rab tu brjod cing / rmi lam gyi tshul dang / mnyam par yongs su gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir yul yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nyen mongs pa la dbang
20b7(1): sbur bar sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing zangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba steng byung nas/ 
20b8(1): 'jig rten rnams la mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu mngon par ston cing kho ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / shar nyer ba med pa dang / ni sdang nga med pa
21a1(1): dang / chu gartson pa med pa dang / khang ba med pa'i sems la sems spyan rab tu dgang pa dang / rgyal sa ga ste gnas kyi las pran+d+ha thams
21a2(1): cad yongs su gcad pa'i phyir ba spu'i sgo thams cad ras bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngar gyi sbyor ba'i srin rab tu 'byed cing / 
21a3(1): bar dnga'i slebs la sems can rab tu dgang pa dang / chos la dbang sbyar ba la sems canarab tu snang babyed pa mazang de// yang zung chub sems dngapas sa
21a4(1): rgyas kyi ming grangs med nga ba rdul shin tu me ba snyed blang ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus so spobs mtha' yas bshin tu san rnyed thams cad mkhyen pa
21a5(1): thub rnams pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sebs kyis thos pargya mtsho yongs su btsal bas me skye bar bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang / de bzhir gshegs pa thamasas
21a6(1): la mchod cing rim po bye ba la sems can rab tu gzung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i brjon 'grus chen pa la sems can ra
21a7(1): du byung ba dang / brtson 'grus skyes par la gyur ba dang / ldang rjen pa rgyu sbyar ba mang 'a'i snyid lus byams cad la sa rab tu cing / byang chungs sa
21a8(1): du 'grus papa ma tshur sakyang yangs sus can mau kyi'i mi ma pa sa ti ba nga / bdun 'dzus
21b1(1): tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dpa dang / lus la dbang sgyur ba la 'jig rten rab tu gzud pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par brtson par byed pa mthong ngo / 
21b2(1): yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran pa'i lam la seMs
21b3(1): can thams cad rab tu dgod cing / sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang / rab rib thams cad rnam par bstsal ba dang / rlom pa dang / bab med pa thams cad
21b4(1): las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / bag yod pa'i chos la rab tu dgod pa dang / khengs pa 'gying ba dang / nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu gzhom pa dang / 
21b5(1): sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan gyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga tham
21b6(1): cad ras bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sprin rab tu bkye ba dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba la sems can rab tung bod ba byed
21b7(1): tsIng / skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba phyung
21b8(1): ste/ ba spu'i bug thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang / ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba bang po'i sprin rab tu bkye ba dang / dbyangs kyi yin
22a1(1): lag rgya mtsho'i skang thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang / yang dag par lta ba'i glog rab
22a2(1): tu bamed pa dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi skang dbyangs rab tu basbag pa dang sems can rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba'i rol lhu rab tu bzhig pa dang lta ba thams cad kyi
22a3(1): drug rdung byung bdud/ the tsho dang yid gces dang / nem nur gyi dbang ba rnam par bsal ba dang / ye shes kyi ba yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing
22a4(1): sems kyis cig ri ra la chos kyang dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mdzang // ya byang chubasepas dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing zangs medang brjem shin du ma
22a5(1): sa byung nas/ sangs rgyas thams cang kyi thabs mkhas pa'i rdul gying la 'a'i bang tu brjod pa byed cing / bsku'i bug thams cad na mi thabyas pa
22a6(1): ba ldad pa na gyi 'i 'jog rnangs mthangs sa sa pa'i byung b.rab tu brjid pad / theg pa pa' 'gyu
22a7(1): ba basbyin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cada'i dbul la ba yang dag par bsngags padang / 'khang ba dang mang na las 'das pa rna ma dadapa'i byang chub ma
22a8(1): dnga'i snang pa yongs su bsan pa dang / byang chubs zas dpa' rnams thabs mkhas pa'i pha ral tu dran pa la sems can rab tu dgad pa dang / 'jig ce
22b1(1): rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i dbang / dkyil 'khrur rab tu bstan pa byed cing sems paskyed pa rer la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par mtha nga / 
22b2(1): byang chub sems sangs rgyas kyi ning zangs med pa'i rdul shin tu ma po ste dbyung ste/ bsru'i bu ga thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtshar rtsa mtshan
22b3(1): sprin gyi 'brug sgra skrag cing baspu'i bu ga thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i
22b4(1): sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu bkye ba dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la
22b5(1): sems can rab tu dgod pa dang smon lam chen po'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mur thug par 'dril bar chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba nyon mongs pa thams cad
22b6(1): rnam par bzlog pa/ mi shes pa'i ri rnam par 'thor ba/ 'jig rten du rab tu brjod pa byed cing / smon lam sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ sems
22b7(1): kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bgengs pa mthong ngo // yang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ning zangs med pa'i rdul shin tu za ba snyed byung ste/ 
22b8(1): byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub pa'i snga rab tu dbyung ba dang / baspu'i bug
23a1(1): thams cad nas stabs kyi pa ral tu phyin pa sgrub cing 'byin pa bstad gyi snang ba mang ba'i sprin rab tubakyi ba dang / bdu dngapas can la pa thams cad
23a2(1): mithu ba pa'i stabs yongs byastan pa dang / khor yug dang rdo rje'i thams cad lus kyi sing du rdi bzang mi ma pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang / bskal ba 'chig padz+ras
23a3(1): cad pa me'i rgya tsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gnod pa med pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'bya bla thams cad la ga 'i mthil gyis rnam
23a4(1): mkha'i dbyings su rngon pa'i stobs yongs su stor pa byed cing sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings su 'gengs pas rgyun mi gcad pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems
23a5(1): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'ardul shin tu za bsed byung nas/ sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston cing / bsru'i zug thams cad
23a6(1): nas ye shes kyi pa rol tu dran pa yongs su dge pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i srin rab tu 'gyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad
23a7(1): yan tan dang ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa khri migs sa rab du brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa ma shes
23a8(1): man par bstan pa dang / sman lamathams cad mngan b.rang bsgrub po'i migs ma ngad par shes pa dang / ldan pa'i ma shes kyis sangs su brjed pa dang sems
23b1(1): thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i spyan lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan ba ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sems can
23b2(1): thams cad bdag med pa'i ring bzhin la gzud pa mngon parare shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho
23b3(1): rnam par blta ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pad
23b4(1): d+hA'i ye shes kyis rab tu dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa rnam par blta ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i
23b5(1): kyis yang dag par brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dgye
23b6(1): ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa byed cing / sems
23b7(1): gyiskad ci bder la chos kying byings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshang dpon gyi du nor bzangs kyis mthang ngo // skyo ba gtsugater gyigs pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa
23b8(1): sku sangs kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu ma bsted mtshan dam pa dang / dpe byad bzang ba rnam par dag pas brgyan pa 'jam bu'i chu klung gi gser rgya
24a1(1): shin tu 'bar bltar snang ba 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur sngo ning chad byed par 'bar ba dang / chos kyi dbyings tshul gyis rgyas par 'ged
24a2(1): pa'i dbyangs mnga' ba sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dpung med pa yongs su ston pa 'gro ba thams cad la tha mi dad par chos kyi srin gyi char mngon par 'bed
24a3(1): pa ste/ 'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi gna'i bye brag mngon sum du shes pa'i srid ces bya ba'i chos kyi sbyin gyi char
24a4(1): mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bsur ba thob pa rnams lag ni kun tu rten pa'i srin ces bya ba'i chos kyi spridan gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang
24a5(1): chub sems dpa' chos chen po'i rgyal chab du dbang bskur ba rnams la ste kun nas 'jug pa/ zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
24a6(1): gnon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi srin gyir mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po
24a7(1): tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams le chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
24a8(1): sa rje mas kyi ldan man par dang bab nga/ byang chub sems dpa' byi gyi gyi bangs ni 'i rnams pa'i kyi mangs su
24b1(1): kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyar ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'gro ba yongs su sdud pas
24b2(1): chur sres pa rnams dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi rgyur mngon par dbang pa dang / byang chu
24b3(1): sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / gzhi rab tu sgog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon dbab pa dang / byang chub sem
24b4(1): dpa' las dang po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang / thabs kyi snying po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang byang chub
24b5(1): dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la dga' bar bya ba'i mdzod shin tu bsags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
24b6(1): yangs pa la mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi srin gyi char mngon par da
24b7(1): pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gzhi kun tu mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi srin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams
24b8(1): la tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'brug sa'i dbrangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi srin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dbang sgyur gyi lha rnams la stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi
25a1(1): yo byad mi bdapa 'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / bdud po ris rnams la thams cad bakhyend pa
25a2(1): tshogs rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi srin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams la ye shes
25a3(1): rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi char+ya mngon par dbab pa dang / dga' lngar gyi lha rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' srin lam rin pa
25a4(1): che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / tshe ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i mdzad
25a5(1): bya ba'i chos kyi sprir N+DI char mngon par dbab pa dang / lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' ba'i shushes 'byung ba nas
25a6(1): byaba'i chas kyi srin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gnang sbyin gyi dbang po'i gnas su chos dbyings kyi ma mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa
25a7(1): rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes byang ba rgyas kyi srin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dza ba'i dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nas yang dag phyu
25a8(1): 'tha bzhes bya bcas kyichen gyi cha ma na par / ma yan kyagangs sumathas kyi tshul rje dal la' ces tha 'i ma
25b1(1): mngan par dab pa dang / namamakha' ltung ba dbang pa'i gnas su bzhin gshags pa thams cad 'byung ba thabs kyi snyun ces byung 'chas kyubyu
25b2(1): par dbab pa dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi sngon yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sbyin char mngon par dbab pa dang
25b3(1): klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sgrog cing srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud las skyo ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par
25b4(1): dbab pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i gnas su dga' brgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab dang / 
25b5(1): 'i gnas su 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can
25b6(1): bab 'jig rten du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang / 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig gi rgyud kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi srin
25b7(1): kyi char mngon par dbab pa da / byol song gi skye gnas su las kyi lamakhan ma tho ba med pa la nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
25b8(1): rjes su dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhan ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa
26a1(1): thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsngags pa/ sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba'i sems 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi srin gyi
26a2(1): char mngon par dbang pa dang / sems can log par ltung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu thob pas dbugs dbyung ba'i dbyangs kyi ngar nas bya
26a3(1): chos kyi sbyin gyi char mngon par dbang pa mdzad cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu dor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // bsu'i brag thams cad las
26a4(1): bcu'i sgor re nas kyang 'ang zer gyi drab pa dang / dkyil 'khor kha dog dang / gzugs kyi grong dang / rgyan grangs med pa can/ dgos pa sna tshogs grangs med
26a5(1): pa la sngagan du gnus pa/ sangs rgyas k+Sh+ma ning grangs da'i rdul shin tu bya bstung byung nas/ grags bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthang ma/ 
26a6(1): ltar bsu pa spyi'i 'od zer medra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la l-i las ni sbyin pa'i spyod pa skyon med pas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar rnam par 'phrul paza
26a7(1): baspu'i sde'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil la 'khor la la las ni dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / brtul zhug
26a8(1): yid mdang/ tshul gyi dkyil 'khar durnam por 'phrul ba mthang ngo // bsrub na'i bo zer gyi ba dang / dkyil ga khor la la las ni byang chubam mas
26b1(1): thams cad bzod pa'i spyod pa'i rnam pa dus gsum byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgal ga dang / yan lag gi dam pa bcad kyang nyams su bzod pa zad
26b2(1): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khru tshur dang dbyug pas bsnun te/ mtshan gyis lus la btab kyang nyam su bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lus
26b3(1): thams cad gshegs sam/ snying dang mog phyung yang nyams su bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' dus bam du byung ba rnam
26b4(1): par brtags pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid yongs su btsal ba'i ched du lus dang sems la gnod pa thams cad dang / 
26b5(1): yan lag dang nying lag bcad pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir nyams su bzod par byas pa dang / bag la zhi bar byas pa dang / btang
26b6(1): snyoms su bzhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzad pa'i spyod par rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag kyang mthong ngo // ba spu'i 'ong
26b7(1): zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par phye ba'i gzugs da// 
26b8(1): byang chub sems dpab 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten yongs su bskyod pa dang / 
27a1(1): rgya mtsha yongs su bskyam pa dang / sems can yongs su skye bar bya ba dang / mu stegs can thams cad yongs su charab cang
27a2(1): pa dang / bdud thams cad sra dkong ba dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen por rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // bsdu'i
27a3(1): sgro dazer mingadra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs kyi sred pa dang / lus
27a4(1): len pa ci snyed pa dang / rigs kyi bu skye ba yongs su bzung ba ji snyed pa dang / gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
27a5(1): gnyen gyi gang mngag rjes su bstan pa yongs su bzung ba ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag la nan tan bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang / 
27a6(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongs su bslab pa dang / 'thun pa'i gtsug lag khang dang / gnas dang / gnal med khang dang / 
27a7(1): yul dang / ri'i su la ji snyed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag sus yongs su bsgrub pa'i drang srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang / rgyal po'i thabs
27a8(1): ji snyed pa dang / 'byung ba la mngon pa mas paji snyed pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / yi mi dang / rdul dang / srong la mji med pa de dag thams cad
27b1(1): gang chang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // bcu'i ska'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang bal
27b2(1): par spyad cing / chos thams cad yongs tshol ba dang ldan pa'i lus yongs su bzung ba mthong ste/ lus gang gis chos kyi tshig gcig gdon du yang bdag
27b3(1): pa thams cad yongs su btang ste/ sems can thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang / rim ze dang / bkur bsti thams cad kyis dge
27b4(1): bshes gnyen thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang / dad pa dang srid sus lus rab tu btud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongs su
27b5(1): btsal ba dang / chos kyi tshig gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshig thams cad la yang de bzhin du 'gro ba
27b6(1): thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad kyis yongs su btsal ba de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis baspu'i sgo cig gi 'od
27b7(1): zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor las mthong ngo // bsku'i sgra'i bod zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
27b8(1): sems can yongs su smin par bya'i thabs 'pho ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'byam klas pas sems can thams cad yongasu bsdu ba'i sbyor ba mthong ngo / ses
28a1(1): mA r+ye la yang khrus dang stod pa'i tshul gyi sa sngon gyi lus nye par blangs 'thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la sogs sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'drabs yongs su spyad/ 
28a2(1): pa mang / bcu'i sgra'i 'od gzer gyi na pa'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo // bkra'i sgo'i 'od gzir gyi rna ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sa
28a3(1): pa thams cad du sngon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa/ dang / sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bslabs pa'i spyod pa dang / zhing thams
28a4(1): yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa ji snyed pa dang / sngon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
28a5(1): bras rbang du/ 'khor ba'i sgra thams cad lus 'khor ba'i skyonas sor re'i garten par mngon par bsgrubs pa mdzad pa de dag bams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bla nor bzangs kyis bsku/ 
28a6(1): 'ad ga par sbyin pa'i dkyil 'bor gcigasas mthong ngo // bad+ma'i sgo'i 'od gzer gyi d+hA ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni stobs kyi pra Na smin pa'i stong pa thams cad dang / 
28a7(1): ldan pa'i sngon gyi stor ba mthong ngo // bsku'i spro'i 'od gzer gyi ba'i dkyil 'khor la lalas ni spyod pa rnam par grub thams cad dang ldan pa'i mi shes pa'i gnyid kyis log pa'i sa
28a8(1): nas par byed pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi stor ba rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur to// de nas tshong dadzin gyi ze ror bzangs dge slong bzang ba'i rgyal mtshan de sar sem par / 
28b1(1): pa la/ sems shin tu rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la
28b2(1): rjes su rnam par bsam pa dang / sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo'i rgyud kun la mngon par gnas pa'i rgyun de'i rjes su 'brang
28b3(1): zing khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgra'i de la 'jug par bya bang / sangs rgyas kyi byir gyi rlabs yang dag par
28b4(1): gnon pa'i ye shes de la rab tu brtag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi stobs de yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sno lam gyi stobs
28b5(1): rje brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de shin tu rgyag par bya ba byed cing dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du na zhag gcig kyang lon to// 
28b6(1): che phrag gnyis dang bdun yang lon no// zla ba phyed dang zla b+hA ga cig dang bra bo gnyis dang / zla ba drug gi bar dang / nyin mag drug tu dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal ba gyi sa sumate/ 
29a1(1): nyin zhag drug 'das nas ngag song rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin de las langs so// de nas nor bzangs kyis sbas pa/ 'phags pating
29a2(1): 'dzin 'di de ltar zab la de lar chu ma mchis pa'i yul dang ma ldan pa dang / de ltar bsamachi mi khyab pa'i can dang ldan pa dang / de ltar snang ba ma tshungs pa dang / de ltar
29a3(1): zangs ma mchis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar mi 'thogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar phyogs kun tu
29a4(1): rnam par snang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'di ltar sems can gyi don chad pa mchis pa rab tu sgrub par gyur pa ni ngo mnar te/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi sdug
29a5(1): kyi phung po che dam mchis pa rnam par ni bar bgyi ba la sta gan du gnas pa ste/ 'di ltar dbul ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas so/ sems ca
29a6(1): dpral pa'i lam gyi rgyud rgyun gcad pa dang / bral sa ngag skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongs su bskyab pa dang / mo kham pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sa thams cad
29a7(1): bcad pa dang / mtho ris kyi lam kyi chung byin par bgyi dang / ska dang ma po ga' bang / zing ba 'byung bar yang dang / bas ma su ba 'ang
29a8(1): thams su myang bar bgyi pa dang / 'dus byas la myed dbri nga yang yongs su 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sa yongs su bsta
29b1(1): pal sdugan du gnas pag/ byang chub kyi sems yang dag par zla ba'i rgyu yongs su badz+ra pal sa gan du gnas pang/ bsad nams dang ma shas mchags
29b2(1): yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu rnam par 'phel bar bgyi dang / snying chen po'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / sngon lam chen po'i stobs su bskyed
29b3(1): par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las snang ba rab tu 'thob par bgyi ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i
29b4(1): khyad par la 'jug pa cha mngon bsgrub pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyad shes shing snang bar bgyi dang / byang chub sems dpabs shes shing snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang / 
29b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ldan lam dang spyod pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyun rnam par dag pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa brlan pa la thogs
29b6(1): pa ma mchis par bgyi ba la stan gan du gnas pa'o/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bgyi smras pa/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i
29b7(1): btang snyoms yongs su thob pa zhes za ba yongs su thob pa zhes bya ba med de/ ting nge 'dzin pa de ni de'i snang ba ste/ sde kun nas rnam par dge pa'i rgyan ces bya ba
29b8(1): bo/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas blta ba'i btang snyoms pa tu thob pa'i snang ba las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan
30a1(1): ces bya ba 'di shin tu bsgoms na sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan las stsogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba yod
30a2(1): su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ sbas pa/ 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yul de bus ma/ mabs sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhug
30a3(1): ba la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa la thogs pa med do/ 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug par bya ba la thags pa me dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa
30a4(1): gnan pa la thogs pa med do/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su brgyan pa la thogs pa med do/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya ba la thogs med de/ 5
30a5(1): rgyas palnga zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che bdag pa la thags pa medang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su
30a6(1): bya mams pa sad/ sbyangs bas la 'dug ci 'ang chu par bya la sa pa padang / sas ya 'dreg pa la
30b1(1): su 'thad par bya ba la thags pa med de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rjes su btag par bya ba la thogs pa med de/ sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rjes su brtag par bya
30b2(1): la thogs pa med do/ snying rje chen po'i phyogs rnam par mi spong bar bya ba la thags pa med do/ byams pas phyogs rgyas par dgang ba la thogs pa med do/ sangs
30b3(1): rgyas blta ba'i phyogs la 'jug pas mi ngoms par bya ba la thogs pa med do/ sems can rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// 
30b4(1): sems can gyi rgyu dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can gyi dbang po tha dad pa thams cad shes par bya ba la thogs
30b5(1): pa med do/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shes su zad na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par
30b6(1): spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yul la blo zos rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad la rig pa rjes su 'phangs pa'i ye shes can/ blo shin tu yangs
30b7(1): pas tshangs med pa'i yul rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzungs chen po'i snang ba la dbang sgyur ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba thams cad shin tu dag pa/ mngon
30b8(1): par shes pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khrum chag gi mthu 'byin pa la shin tu byung ba/ seM sa yang dag par rig pa mi bang pa'i rgya mtshol zhugs pa/ ngag stanaH
31a1(1): sa'i snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten tu gyur pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ spyad
31a2(1): yul bstan pa'am/ yul rab tu brjod pa 'am/ smon lamachen po'i stobs yang dag par bsngags pa'am/ 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su snang bar za ba'am/ 
31a3(1): yang dag par bsgrub pa mngon par brjod pa'am/ lam yongs su bstan pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'bring bar za ba'am/ sems kyi yul
31a4(1): shes par bya ba'am/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya bar nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu'i thugs kyi rgyud 'di nyid daphyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam
31a5(1): par rlom pa zhes bya ba yod do/ de na bza' shing gir ba kun nas rnam por brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni ga/ grong khyer 'di chen po zhi bya ba'i shar phyogs logs na ma
31a6(1): de/ der shed las skyes pa'i rgyal po 'a bzangs kyi chung ma dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
31a7(1): byang chub sems dpa'i sdud pal bsab bar bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba rnaMs shig/ de nas tshang dpar gyi bu nar bzangs dga' rangs te mtha
31a8(1): gling rnams bde la tshim ning yid bde bskyes nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho 'i rgyal mtshan las stong pa yongs su blangs te/ chos kyis nye bar 'tshe bar bya
31b1(1): pa ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la zhugs pa/ snang ba thob pa/ ye shes kyis snang bar gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mos pa rnam par dag pas
31b2(1): khong du chud pa/ sems can chos kyi tshul gyi snang ba rjes su song ba rnam par dag pa'i sgos snang ba dang ldan par gyur pa/ phyogs su ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu 'dal ba
31b3(1): des dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi rkang pa gnyis la skyibs phyag 'tshal te lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas dge sdang rgya mtsho'i rgyal mcha
31b4(1): la btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ yang dang yang lta zhing yang dang yang mngon par blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / rab tu gtud pa dang / gus par bya ba dang / rim
31b5(1): zor bya ba dang / yid la bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs su bsgom pa dang / legs par brjod pa dang / ngo mtshar bya ba dang / yon
31b6(1): tan mngon du bya ba dang / rjes su bsngags pa pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su dran par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba dang / mi btang ba dang
31b7(1): yid la bsam pa dang / rjes su 'azang bar bya ba dang / smon lan gyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / mthong bar dga' ba dang / dbyangs kyi mtshan ma gzung ba
31b8(1): dang / gzungs kyi rjes su bas pa dang / ming yongs su gzung ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ba dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs rjes su dran pa
32a1(1): bya ba dang / ye shes kyi yul rjes su bsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / smon lam gyi yul la rjes su bzang
32a2(1): bar bya ba dang / spyod yul gyi yul la rnam par dpyad par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su gzung ba byed cing / dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung nas seng ngo // 
32a3(1): bam po dgra bcu go gnyis pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan gyis ni mgu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis ni yang dag
32a4(1): bar bsngags te btang / dge ba'i shes gnyen mthong ba'i byin gyis ni byin tu bar bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdabs ngag la ni na tan du byed/ dge ba'i bshes man
32a5(1): yid du 'ong bar rjes su sems/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas tsam dul/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin par
32a6(1): yang dag par lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos la rjes su lta ba dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas nam mkha' lta ba la ming tsam du la zhing
32a7(1): mthar gyis phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa'i brda' shing gar ba kun nas rngam par rgyal bapa gangan ba der byin das/ des mthang ba 'aza' shing gir ba kun nas
32a8(1): rnam par brtson pa/ rin pa tshe thams cad kyi bas kun nas bskor ba/ rin pa che'i shing gzeng babrel legs pas yongs su brgyan pa/ rin po che thams cad
32b1(1): shing gi meng ba'i me tog srad bu yid du 'ong ba'i sprin rab tu 'phrul bas gas rgyas pa/ rin po che thams cad rgya shing gis yang dag par brgyan pa shing thams cad
32b2(1): tog shin tu rmas pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba/ seMs sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba las phyogs kun tu spos kyi ngang zhim pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i shing sna tshogs
32b3(1): kyi lhun las rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba 'phyang ba rab tu 'byung zhing / char ltar mngon par 'bab pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi shing dang / nor bu rin
32b4(1): po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes shing sba la/ rgya cher brgyan pa'i gzhi can/ yid bzhin gyi gos kyi shing thams cad las kha dog sna tshogs gos 'byung bas gam ye
32b5(1): ldes shing mdzes par brgyan pa/ sil stan gyi zhing thams cad las lha rdzas las kyang 'phags pa'i sil stan rlung gis bskyod cing / sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs
32b6(1): san pa 'byung bas sa'i gzhi mthon dman med par gnas pa/ rgyan gyi shing sna tshogs kyi gseb nas/ rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa rgyun tung 'byung zhing // 
32b7(1): 'byung bas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa mthong ste/ bza' shing gir ba chen po kun nas rnam par brgyan pa/ de'i nang na khang pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun
32b8(1): kyang / nor bu rin po che dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong phrag bcu/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las
33a1(1): brtsegs pa'i bdan dang ldan pa dang / gnal med khang brgya stong phrag ru/ gdung rin po che rnam par snang ba las zos pa dang / rdzing du
33a2(1): brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad las gni blangs te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi bgus mu khyud du byas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi themaskas btags pa/ rin
33a3(1): brgyan tshogs / rdzas kyi can dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ gser gyi bye ma kun tu bapham pa/ gni nor bu rin pa rje chu dang kun tu ba'am pa/ phyogs
33a4(1): nas thamasas rnam par byas pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba dang / ngang drar dang / rma dang // khwa byug dang / khrad khrung dang / la ba ba dang / 
33a5(1): kun pa'i sgra sad stan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ rin pa chebi tal bzeng bas kun nas brgyan pa/ gsar kyi dril bub drabs kun na log pa/ rlung gis bsrung
33a6(1): yid du'ang ba 'byung ba/ steng nas rin po che'i thar chen po che sna tshogs kyi shing gir bas yangs bskor ba rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtsharan
33a7(1): gas par bzang ba/ bum rgyas zlag bcus dus dang 'jun pa'i cad dan gyis bad mchos mtha' 'a kha nga / ri bad+d+ha sarmugs kyi la rag tu 'dug
33a8(1): ra mas yangs su khyang ba/ rin pa che'i pad ri'i 'di chen pas rnying bar byang pa'i chu drim med pa dang ldan yod pabri/ bza' shing gar bdab dbus ni gnal med
33b1(1): khang chen brgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya bas pa gso rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po las blangs pa/ nor bu rin po cheb ka bas bkye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhur mngan par
33b2(1): 'phags pa/ nor bu rin po che bzo bar rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye ba sa brgyan pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che ba bar bgrangs med pa'i dra bas thos pa rin po che'i rgyal ba mi
