33b3(1): 'pham pa'i sras kyi dris bam yo kun nas gdugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sgra sman pa 'byin pa'i dri'ing dkun nas ldang ba ri po che'i rgyal po dri rnam par gsal bar byed pas dang
33b4(1): bo rna ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing / gnal med khang chen brgyal sna tshogs der stan grangs med cing chad pa bting bar gyur pa 'di lta ste/ pad me'i
33b5(1): snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i pad ma'i snying po can dang / nor bun po che rnam par snang ba'i pad ma'i snying pa can dang / nor du rin po che 'thob
33b6(1): yid du 'ong ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs kyi pad me'i snying po can dang / rin po che seng ge shing rtags kyi pad mo'i snying po can dang
33b7(1): nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i pad ma'i snying pa can dang / nor bu rin po ches rgyan pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pa'i pad me'i snying
33b8(1): po can dang / nor bu rin po che bod kyi rgyan gyi pad mo'i snying pa can dang / nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa'i rin po ches rnam par rgyan pa'i 'od zer kunam
34a1(1): 'byung ba'i pad ma'i snying pa can dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng gas gnon pa'i pad ma'i snying po can dag bshes shing bting bste/ gnal med
34a2(1): chen po'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs de'i bgam mang po yang rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ kha dog bsam gyis
34a3(1): mi khyab par mdzes shing gzugs yid du 'ong bdag go// bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas brgyan pa de steng nas bla re chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs pa ste/ 
34a4(1): 'di ltar gos kyi bla re dang / khri shing gi bla re dang / me tog gi bla re dang / phreng ba'i thar dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang / gser gyi blar
34a5(1): dang / rgyan gyi thar dang / rin po cherdo rje snang ba'i thar dang / glang po shugs dang ldan pas sprul pa'i lha ma'i tha dang / nor bu rin pa che brgya byin mngan par dag
34a6(1): ba'i b+ha re dang / de dag la sngags pa bA re birgya sdang phrag bcus kun nas kheng par byas pa'o// nor bu rin po che 'dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas ldog pa ste/ 'di
34a7(1): ltar rin pa che dam pa 'i dril bu'i dra ba dang / rin pa rgya dbugs kyi dra ba dang / rin pa cha'i 'bru' dra ba dang / mu tig cha mdza'i stong pa'i dra ba dang / nur bu ri
34a8(1): batsho brdargya ldan pa'i nga ba dang / seng shes pa shing gi dra ba dang / ner tha na pa che cha shal gyi rdib dang / sras kyi gzugs kyi dra ba dang / rin ma tshob cing dpa
34b1(1): dang / ngan pa tsha bzeng ba'i dra ba dang / de dag la sngags pa rin pa tshe'i drab brgya stang phrag bcus kun nas g.yog pag// snang bachen pa bcu srang zag
34b2(1): kyang kun nas ga pase/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po chenar ma'i bod zer gyi snang ba dang / rar du rin po che nyi ma'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che zla ba'i rgyal mtshan
34b3(1): ci snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che sras kyi dud pa 'or 'phro ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying pa snang ba ded/ nor bu rin po che bdama'i snying bsnang
34b4(1): bdang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal ma mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin pa che ston mchen po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin pa che brags kun tu rnam par snang ba
34b5(1): snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi sprin chen po dang / glog gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i snang ba dang de dag la stsogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang ba chen po brgya stong drag
34b6(1): bcus rtag tu snang bar byas pa'o// bza' shing gir ba de ni rgyan chen po'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i char 'bab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ dus dang 'thun pa'i
34b7(1): tsan dan gyi sgor brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'jug sgra rab tu 'byung ba/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i phreng ba dang lnga ldi'i sprin chen po kun tu mched pas rab tu chud pa/ lA rdzas
34b8(1): las 'das pa'i gos tshon sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin mngon par 'bab pe lce rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag ba
35a1(1): rnam par klubs pa/ lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu mthong bar dga' ste/ 'og tu lta zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa/ lA rma'i
35a2(1): sprin brgya stong phrag bcu sngon gyi spyad pa'i skal ba mnyam pas rang rang gi lus 'bul ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i srid brgya stong phrag bcu chos can
35a3(1): sem ning bong ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa ste/ de na dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gser gyi snying po'i kho chen po la 'dug cing / mu tig rgya stong mtsho'i snang bab drabs brgyan tha
35a4(1): cad pa thags pa/ lag pa la ldadzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi dbung can dang gdu thu thugs pa/ lag pa dar bu rin po che dpal ni rang bzhin gyi'ang bar gyis rnam par
35a5(1): mdzes par gyur pa/ rna cha rin po che mtho na ting dri ma med pa rab tu phyung ba/ mgo nor bu rin po che'i dra bas mdzes par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong gi rna ba'i
35a6(1): gang rgyan thags pa/ nar bu rin pa che yid bzhin gyi rgyal ba'o babul 'kha thabs pa lus da ba che thams gyi rlabs ma ga cing 'ang rab tu 'bar ba/ 
35a7(1): bye ba khrag khrig gis lus rab tu btud de phyag bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi drang du shar phyogs nas tshangs pa chen po'am tshangs lhan+de phan nam/ 
35a8(1): dbangs su gtogs pa'am/ dbang byed dam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa ris su gtags pa'am/ rab 'phrul dga'a'am/ 'phrul dga'i ris su gtags
35b1(1): ba 'am/ rab dga' ldan nam/ dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ rab mtsha ma 'am/ mtsho ma'i ris su gtags pa'am/ lwab dbang ba'am/ sum
35b2(1): bcu rtsa gsum gyiris su gtogs 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'i dbang po'am/ dri za'am/ grul bum gyi dbang po'am zul du
35b3(1): 'dra/ klu'i dbang ba'am/ klu'am/ lA ma yin mi dbang pa'am/ lha ma yin nom/ namakha' lding gi dbang pa 'am/ mamakha' lding ngam/ mi'am ci'i dbang ba
35b4(1): mi'i mchi'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ gshin rje'i bu zo 'am yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ mi'i dbang po'o
35b5(1): me yang rung ste/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bong ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang ru ba phyogs dang byeng phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang
35b6(1): shar lnga'o phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kun nas kyang tshangs pa chen po
35b7(1): bar/ tshangs lnga nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am/ dbang byed dam/ dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa nas/ mi'i dbang po nas mi'i bar
35b8(1): gyi sems can mang po'ang bde dag nad sna chags shig gis btab bam/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khar tam/ lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogasal
36a1(1): mngon par zhen tam/ las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa zhig yod na'ang / de dag gis dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de mthong ma
36a2(1): thag tu nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ba dang yang thal bar 'gyur/ lnga ba'i gsal shing yang phyin par 'gyur/ sgrib pa
36a3(1): ri thams cad kyang rnam par zhig par 'gyur/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa lang khang du chud par 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil
36a4(1): de yongs ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rab byang bar 'gyur/ dbang po'i mi gu thams cad kyang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yen
36a5(1): gi tshul rgya mtsho la'ang yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya che thams la'ang 'jug par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang tshul rgya mtsho thams ca
36a6(1): kyang mngon gsum du 'gyur/ smon lam gyi sgra thams cad kyang yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ smod pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ yon tan ma
36a7(1): par bsgrub pa'i sgra thams cad kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur/ sems rgya chen po yang mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshul du 'byung bar 'gyur
36a8(1): lus thigs pa med pas thams cad kyang rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ de nas tshong dpon mo dran bzangs bza' shing ging bkun nas rnam par chad pa'
36b1(1): dubyon te bltas na/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin khri bzang po la 'dug pa mthang nas de dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gang na ba der seng ste phyin nas/ dge bsnyen
36b2(1): ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge ba ster ma yid bzhin la lan brgya steng du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas 'di skad smras sa/ 
36b3(1): 'phags ma bdag gis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub dpyi spyad pal bslab par bgyi bdang
36b4(1): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi bam 'tshal te/ 'phag sa ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na/ 'phags mthu
36b5(1): ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol// des smras pa rig
36b6(1): bu kho ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mya ngan med pa bde bde ba'i rgyal mtshan thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de'i mthus mthong na don yod pa'o/ ma
36b7(1): na don yod pa'o// rim bzor byas na don yod bkra/ gnas gcig tu 'grogs pa don yod pa 'i/ rjes su dran par byas pa don du'o/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni
36b8(1): sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs sum zin pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mi dgongs pa rnams kyis ma
37a1(1): @#/ zhing rnam par dmigs par thig lam du'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu kho ma mthong ba tsam gyis ni sems can rnams kyang bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs
37a2(1): nga'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kha mo'i drung du shar phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag byon cing gdan ring po che'i khring 'di la bzhugs nas
37a3(1): chos ston to// shar phyogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu nas kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bsar kha ma ra de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bal bab/ chos
37a4(1): mnyan pa dang mi 'jal ba'o/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bgrogs pa dang mi 'bral ba'o// rigs kyo bu kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya
37a5(1): snang zag brgya bcu rtsa bani po bza' shing gir ba kun nas rnam par brtsan pa 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad gang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
37a6(1): ga pa bstan to// rigs pa thamams can gzhan gang 'din gnas pa de dag 'ablan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las tshur mi ldog pa/ byer pa lji
37a7(1): dge 'dun du gtogs pa shas ga ste/ kha ma dang spyod pa'i sal ba mam pa sha sngags// sbas pa/ 'phags mkhyud kyis than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu la
37a8(1): ji srid kyise nas thugs bgyid/ sbas pa rigs kyi bu kha zas na sngan gyi gnas rdzas su dran ting bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
37b1(1): rgyas mang ma mdzad zhes bya ba byung ba de bzhin gshegs de'i drung du khams tshungs pa'i myang baspyad do/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khams mchod do// de bzhin gas
37b2(1): de las chos bstan pa khams yongs su bzung ngo / de'i sde ral tu de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba byung ste de'i bstan pa la yang kho ma rab tu byung ngo / 
37b3(1): chos kyi 'khor la yang khoms bzung ngo / de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste de yang kho mos bsnyen bkur to/ de'i snga rol tu de bzhin
37b4(1): gshegs pa ri rab dpal zhes bya ba byung ngo / de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa pad me'i snying po zhes bya ba byung ngo / de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
37b5(1): snang mdzad ces bya ba byung ngo / de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba byung ngo / de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa dag pa zhes
37b6(1): bya ba byung ngo / de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gtsug ces bya ba byung ba/ de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo'i lha zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi
37b7(1): bu gzhung de ltar che gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / bsal ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig tu nas gcig tu brgyad pa de bzhin
37b8(1): gshegs pa'i mtshams 'dam chags su bsams te dran par byas na gang kho mos rim bzor byas te bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang sti stang du bya ba dang / 
38a1(1): gang gi spyan sngar kho mos chos thos par gyur pa dang / gang gis bstan pa la khoms tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
38a2(1): chu klung gA gsum bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed rjes su dran te rigs kyi bu de phan chad du kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bstod bkur ba ni de bzhin gshegs
38a3(1): pa rnams kyis mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chad med pa'o// 
38a4(1): rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po'i khongs su 'gro ba thams cad chud pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu sman lam chen pos phyogs bcus
38a5(1): chos kyi dbyings kyi gni zad zad du 'gro bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chang meng pa'i/ rigs kyi bu byams pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par 'gengs
38a6(1): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chad med pa'o/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas zhing thams cad du bskal pa thams cad yongs su bsdus
38a7(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'/ rigs kyi bting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam las phyir mi ldog pas byang chub sas
38a8(1): dang rnams na chad bang pag/ rigs kyi bu bzungs kyis pas kyis 'as pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gsungs kyi tshul khang du chud par byed pas ca
38b1(1): sems dbab rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu ye shes snang ba'i stobs kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul khong du chud par byed cing yang dag par 'dzin pa
38b2(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta
38b3(1): ba bzhin du 'od kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/ rigs kyi bu tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs
38b4(1): kyis tshig gcig rjod kyang 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' dri chung med pa'o// rigs kyi bu lus rnam par dag pas sangs
38b5(1): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus kyis rmas par 'gengs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chad mid pa'o// nor bzangs kyis sdus pa/ 'phags mu khyed kyi
38b6(1): srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste sems can gcig cig la
38b7(1): dmigs shing gdul bar bya ba dang smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin te/ sems can brgya'i phyir ma
38b8(1): yin/ sems can stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya'i
39a1(1): phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig pa
39a2(1): phrag stong gi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/ sems can thams thams kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrag khrig gi nga
39a3(1): ma yin/ sems can gang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can ban bun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can par byar gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bya bying gi phyir ma yin
39a4(1): sems can nyer 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byal byol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ljang ltad kyi phyir ma yin
39a5(1): sems can tshad zim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyang byed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lngapa ldem gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ya gangs kyi ma yin/ sems
39a6(1): can cho ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can khrag khrig kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can na nub kyi byor ba yin/ sems can brgyad las kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
39a7(1): btang yas kyim yin/ sems can bang yir gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gsapa yis kyi phyir ma yin/ sems caldan la brtag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can
39a8(1): mdungs pa sagyings man/ mams can lam lum sa kyang bzhis/ thams can dbang bkyi phying ma med/ thabs can thab thab byor ma tsham mas
39b1(1): da khrig yol gyi phying ma yin/ sems can then bye 'byor pa yin/ sems can 'dra mnyam sabyor ma yin/ sems can zang zeng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'grod la
39b2(1): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyas 'dal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsngo yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zang lag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'gro bkye'i phyir
39b3(1): ma yin/ sems can 'byo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yong than gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'jug yos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ 
39b4(1): can thaMd yug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can snang yal ci phyir ma yin/ sems can nan pa'i ra ma yin/ sems can yid 'phro'i phyir ma yin/ sems can na
39b5(1): ne bkyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'khrig thams kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bzang las kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thugs las kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
39b6(1): can yang yud kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ldag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brda las kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhub pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
39b7(1): tu thug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrig ge'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rig yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snga med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems cad
39b8(1): 'bring gi phyir ma yin/ sems can zhag 'dra'i phyir ma yin/ sems can sru byas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bru 'azer gyi phyir ma lon/ sems can
40a1(1): brjod pas kyi byur ma yin/ sems can ldang yas kyi phyir ma ljin/ sems can rjo bul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ni skyed
40a2(1): phyir ma yin/ sems can ngag thib gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phyo 'gyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyan nyer gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyag byig gi
40a3(1): byer ma yin/ sems can ral zul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sal sal gyi phyir ma min/ sems can g.yo ldeg gi phyir ma yin/ sems can
40a4(1): nra dran gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brdud pa'i phying ma yin/ sems can reng 'drol ze bying ba yin/ sems can rdzi dam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi rdus
40a5(1): byir ma yin/ sems can phun rol gyi phre ma yin/ sems can da la d+hi da/ sems can dang dang kyi phyir ma y-in/ sems can s+yAng rje'i snum+b+ha smin/ 
40a6(1): sems can pa bzang ga phyir mi lIn/ sems can dgang rkyang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can grangs mtha'i phrer ma yin/ sems can tshad rol gyi byer
40a7(1): yin/ sems can 'alo chad kyi byer du med/ sems can gdab yas kyi phyir pa med/ sems can gcal yas ra ma yid/ sems can pa
40a8(1): las kyi byir ma yin/ sems can khyim ze'i phyir ma yin/ sems can sgo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
40b1(1): lngabad+hAd kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ban na drug phyir mA yin/ sems can pa bungs phyir mtshan/ sems can ma 'jal sa byar ma man/ 
40b2(1): rgyu ldong gi glir ma yin/ sems can yun 'amangs kyi phy-i ra ma yin/ sems can mkha' yal b+h+rUM phyir ma yin/ sems can bran lob kyi phyir ba yin/ sems
40b3(1): margyu lem gyi phy-ir ma yAMn/ sems can bsad laso kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lang ling gi phyir ma yin/ sems can lnga pa ldib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
40b4(1): can mi stsal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bya ma yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can da bgrang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can spos yal gyi phyir ma yin/ seMs
40b5(1): rnab bcal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can la rgyas kyi phyir mo yin/ sems can 'bum rdib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can la lo'i phyir ma yin/ sems
40b6(1): can phya ma phyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgras 'phyos las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
40b7(1): dpa g.yos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dgra yas bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yal 'phyong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal 'byor
40b8(1): las bkres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal gyi byor ma yin/ sems can mu la la las bsdus pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bzang
41a1(1): mi phyir ma yin/ sems can bzang tshul las brdzes pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal
41a2(1): bsdus pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsapa byang kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyed las sbas pa'i phying ba yin/ sems can mtha' 'brum gyi phyir mchin
41a3(1): sems can mtha' 'byam las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thag las bsres pa'i phyir ma yin// 
41a4(1): sems can rjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rjod du med pa las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i phyir
41a5(1): yin/ sems can rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa las bsgos pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa rnams kyi phyir
41a6(1): ma yin/ rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi/ 
41a7(1): bI rdul shin tu ma bsnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu rtsa ba snyed
41a8(1): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems rten rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu the snyed kyi 'jig rten
41b1(1): khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rteran gyi khams
41b2(1): su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rjod de med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu
41b3(1): phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/ yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems
41b4(1): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin te/ 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa lhag pa med pa mtha' dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems car
41b5(1): rnams kyi don du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas gcig zhe
41b6(1): bkur ba dang mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim 'gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcu
41b7(1): bskyed bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mdzad cing rim 'gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ rjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
41b8(1): shin tu za ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas bskyed bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim 'grong bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu
42a1(1): pa ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi brgyad bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing
42a2(1): rim 'gror bya ba'i phyir ba yin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de banin
42a3(1): gshegs pa'i brgyad bskyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim 'gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye bam
42a4(1): yin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 'jig rten
42a5(1): khams rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
42a6(1): sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skyeb
42a7(1): mayin pa nas/ sangs rgyas ning rnyed du ba pa yang brjeng du zad pa'i rdul zin tu pra ba skyed kyir bzhin gshegs pa'i bstadan pa yongs su bzung ba'i phyirang byang chub ma
42a8(1): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig tu zhugs pa'i sman lam rnams par tha dad pa la 'jug pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa
42b1(1): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa'i rdul shin du za bskyed kyi sangs rgyas rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa
42b2(1): dad pa la 'jug pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skyeb pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig tu gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing girgyan la
42b3(1): 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skyo ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du me dnga'i rdul
42b4(1): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma sa
42b5(1): sangs rgyas gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub du skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 
42b6(1): sangs rgyas kyi ni rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu ma bsnyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dang
42b7(1): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu rtse pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bas
42b8(1): zang byung skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu ze bsnyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo log
43a1(1): gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho gcig khang du rur
43a2(1): bang bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa'i ltung brjod du zad pa'i rdul shin tu phra
43a3(1): bsred kyi sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dang
43a4(1): pa'i 'khor lo yongs shes par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa ras/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa'i yang
43a5(1): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed / sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang
43a6(1): chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang po rgyamache khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpo' rnabs kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa
43a7(1): nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du byed pa'i rdul shin tu za bo snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang brgya ma cha khang du chud par byu ba'i phyir drung
43a8(1): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu rtsi ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcigag bskal ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pal 'om
43b1(1): par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ni rgyud du med pa'i yang brjod du zad pa'i rdul
43b2(1): shin tu za ba snyed kyi 'jog rten gyi khams gcig gi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phrer byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa
43b3(1): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rlugs kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug pa
43b4(1): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten
43b5(1): gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams
43b6(1): kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug
43b7(1): bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul
43b8(1): tum bsnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad li rab tu 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems
44a1(1): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad
44a2(1): la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ning rjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
44a3(1): tuza ba snyeng kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad pa las rgya mtshal 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang
44a4(1): chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtshathams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub
44a5(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu rtse ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ning rjod du bod pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba spyod kyi 'jog rten
44a6(1): gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang
44a7(1): chub tu skye ba ma yin no/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa lhag ma mang pa'i mtha' dag thams cad yongs su srin par za ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub
44a8(1): sems dpa ba rnams kyi sems byang chub tu sgeg// sangs rgyas pakres pa thams cad bsnyen bgrar zhing mchis par bya ba dang / mtsha cing rim 'thar bya
44b1(1): phyir byang chub mams dpa' mas kyisems cung chub tu mag/ 'dzag rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams ca drug dgas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi d+hAng myur ba cung nga
44b2(1): par bya ba dang mchod cing rim 'gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sman lam la mngon par mos pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thabs
44b3(1): cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa brten par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma lus pa thams cad yongs
44b4(1): su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sa mas dpa'i rnams kyi sbyar ba 'byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnams pa tha dad pa ba lus pa thangs
44b5(1): cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi shugs drag po skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
44b6(1): tan gyi rgyad ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yi ma brtan pa skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'a
44b7(1): mi dkyil 'khor rtsa mtsha ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par mas pa 'byung ba yin/ bzo nga se
44b8(1): rgya mtshom lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sman lam yongs su skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po'i ma
45a1(1): ma lus pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po rgya ma
45a2(1): ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spro ba skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi bskal pa gcig
45a3(1): nas gcig tu brgyud pal 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dang ba rnams kyi mos pa skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bachags kyi cham
45a4(1): sbyor ba yongs su gcod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyar
45a5(1): snyam pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes chen po'i nyi ma 'char ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir byang
45a6(1): chub sems dpa ba rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba 'byung ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems
45a7(1): dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i sprin chen po kun nas 'du ba yin/ rigs kyi bu 'dor na de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshul dang / skra grangs med pa brgya stong phrag
45a8(1): bcu dag byang chub sems rnams kyis yongs su sgrub par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni ye shes khong
45b1(1): chung bar bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhal bab/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa ni yongs su dag par za ba'i phyir zhing thams cad la
45b2(1): dgra par gnol ba'o// rigs kyi bude lte bas na khams ni bdag gi smon lam na mkha'i dbyings rnams par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par sheg
45b3(1): ga/ bdag gi sman lam 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du ga pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig/ bdag gi smon lam sems can thams cad
45b4(1): kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi marnams sbyar ba dang bag la nyal gyi mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig ces de ltar smon lam btab bo// 
45b5(1): smras pa/ 'phags ma rnam par thar pa 'di'i ming n+do zhes bgyi/ sbas pa/ rigs kyi ze rnam par thar pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i bde ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya
45b6(1): bste/ rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de gcig pu shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag
45b7(1): par 'dzin pa'i phyir/ sems rgya mche dang ldan pa/ lhag 'i bsam pa brtan pa rI rab dang 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu sos par byed
45b8(1): pa'i phyir/ sman gyi rgyal po mthong na legs pa lta ba sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi khams
46a1(1): pa'i gnas su gyur pas sa lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed pa'i phyir rlung dugyur pa/ sems can thams cad la ye shes
46a2(1): kyi snang ba 'byin pa'i phyir bar mer gyur pa/ zhi ba'i sgras sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi char yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'bebs pa'i sprin du gyur pa/ bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi dra
46a3(1): ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir zla ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i phyir brgya byin lta bu/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am yon tan brjod pa'am// 
46a4(1): byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa smos pa ba ma/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi rnam pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston par nus res
46a5(1): rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa 'di nyid na yul chu ba gcang ba zhes bya yod de/ de na drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs zhes bya ba 'dug gis
46a6(1): de'i gar du song la dris shig dang des rigs kyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge ba ster ma yid
46a7(1): bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen pa yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du bang g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dgra yang bltas te phyag
46a8(1): 'tshal das mchi mas gang bar dus te/ byang chub mchog tu dkon pa rjes su sems shing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rim 'gro bya ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / 
46b1(1): sras bu dam pa dang zung ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dnga'i dbang bzab par bya brjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dngapa bsru
46b2(1): yongs su dag pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / skal ba mnyam pa'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub tu yang dag pa ji lta
46b3(1): drabang na bar mas shing sems nges par gnag pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul rjes su bstan pa'i sbyor ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa
46b4(1): sems dri ma med cing mi 'grus pa'i sbyor ba yang dag par bsgrub pa dka' ba rjes su bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par skyed pa'i
46b5(1): chos kyi snang ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa byed cing / dge bsten pa yid bzhin gyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa
46b6(1): gdams ngag gi rjes su srid pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyang po yongs su dag par bya ba'i rjes su sang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub
46b7(1): sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i shugs drag pos rab tu snang bar byas pa'i sems
46b8(1): dang ldan pa/ chos kyi tir thob par bya ba la shugs drag po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs drag po rab tu
47a1(1): 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis
47a2(1): snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mun pa med par rnam par lta ba'i sems dang
47a3(1): ldan pa/ rdo rje rin po che mthu bo ches mi chos pa ltar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' bla'i sems dang ldan pa/ de nga
47a4(1): gyis mul chub gtsang ma ga le bder dbyin nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dablangs rgyal tshal ba las/ de'i cha rjeng srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs dge pa'i sbyang ba'i gnas shing
47a5(1): phran sna tshogs grangs med pa'i nags tshal mdangs dga' ba lo mas rgyas pa'i shing gis kun nas dkrigs pa/ rtag tu me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i shing sna tshogs can rtag tu shing
47a6(1): tog meng po ldan pa'i shing tog gi shing dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing drung nor bu rin pa che'i srang laM ba kyis rtag tu gshi bas pa dang ldan pa/ can dan dwa
47a7(1): kun nas rnam par zos pa/ a ka rI yid du bong ba'i shing las rdzas kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bas rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhinas shing pata le rnam par mdzes
47a8(1): sa nges yongs su brgyan pa/ de'i gang nga byibs gan du me du'ang ba dang ldan pa/ ba ma tho'i shing las rtog tu shing rtag smon pa 'dul ba/ me rtag gi
47b1(1): bang ba dang / srung ba la gsar na smras pas rab tu brtan pa zhi ga 'dug 'dug na/ chang dpan ma bu ra ba'adas kyis drang srung 'jigs mchog dbyangs rlung sang snang sa
47b2(1): bcas bskor cing can dang gyi yal gshin tu 'phel ba'i bya sgribs shig na/ thar rmugs cod pan can lpags pa dang rtswa'i gas son pa/ nga shun gyi spang lcags na
47b3(1): rab stan la 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs ga la ba der sang ste phyin nas yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang zad pa'i bsam
47b4(1): pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yang dag pa'i lam ston pas thams dmakhyen pa nyid 'byung ba'i sgo yin par yang dag par lta/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la gzhog pas
47b5(1): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che'i gling du skyel bas thams
47b6(1): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i pa skyes gnyen gyi mnyam pa la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ stabs bcu'i ye shes snang ba yang dgra par skyed pas thams cad pa
47b7(1): ba nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis sgron mas snang bar bya ba yin par yang dag par lta/ nyam nyes pa med par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong du phyin par byed pas
47b8(1): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yongasu ston pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mar
48a1(1): be ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ grwa yang sa'i 'jigs pa thabs cad med par byed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
48a2(1): stegs dri dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis sim pa yongs su skyed pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdug
48a3(1): ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ snying rjes chen po yongs su skyed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen
48a4(1): yin par yang dag par lta zhings kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsal bar mthong ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag
48a5(1): lus par mthong nas/ lus thams cad kyis pha ba ste phyag byas nas langs te drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas na
48a6(1): mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyis yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rjod de 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag
48a7(1): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i skud pa la bsgrub par bzhi pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du pa
48a8(1): bam 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gangam ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub
48b1(1): sems dngas zang chub sams dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsal// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchogang grangs su
48b2(1): bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag la bltas te 'di skad ces sbas so// byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu seM
48b3(1): bskyed de/ sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med pal bzon du gnyer to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sa gon du gnas
48b4(1): pasaM/ ye shes rgya mtsho la mngon du gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin+da gyi char btung bar 'dod pa'o// chos kyi tshul rnga mtsho thams cad
48b5(1): 'jug par 'dod pa'o// ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'dod pa'o/ snying rje chen po'i sprir bsdu bar 'dod pa'o/ chos kyi char chen po mngon par dab
48b6(1): par 'dod pa'o// ye shes chen po'i zla ba 'jig rten du shar bar byas te nyan mongs pa'i gdung ba thams ca dru gnil bar 'do pa po/ sems can thams cad kyi dge
48b7(1): ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'dod pa'o// de nas bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag gis me tog dri zhim la yid du 'ong zhing kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang po che dag
48b8(1): kyi bu nor bzangs la gtor te/ mngon par gtor tor ba tu gtor to/ mngon par phyag 'tshal te de ltar btud de phyag 'tshal nas g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas
49a1(1): / te tshig 'di skad ces badz+ra dang / 'di skams can thams cad yongs su slob par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
49a2(1): thams ca dngabatu ni bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/ tshul seng ge sgra gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i 'jig rten kyi las
49a3(1): rgyud thams cad rnam par jug par 'gyur ro/ 'a khobya pa'i ma thams ca dag cing bar 'gyur ro/ sred pa'i rgya mche yongs su sems par 'gyur ro/ sred pa
49a4(1): batshong bgad par 'gyur ro/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par zlog par 'gyur / marig pa'i phun pa sel bar 'gyur ro/ bsod rnams kyi 'khar lus
49a5(1): 'jig rten yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas yongasu ston par 'gyur ro/ ye shes kyi nyi ma 'char bar bcad par 'gyur ro/ chos
49a6(1): kyi mig rnam par sbyang bar 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten rnams la mnyam po yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis byis pade/ 
49a7(1): dgul 'a sa d+his smras so// zlos pa dag gang gis bla za ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i zung chub tu sems zed ba spyad pa de byang chub sems dpa'i sgyus
49a8(1): spong ngo/ sems can thams cad bang b.rab tu sred de/ rimagyim thams cad bzan pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro// byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis
49b1(1): blun zer pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems srung ba ste/ de bas ni 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yon+da tan thams cad kyis yongs su sbyang bar 'gyuraro/ 
49b2(1): de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis tshong dpon gyi bu nar bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha
49b3(1): pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan thob pa'o// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di'i yul ji ltar du
49b4(1): nig mchis// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mgo la byugs nas lag pa g.yas
49b5(1): pas gzung ngo // tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pas gzung ma thag tu de'i mod la tshong dpon gyi bu nor
49b6(1): bzangs kyis phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong bar gyur te/ de dag gi de bzhin gshegs
49b7(1): ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drang na bdag nyid 'dug par shes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang
49b8(1): rnam pa grangs med par rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan par mthong ngo // de dag ni'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs can
50a1(1): rgyun rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag khod par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de dag na dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra mtshan
50a2(1): dang dpe byad bzangs po 'bar bas brgyan pa dge bzhugs pa mthong ngo / de dag las kyang tshig dang yi ge gcig las kyang phyir phyogs pa med par chos bstan
50a3(1): pacan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres par yang dag par 'dzin to// chos kyi sbyin gyi char sems can gyi bas
50a4(1): pa sna tshogs la 'bab pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam mos pa sna tshogs kyi stobs kyis rnam par
50a5(1): sbyangs pa rgya mtsho la yang zhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsdu ba smon lam sna tshogs rgya mtshos rnam par dag pa rgya mtsho de dag la'ang zhugs so// 
50a6(1): sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog sems can gyi bsam ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur ba rnam par dmigs par de dag kyang mthong ngo / sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'dod
50a7(1): chags dang dral po sna tshogs kyis rnam par dag 'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi stobs de dag la'ang ye shes kyi snang ba'i sgrib pa med pa dang
50a8(1): ldan pas zhugs so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi bar gyis sdang bar gyur pa ting nge 'dzin rnam par sa
50b1(1): mdzad kyi snying po snang ba rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes mi zad pa'i rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa/ gzungs kyi sgo snang ba phyogs kun gyi dra ba rab tu thob pa/ gzungs
50b2(1): kyisku rdo rje'i snying pos sems rab tu gsal bar byas pa ting nge 'dzin ye shes brtsegs pa rnam par phye ba'i yul la rnam phye ba rab tu thob pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam
50b3(1): par spyod pa gzhi kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po yul du gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba sangs rgyas na mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa ting nge 'dzin
50b4(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mu khyud kyis sems rab tu snang bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dus gsum gyi ye shes rin po che mi zad pa'i dkyil
50b5(1): 'khor la rab tu brtson pa des de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung dri ni nyin zhag gcig lon par shes so// la la ni nyin zhag bdun lo snyam/ la lar
50b6(1): ni zab phyed lon po snyam/ la lar ni zla ba gcig lon pa snyam/ la la re no lo gcig lon pa snyam/ laR+Ya ni lo brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo sdong lon pa snyam/ 
50b7(1): lar ni lo brgya stong phrag lon pa snyam/ la ltar nI lo bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba brgya lon pa sAm/ la lar ni lo bye ba stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni ma
50b8(1): bye ba khrag khrig stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa phyed lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa gcig lon pa snyam/ 
51a1(1): pas na /  sa ba sna/  thams rdul da / ladu bskul pa rtsamag gangs du smra/ 
51a2(1): ni bskul brtse ba la pas pa/ la ldang bsal brje badz+ra gA brgya ma dang sgrub ya la ni bskal ba ze baphrag snying la na pa snyam/ lA lang ni bskal dbye
51a3(1): nga ba blas laltu dri mas pazlab 'ag ga rkyen chen pang yin pas pa/ zung du nas dbazhin gzugs pa la la'i zhabs drung du bam
51a4(1): brjod de med pa'i yang brjod du med pa lon par gyur pa snam byed / de bzhir gshegs pa la lnga'i nabs kyi drung du ni bskal pa 'jam bu gling gi rdul shin du
51a5(1): yin pa sam pa nas bskal bsangs rgyas kyi rnyeng rnyeng du med pa'i yang brjod du zad pa'i rdul shin du ma bskyed payin pa snam byed par 'gyur // de nas
51a6(1): slong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis tshang dpon gyi bu ni bzangs btang ba dang / des yang bdag drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi mdun na 'dug par shes
51a7(1): bar zad de// de la drang sring 'jigs mchog ngas kyis smras pa rigs pa badzin med smras pa/ 'phags pa dag po'i shes gnyen gyi byin gyi brlabs
51a8(1): mingan no// sbas pa/ rigs kyi dri kha bas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thad pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub
51b1(1): sems dpa' 'azo ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dus thams cad du chos kyi 'a
51b2(1): lo bskor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang ye shrIs mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i nyi ma la rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan rab tu
51b3(1): 'god pa/ dus gsum gyi yul skad cig gcig gi ye shes su yang dag par sdud pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par bkram pa/ chos
51b4(1): kyi dbyings thams cad la ye shes snang ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa/ sems cani thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon gsum du mngon par langs pa/ 
51b5(1): sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta bzhin du spyod pas rnam par dpyid pa dang 'thun pa'i tshul dang ldan pa 'dod pa bzhin du kun tu snang zhing dri ma med po 'od dang ldan pa'i ye
51b6(1): shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am yon tan rjod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par smos pa'am zhing gi mngon par 'du bya ba shes pa'am
51b7(1): ye shes kyi yul la 'jug par bya ba'am ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi rjesu 'azang bar bya ba'am rdzu 'phrul drud rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba'am
51b8(1): rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su 'azang bar bya ba'i lus rnam par phye ba'i mtshan ma gzung bar bya ba'i/ dbyangs kyi dkyi
52a1(1): pa su par dag brjod pan la sa pa snang b.rab tu bas pang dus ren sang rigs kyi yul phyogs kyi rgyud 'di cid na
52a2(1): yul yongasu tshol ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang
52a3(1): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la srab par bya ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas chang dpon gyi bu dang bzangs dgapa rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde
52a4(1): tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes ras drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi nabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te drang srong 'jigs dbyungs la lan brgya stong du ma
52a5(1): g.yas phyogasu skor ba byas nas yang dang yang ltas te drang song 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi drung nas song ngo // bam pa dgu bcu go gsum pa// 
52a6(1): denam tshong dpon gyi nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis ye shes kyis sdang bar byas pa/ sangs rgyas
52a7(1): tshul marnam par 'phrul pa bsamams ma khyab pa la mngan sum du rnam par spyod pa/ zad d+hA snams dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsamachis pa khyab pa
52a8(1): mdon sum rtso ma shes kyis mngan par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpe'i ting nge 'dzin pas bachis ma khyab pa'i ye shes kyis sems snang bar gyur pa/ 
52b1(1): dus thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa'i
52b2(1): ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes snang bla thob pa thams cad kyi rjes su
52b3(1): song ba'i spyod yul la rnam par spyod pa/ mngon tu gyur pa gnyis su rnam par rtog pa med pas mnyam po nyid du bstan pa'i ye shes lhur len pa/ dmigs
52b4(1): pa thams cad la rab tu 'dal ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/ mnyen pa thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i bzod pa rnam par dag lams pa'i mdzod la
52b5(1): mkhas pa/ rang bzhin gyi chos la bzod pa khong du chung ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin
52b6(1): bsgom pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu'i ye
52b7(1): shes snang ba'i 'darab tu thab pa/ chos kyi dbyings brjod pa la mngon par mas pas ngoms pa med pa'i sems dang ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par
52b8(1): sbyang ba'i myang yul la 'jug pa/ khong du chud pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spong ba'i rgyan mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i mas
52'a1(1): rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa gzugs kyis srung ba phyogs pamaching ba rab tu thob pa gsus kyi rje'i snang pos sems
52'a2(1): gsal bar byas pa ting nge 'dzin ye shes brtsegs pa rnam par bye ba'i yul la rnam par phye ba rab tu thob pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyong pa/ gni kun nas
52'a3(1): rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po yul du gyur pa ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba sangs rgyas nam mkha'i da bying snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams
52'a4(1): cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mu khyud kyis sems rab tu snang bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dus gsum gyi ye shes rin po che'i mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor ba rang
52'a5(1): cu brtson pa de bzhin gshegs pal la'i nabs drung du nini ni nags gcig lon par shes so// la lar ni nyini nag bdun lon pa snyam/ la lar ni zla gcig lon pa snyam/ 
52'a6(1): lalar ni lo gcig lon pasnam/ la lar ni lo brgya lon pa snyam/ pa lAr ni lo song bon bskum/ la lar ni lo brgya thAg stong ldan pa snyam/ la lar ni la bye ba / 
52'a7(1): yon+da pa snam+b+ha/ la lar ni lo bye ba brgya thag song lan pa snam/ pha lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig lon pa snyam/ pA lar ni skal ba bye ba yin pa snam/ ba lar ni bsal pa
52'a8(1): gcig lon pa snam/ la lar ni bsal pa brgya lon pa stim/ la lar ni bskal pa sdong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal brgya phrag song lon pa snam/ la lar ni bsal/ 
52'b1(1): babye ba lon pa snyam pa lang ni bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya stong lon pa snum/ la lar bsal po rtse ba zag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa zag stong mag sbyong ban/ 
52'b2(1): pa snam la lar ni bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong lon pa snam byed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zha bas drung du bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
52'b3(1): med pa snyed lon par 'gyur ba snam byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i nabs kyi drung du ni bskyal ba 'jam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba steng lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ 
52'b4(1): bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi ning brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed lon par snam byed par gyur to// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis tshong dpon gi bu nor
52'b5(1): zangs btang ba dang / des yang dag drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyings kyi mdun na 'dug par shes par gyur ro// de la drang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs kyis smras pa/ 
52'b6(1): rigs kyi bu dran mos sbas pa 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis dran no// smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam mthar gan/ 
52'b7(1): gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i
52'b8(1): ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dus thams cad du 'khor lo bskor ba sangs rgyas mtshan dang ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i nyi ma
53a1(1): la rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyunar bru tu 'bod pa dus gsum gyi phu'u srad cig gcig gi yo shes su yang dag par bsdus pa/ 
53a2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus shin du rnam par bkram pa chos dbyings thams cad la snang ba'i bzhin dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
53a3(1): ji lta bu bzhin du mngon sum du mngon par langs pa sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin spyod pas rnam par dpyod pa dang 'thun pa'i tshul dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa
53a4(1): bzhin du snang zhing drim mo pa la 'od dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am yon tan brjod pa 'am/ smon lam gi khyad
53a5(1): par smon pa 'am zhing gi mngon par 'du bya ba shes pa 'am/ ye shes kyi yul la 'jug par bya ba'am/ 'di nge 'dzin gi sbyong yul gi rjes su 'brang bar bya
53a6(1): 'am rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par brtse ba'i rjes su 'azang bar bya
53a7(1): ba'am lus rnam par phye ba'i mtshar mya b.rung bar b+ha ba 'am/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod pa 'am/ bre shes kyi snang bar rabatu bsnang bar
53a8(1): nus res ni/ sang rigs kyi bra lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyi na yul yongs su tshol banas bya ba mdzod/ de na rngam ze rgyal ba'i dzin gyi skye mched ces bya ba
53b1(1): 'angagan du sangal slar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dnga'i byang pa la bslab par bya ba dang / 'gyur nam nadu \u0f7fbadzi / 
53b2(1): dan gi zla nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mgu 'ang nyams bdel tshim ming bde ba skyes nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog stangs kyi rkang pa la spyi bos phyag 'chal
53b3(1): drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la lan brgya srong du mar g.yas su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang lhas te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi drung nas
53b4(1): song // 'phags pa sangs rgyas phul po che zhes bya ba/ bam po dgu bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang ste byang/ 
53b5(1): chub sems dpa'i rnam par gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i mtshan gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byas pa sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab/ 
53b6(1): ba la mngon sum du rnam par spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab mngon sum gyi ye shes kyis mngon par shes pa/ 
53b7(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyis sems snang bar gyur pa/ dus thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin
53b8(1): gyi ye shes snang bar rab tu thob pa/ ye shes kyi rnam pa thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyis snang bar gyur pa 'gro ba thams cad
53'a1(1): dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa/ rnam par sbyangs pa'i sems dang lda ba/ 'jig rten
53'a2(1): gyi khams kyi dang mi zad pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mtha' dang dpung med pa mngon tu gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par
53'a3(1): bad / gdul bar bya ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyong yul mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'a
53'a4(1): rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam pa thA dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rjer gyi khams rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par
53'a5(1): blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dmigs pa phra ba dang / yangs pa'i khongs su chud par bya ba la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
53'a6(1): khams kyig ni mtha' yas pa'i ming gi dra ba sna tshogs yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su rnam par spyad pa rnam pa gdags pa mtha' yas pa
53'a7(1): kyang rdzob rnam pa tha dad pal yang dag par blte ba dang / sems can gyimis pa sna tshogs mtha' las pa yang dag bor bal ba dang / sems rnam par byed
53'a8(1): rnam pa pa da pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba khang du chud par bya bal
53'b1(1): yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can dang phyogs dang dus mtha' yas pa'i ming gi rnam pa sku tshogs la yang dag par blta ba dang / dgu pa'i bshes gzhan
53'b2(1): mngon tu bya ba byed cing mthar gyis yul tshol ba dang ldan pa gdun pa dang / bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched dag lbu ba der phyin to// de'i tshe bram ze rgyal ba'i drang
53'b3(1): kyi skye mched thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bslab pa'i ga ni byas shing dka' thub drag po la spyod de/ de'i phyogs bzhi nas mo'i phung po ri tsam du che babus pa dang / 
53'b4(1): shin tu mtho ba'i g.yang sa'i lam gyi rgyud swA gri'i sos gshibs pas 'khor byar snang ngo // de nas tshong dpyon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis bam+bu ze rgyal ba'i rdo bya
53'b5(1): mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang ngo / 
53'b6(1): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'ja
53'b7(1): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gang ma dang / rjes su bstan pa badzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chuchu
53'b8(1): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bsrab dbyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol// des sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu song la spu gri'i so dang ba'i ri
54a1(1): 'di la 'dzag sa/ za' babs 'di mtshang sa shig dang / des kyang / zung chubasems dpa'i zad pa yangs su ngan pang chung pa
54a2(1): nas nas chung bar gyi bu rang bablangs 'disnyam du sems par gyur te/ mi kham pa brgyad las dang byang yang shi ming zung de/ kha bye du
54a3(1): rdzogs rnam par dag pa yang shin tu ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang shin tu dbyung ba ts+tsha pa me med po 'a shi byed / sangs rgyas kyi chos thos
54a4(1): pa yang 'di du dkan/ skyes bu dam pa dang phrad pa yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag pa dag 'a'i bra sgyu gnar yang nyid tu dkong+ge/ yang dag pa'i rdul rjes su
54a5(1): pas legs der snang pa ya shin du dkun/ yang dag par 'tsho bar bye bang shir drung / nga'i 'jig rte nu rjes nga sa nyir ba rna la da dun byed pa me shi
54a6(1): d+hA/ deskyed bar rnying bdag ga da ba bya n+ya t+pal nugs la/ dal du ba ga ga sugs dbang 'dzu pa 'di badru dang pa cig pa me na pa/ 'du
54a7(1): snu bcu byas pa'am/ bad kyiras su gdugs pa'am/ dge nga shes kyin skung rngu smra pa'ang/ bye hUM bsems dpa' se sa gamed
54a8(1): mi mi la pa bdag gi sems pa margyad pa shi la bsasas bye rje dzin /  ge
54b1(1): pa zhig pa yin grang / bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la bgegs byed ni ga ma yin grang snyam nas/ de de ltar sems shing yid
54b2(1): la byed pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcu stod gi bar snang la gnas te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i sems mi brtan par ma byed cig/ rim
54b3(1): kyi bya 'phags pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'ad 'phro ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa ste/ brtson 'grus ldog pa med pa'o// brtsams pa chen po mthur dbyung ba la nas
54b4(1): pa'i// 'gro ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i rnyan bskam pa la mngon por brtson pa'o// lte ba'i rnam pa dang dra ba thams cad btub pa la brtson pa'o// nyon mongs
54b5(1): pa'i lhagu ldog thams cud zad par ba sreg pa la sta gon tu gnas pa'o// mi khom mi shis pa'i bas mtha' dgon pa thams cad snang bar bya ba la brtson pa'o// 
54b6(1): sems can thams cad kyi rga shi'i g.yang sa dang / 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa la/ yid ma brtan pa'o// dus gsum gyi mun pa bsal ba la mngon pa
54b7(1): brtson pa'o/ chos thams cad kyi 'od zer dkye ba la zhugs pa'o/ rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ tshangase
54b8(1): pa ji snyed cig mkhan po dang / dbang sgyur ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bor rang rang rlom zhing sems pa lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen
58a1(1): cang la ltos pa med par bya ba'i bu'i chos ston no// chos shes pa'i sems su bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skyed pa dang / 
58a2(1): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu rdo ba par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// rab che ma'i lha'i rgyal ba
58a3(1): stong brag bcu lnga'i bung ngo / lha'i bu ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis kyang kyang lga rdzas me tog mAn+dA ra ba'i char mngon par pha ba ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzer/ 
58a4(1): rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang lha rdzas kyi glu snyan pa la dga' ba med do// de ltar dga' ba med pas
58a5(1): 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
58a6(1): rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin stong phrag bcu nas nye ba'i dbang po cu rtsa gnyis dang / lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas wA
58a7(1): rdzas kyi gos dang rin po che'i rgyan dang me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par pha bsti/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad
58a8(1): pa'i tshe bdag cag kyang rgyan gyi khang pa dang bza' shing gi ra ba dang / rtse ba'i nags tshas dang lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdungs pa dang / bkrol ba dang gam yon glu len pa'i
58b1(1): stong la dka' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dod do/ bdag cag der phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo rtags 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams
58b2(1): cad yongs su spang ba'i phyi'i chos ston to/ 'di dag thams cad ni rtag pa ma yin te mi brlan zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do// dregs pa dang
58b3(1): med pa thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba bskyed pa'i phyir chos ston to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'dis lngas pa tsam gyis ri rab kyi rtse mo
58b4(1): thams cad kyang g.yo bar 'gyur te/ des bdag cag gtsangs pas sems skyo bar 'gyur nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rten pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su
58b5(1): smon lam mngon par grub po/ klu'i rgya la shugs ldan dang / dga' bo dang banyin dga' bo la stsogs pa klu brgya stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la gnas shing dra/ 
58b6(1): dang 'thun pa'i lha rdzas kyi tsana? dan gyi sde ni dang klu'i bu mo glu blangs pa'i nga ro stan pa'i dbyangs dang / lha rdzas kyi spos chu'i rgyun ra ba tu 'bab pa'i char mngon par phra ba ste/ 
58b7(1): 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' 'ju ba lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe me'i phung po chen po 'di las 'od chen po 'byung ste/ nges
58b8(1): klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas bye ba'i char dang nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa yongs su sel to// khro ba 'byung ba yang zhi bar rma byas te las sim pa
59a1(1): zas nas yang shin tu mos par byed do// de ltar sems shin tu mos par 'gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la tshas/ 
59a2(1): ston te/ 'di ltar klu'i las kyi rgyu dang na ba rnam par spang ba dang / sgrib pa'i las thams cad rab tu sang ba'i phyiranyes pa 'chags su bcud cing bla na med pa yang dag
59a3(1): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'phong ngo // gnod sbyin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu yang nam mkha' 'i
59a4(1): dbying sAl 'khod de/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bram ze rgyal brjod kyi skye mched dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs pa mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzin
59a5(1): rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dag 'dzub lngas yongs su gdung mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi 'khor kun kyang mi rnams la byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ 
59a6(1): gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / zul bum thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan cing 'tshe ba med pa la zhugs pa
59a7(1): rnams kyi ba / kha ba cag kyang dar rnams pa'id byang gis pa'i gyis nadapas rang gi gnas dang dang sa rme 'a byu nga/ na pa
59a8(1): ma ra kyisu ze kho dang bcas la mamags 'a 'a du na thags pa bangag can thang dzangs pa rnams pas 'bags pa 'a
59b1(1): b+hang ba'i 'od kyi lus thams cad kyang snang bar byas shing bde bas khyab par mdzad / de ltar bdag cag lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas/ 'phags
59b2(1): po 'di ni ci nas kyang bdag cag pa gnod sbyin dang / lus sbrul po mang po byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de ltar chos brtson to// dri zla'i dbang ba
59b3(1): phyag bcu dag kyang steng gi bur snang la 'khod nas 'di skad ces 'dzer/ rigs kyi bu kho bo cog kyang rang rang gi nas na 'khod pa'i tshe 'phags pa 'di dka' thubalngas
59b4(1): yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i ma'i bring po snong 'da' byung ste bdag cag gi bdag cag ci nas blan meng bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byA mi ldogs par 'gyur ba/ 
59b5(1): de ltar chos ston to// lnga'i ma yini gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang rgya mtsho la nas mngon par 'thon te/ nam mkha' la gnas pa snang bar 'gyur ro// de
59b6(1): bdag cag 'od ngas pog ste bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ldan par gyur pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dod sa/ bdag cag rdud du phyin nas kyang 'phags
59b7(1): ba 'di ni pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te ral mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa'ing dka' thub lngas yongs
59b8(1): su 'dun pa mdzad pa'i cha/ kho bo cag gi lA ma yin gyi 'jig non rgya mtsho dang ring bcas pa'i sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur te/ bangs
60a1(1): cag kur gyi rgyab dang / rlom sems dang dregs pa thams cad kyi brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub kyi rdul kyis nan
60a2(1): 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dod do// der phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la g.yo sgyu thams cad ra ba tu srung ba dang / chos za ba ma'i bzed pa bzung
60a3(1): dang mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid la rab tu dgod pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos ston no// nam mkha'i lding gyi dbang po shugs
60a4(1): po 'dzin pa la stsogs pa nam mkha'i lding gi dbang po stong phrag bcus kyang bram ze'i bu shon tu su gu'i gzugs su mngon par sprul te 'di skad ces 'dzer te/ rigs kyi
60a5(1): bu 'phags po 'di dka' thu ba lnga sa yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag las 'od chen po byung ste bdag cag gi gnas snang bar byas nas yongasu
60a6(1): g.yol ba med do// nges bdage cag kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste skyo ba'i ya dang ldan par gyur nas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // 'phags pa 'di yang bdag
60a7(1): cag la mos ston cing byams pa chen po la yang dag pUr sna pa mdzad do// snying rje rkyen po yang dag dgongs pa mdza do// 'khor ba'i rgyu mtshor 'jug pa la 'ang dang
60a8(1): dag par sbyor ba mdzad do// 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i sems can mngon par 'don bye ba la yang yongs su sbyong ba mdzad do// lhag pa'i bsame pa'i sgo rnam pa
60b1(1): dag par b+ha be pa yang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do// zhes rab kyi dang tha bas shin tu gas lnga ba yang dag par sbyor bar mdzad do// rnam pa ji ci lta bar yongs su sman
60b2(1): pa'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba la 'ang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do// mi 'am ci'i dbang po stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod de 'di skad ces
60b3(1): 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dkA'athub lngas yongs su gdung bar mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi gnas na 'khor ba'i shing ta'i ba'i 'phreng
60b4(1): ba las dra'i bu'i dra ba ra ni che'i srad pu swa lnga lngar bAr+g+ha sa pa'i sal+li snyun dang / rol mo'i yo byud dang rirI po che'i rgyan dang / khyami gyi longs spyod thams cad las
60b5(1): spangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo // chos kyi sgra dang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi sgra dang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam
60b6(1): gyi sgra 'byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa'i ming ngang 'di zhes bya ba zhig byang chub tu smon lam 'debs
60b7(1): so/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ga mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' ming dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig dga' ba yongs su gtong ba byed do// 
60b8(1): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya bo cheg mo dag na ni byang chub sems dpa' mang dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi
61a1(1): 'khor yongs su stong ba byed do// 'dzag rten gi khams kyi grangs su bya bache go mo nigi na ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi dang
61a2(1): 'di zhes bya ba nagi snang po byang chub tu 'gro ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na nI byang chub sems dpa' mang dang 'di zhes byas ba zhig dpung
61a3(1): dang banon par bcas pa'i bdud rab tu pham par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'chang rgya'o// 'jig rten gi kham
61a4(1): kyi zangs su bya baN+ye ge mu zhig nA ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mAnan dang 'dri zhes bya ba nig chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad do// 'jig rten gi khams grangs
61a5(1): su bya ba che ga mo nig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan dang ni che gra mo zhig sangs rgyas kyi phan las mA lus par mdzad nas phung po so'i ming las 'das pa'i dbyings
61a6(1): yos su mya ngan pas 'da' ba mdzad do// zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ rigs kyi 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtswa dang shing dang yal ga dang lo ma dang 'ang ba ma can rdul
61a7(1): shAni tu mra ng+ge'i rgyur blugs pa'i myur thug pa ni nang yang srid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams g+hi stan+da lam dang byang chu
61a8(1): sems dpa'i sbyong ba la 'jug pa'i khyang bar gang po bdag cag gi gnas na yong pa'i shing ta la'i 'bring ba las rol mo'i yo byad dang rin po che'i rgyan dang khyo
61b1(1): gi long spyod rlung gis bskyong ba'i sgra 'byung zhing de ro 'byin pa dang / rna lam du grag pa'i mtha' ni thug par mi rung ngo // ngalga bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas dang chos
61b2(1): dang dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa dang mtshan gi chu klung gi sras dga' ba chen po'i shugs drag pos nyams
61b3(1): bde ba skyes te 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // de ltar bdag cag phyini par 'gyur nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la ci nas kyang kho bo cag gi 'khor gyisam
61b4(1): can du ma zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyiri mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar bur chos ston pa mdzad do// 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i sgong
61b5(1): phrag dpag tu med pa kha dog shin tu mdzes pa dag kyang nam mkha' la 'khod cing yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pas mchong pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// 'phags
61b6(1): pa 'di dka' thu ba lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'byung ste/ 'ong nges ma ra na med pa yang chang du sems
61b7(1): can dmyal ba rnams sdang bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rtse zhil par byed te/ 'od de nyid kyis 'phags pa 'di bdag
61b8(1): cag gi mig lam du snang bar bstan pas/ de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang 'phags pa 'di la sems mos par gyur nas/ 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i ris nyams su bde bar skyeso// / 
62a1(1): da ltar bdag cag 'phags pa'i ngas mdzad pa la dzin tu bzon mthong bas mi mngoms pas 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad las/ 
62a2(1): spangs 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dod do// der bdag cag phyi nI nas kyang sems can chang med pa rnams byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de ltar chos
62a3(1): ston pa mdzad do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzungs kyis chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu thos nas dga' rang sa te mgu ning rnamasna bde la tshim ning yid byed ba skyes na/ 
62a4(1): rnam je rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bla zhes gnon du 'dre shes bstod / zam rje rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bas byag 'a
62a5(1): te 'di skad ces 'phags pa de ltar bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' dang 'gal bar bgyis pa'i nongs pa la gnongs par bshags so// de nas bram
62a6(1): rgyal ba'i dod kyi skye mched kyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rjes su bstan dang mthun bya
62a7(1): tsang dran pa nye bar banag suM b+h+ra mA'i dang gcig d+hA na/ de phyi de'i don rnams rnams cad 'dzin par bsgrubya par 'gyur/ 'thun pa'i sangs rgya sa yo shes byang chub drung
62a8(1): 'chang yang rgya/ de nas tshang dpo gyi bu nor bzangs kyis ri'i g.yang sa'i lam su gri'i sa bzhi bas la 'dzeg ste/ me'i phung po chen po der mtshangs so// de lngar mchongs
62b1(1): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'ang nge 'dzin can d+ha brtan pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur to// me des rag nas nga byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu ni pa'i bde du mngon par/ 
62b2(1): shes pa zhes bya ba rdzob par gyur nas nges 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa mi'i phung po la de ltar reg na bde ba dang / ri'i lam spu gris gtams pa 'di yang de ltar
62b3(1): de ltar reg na bde ba de ni nga rgya'o// des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa rdo ba ste/ rigs
62b4(1): kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa 'di shes par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i me'i phung po lta bu 'gro ba tham
62b5(1): cad kyi nyon mongs ba lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad yong su zad par bya ba'i smon lam can/ ru mtshon phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa sems la thub ba med cing / sems dma'
62b6(1): ba dang ldan pa yid num pa med pa can/ rdo rje'i snying po dang ldan pa'i mthu bo che lnga bu brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par bya ba la sgyid lug pa med pa sbyor ba lhod pa rlung
62b7(1): gi dkyil 'khor gyu bu 'gro ba thams cad don tu brtson pa/ brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ phyir mi zlog pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi sbyong ba shes pa
62b8(1): 'am yon tan brjod par nus re ga na/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di 'di na grong khyer seng ge rnam par bgyings pa zhes bya ba yod do// de na rgyal po seng
63a1(1): dpal gi bu mo bas ma nyes bya ba bumo m+b+ha rgya'i 'khor dang 'dug gyis de'i gan du so la ji ltar byung chub sems dpas byang chub sem
63a2(1): dpa'i spyod pa la bsrab bar bya ba dang / ji ltar na na tAn du bya ba dris shig// de nas tshong dpon ge bu nor bzangs kyis bram ze rgyal ba'i drong skye mched kyi rkang pa
63a3(1): gnyi sa~M lwa sti bor phyag 'tshal te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang lhas te/ bram ze
63a4(1): rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bzlas gnyen la rim gro bsam mi khyab pa la zhugs pa mos pargya chen
63a5(1): pas rnam par dag pa theg pa chen pos rnam ngon tu 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par myos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par zhugs pa/ dge ba
63a6(1): shes gnyen gi rjes su 'brang bar spo ba chos kyi rim la rnam par spyod pa/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa yang dag pa'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa ye nas
63a7(1): mdu' ba gnas pa'i srabya dang ldan padas gsum skad tsag tshogs pa khong du chung bar rnyed pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' gnyis su med pa mngon du gyur pa mi gnas su
63a8(1): tshang ba'i mang 'das par gdo mi 'thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mdza' sa rnam par mi rig par gnas pa/ bslab pameng ba'i mthas gdul bakho
63b1(1): khar bya ba la zhugs pa chos kyi mtha' dang mi 'gal bar bya ba la gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' wa mtha' med par khong du chud pa sangs rgyas thams cad
63b2(1): kyi mtha' ma rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/ sems can thams kyi 'du shes kyi dra ba rnam par gtong ba'i ye shes la gzhol ba nid la mngon par chags pa
63b3(1): thams cad dang bral ba sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi nang thams cad
63b4(1): yongs su dag par bya ba la gnas pa med par spyod pa med sems can thams cad la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa snga tham
63b5(1): cad tshig lam+ba ny+dzu bur khong du chud pa gzugs thams cad gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dang mnyam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba de mthad kyis sing ge rnam par
63b6(1): bzangs pa'i grong gongan par byon te/ bu mo byams mtshol zhing yongs su rme prI las+ya/ rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo khyams pa 'khor bu mo lnga brgya dang
63b7(1): ldan pa de khyad pa rnam par snang ba'i skyed po zhes b+hA ba'i nang na khri can dan sbal gi snying po'i rkang pA can/ glu sIr gI lcag por byeng bas legs par zlos pa
63b8(1): lce rdzas kyi snyan bting ba la 'dug cing chos ston te zhes thos nas/ seng gi rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer dus nga ste/ rgyal po seng ge pal gyi gnas
64a1(1): na bde phyin nas rgyal po'i phyi sgo gang na bu mo byams ma mthong bar dga' ba'i phyir sdod cing 'dug 'dug pa dang / nges der srog
64a2(1): chags brgya phrag du ma dang srog chags stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags rgya stong du ma 'dod par mthong nas khyed gang nas 'ongs/ dgang du 'dod zhes dris pa dang / 
64a3(1): de dag nA ro dang ni bu mo byams ma'i drung du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dod do zhes nas/ nges pa sems pa 'dir ni su 'gro yang 'gal ba med pa lnga zhig snya ma ste/ de lda nas
64a4(1): duphyin to// de ltar ni te Sh+Tha sa na khang ba rnam par snang ba'i snying po can de yang gzhi shas du 'jug pa'i sa las blangs te bai DUr+ya'i ka ba bkye ba/ rtsig pI rdo rje las byas
64a5(1): bo'ajam bu chu klung gi gser gI lhun dang ldan pa'i ba gam brgya phrag stong gis brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che grangs med pas rnam par bres pa/ rin po che stong gi
64a6(1): nA bye mi ba gA kyil 'khor gyis shin tus par byas pa nor blo rin po che za ba'i mid du 'ong bas rnam par rgyan par ni po che'i shing btags grangs med pas yongs su
64a7(1): bsgyur ba/ ris gi drI'aM b+hu bAHn+na t+pa la tshal da'is nan zla bsum b+hi sa myi khya ba pa'i rgyun dadu ldan par 'gyur 'dug pa mdzo // bram byams
64a8(1): mang yang mig dpa nag byed pa/ sna mngon zing rje 'dug pa/ mngag gsor gyi kha ga zhar 'jug pa mdzang nas des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
64b1(1): ldan brgya snong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par
64b2(1): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bstod na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslu ba byar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan 'an du bgyi ba ma
64b3(1): 'tshal te 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gang mas ngag rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems
64b4(1): dpa'i spyod pa la bsrab par bgyi ba dang / nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshang du gsol/ sbas pa rigs kyi bu khro bo'i gnas kyi rgyan la ltos shig ces nas/ des su
