156a2(1): kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de lta bu mthong ste/ chos kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos nas chos kyi sprin gyi char chen pos sems mngon par brlan pa de'i ba
156a3(1): yadage sdang ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byas kyis/ de'i g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma rig bya
156a4(1): snyam pa dang / de'i mod la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byas kyis/ de'i mong la dge slong ma seng ge rnam
156a5(1): par bsgyings pas bza' shing gi ra bo dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// de lngar g.yas phyogs su
156a6(1): bskor ba bya'o snyam du bsams nas bsor ba byed pa'i tshe 'khor ba thams cad na yang dge slong ma sing gA rnam par bgyings pa 'dug pa mdzang nas mdun du 'dug / 
156a7(1): la mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras sa/ 'phags ma bdag gis bla na medang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod na/ ji ltar byang chub sa
156a8(1): dbas byang chub sems dpa'i sbyong ba'i pha bslab par bgyi ba dang dzaM ltar nan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags mni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
156b1(1): gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan+d+ra pa mdzad nga nas bdag gis dzes na/ 'phags mdze ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa bsdu ba bar
156b2(1): ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ nges smras pa rigs kyi bu kha mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar bapa rlom sems rnams
156b3(1): cad yongs su bcom pa zhes bya ba thob pa'o// smras pa 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa de'i yul jil
156b4(1): bu zhig mchis/ sbas pa rigs kyi bu de ni ye shes snang ba ste/ dus gsum du 'byung ba'i rgyun sems skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par dmigs pa'i rang bzhin no/ 
156b5(1): sbas pa 'phags ma ye shes snang ba de'i yul yang ji lta dri zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes snang ba 'di sgru ba ba dang / yongs su sgrub pa'i
156b6(1): tshe chos thams cad rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes te de ting nge 'dzin de dza ba ma thag tu yid kyi rang bzhin gi lus kyis phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten
156b7(1): gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sku che gcig gis thogs pa/ dga' ldan gyi pho brang ni bzhugs pa thams cad re re la pa yul yang lus spangs
156b8(1): rgyas kyi 'ang brjod du meng ba'i rdul shin tu tha bsdad kyis tshang pa rnam pa tha dang pa sangs rgyas kyi ning brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu za bsnyed kyi mchong bsgyur ngo'i phyir 'chos
157a1(1): 'di ltar lha'i lus dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / 
157a2(1): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi 'am dang mi yin pa'i dbang po'i lus me tog gi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / spos kyi srin yongs su 'dzin pa dang // 'phreng ba'i srin yongs
157a3(1): su 'dzin pa dang // phye ma'i byug pa'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang // phye ma'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / na za' srin yongs su 'dzin pa dang // gdugs kyi
157a4(1): sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang // rgyal mtshan gyi sngon yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ba dar gyi rgyun yongs su 'dzin pa dang // rin po che'i balnga bsgrub kyi sI mongs
157a5(1): su 'dzin pa dang // rin po che'i dra ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gnam yol gyi rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin
157a6(1): che'i rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma'i rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gdar gyi rgyan gyi sngon mongs
157a7(1): su 'dzin pa mang pos mtshang bskur ba'i phyir 'gro 'o ga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sna tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la mchod pa bya
157a8(1): ba'i phyir ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin du/ yum gyi skur gshegs pa dang / bltam pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / 
157b1(1): mngon par 'byung ba dang / snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang / bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas shing snying
157b2(1): byang chub tu bzhugs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du lha'i gnas na bzhug
157b3(1): ba dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri bza dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi yin pa'i gnas na bzhug pa nas/ 
157b4(1): ba thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa yongs su tshim par mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar de dag thams cad pa'ang yin gyi rang bzhin gyi
157b5(1): lus rnam pa de lta bu bdag gis rnam pade lta bu'i mchod pa cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro'o// sems can gang gis khom
157b6(1): sangs rgyas mchong ba dang / rami gror byed pa'i lus 'di shes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges
157b7(1): par 'gyur ro// sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad la'ang / kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gdams ngag dang rjes
157b8(1): su bstan pa 'di 'di ston te// rigs kyi bu kho bo ba shes kyi mig gis sems can la lta yang sems can gyi shes kyang mi skyed la/ rlom sems kyang mi
158a1(1): byed ngo // 'gro ba thams cad kyi sang rgya mtsho yang nan te tshig gi lam thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas rlom sems
158a2(1): su byed pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ chos kyi lus yongs su shes pas rlom sems su byung ba yang med do// de bzhin
158a3(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin kyang chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do sems kyi skad cig ra ral chos
158a4(1): kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bgengs kyang chos nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khong du chung bas rlom sems su byed pa med do// rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub
158a5(1): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa 'dinas par zad na/ kha mos byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings mang
158a6(1): dang dbus mang pa las zhugs pa chos thams cad pa rlom sems med par gnas kyang dkyil mo krung gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gangs pa
158a7(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus su 'dus par ston kyang snang cig gcig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du dang ba lus sangs rgya sAN+Da 'phru' thams
158a8(1): ca 'byung ring rgyu ba/ sangs rgyas kyi nang brjod du meng pa'i brjod du mang pa'i bcu'i nag mag tsag gis sums so mang bar 'ban pa rang gi baspu'i bu
158b1(1): 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du pa' med pa'i 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa skad cig gcig la bskur ba brjod du mang
158b2(1): pa'i yang brjod du med par gnas pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yang ngag 'jug pa skad cig gis brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par 'khor ba dngarga na
158b3(1): sbyong ba shes pa 'am yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul 'gro dga' ba na grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan ces
158b4(1): bya ba yod do// de nas bcom pam b+ha'i shes gnyen nas bya ba 'dug gis nga'i gan du song ba ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa byang chub sems dpa'i
158b5(1): skyong pa lnga srab bar bgyi ba dang dzitAn tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong ma seng ga rnam par bsgyings pa'i rkang
158b6(1): pa gnyis spyi bo sa phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la la na bar+ya sdong du ma rag pas phyogs su bskor ba byas nos yang dang yang
158b7(1): bltas te dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i drung nas song ngo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs shes rab kyi snang ba chen po des sems
158b8(1): snang bar gyur pa de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba de po ni sems/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs snang ba de la ni yang dag par rjes su blta/ 
159a1(1): semras can thams cad kyi sang rnam par dmigs pa'i mdzad kyi gzungs kyi chub de ni brdar ba byed/ de bzhin gshegs
159a2(1): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul de sha ni tu rgya che bar byed/ snying rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi sbubs su gyur pa'i
159a3(1): spobs de ni nye bar rjor/ chos thams cad kyi rgyul snang ba'i skyonas yang dag tu 'byung ba'i thams cad mkhyer ba nyid kyi shugs del ni rab tu rtog chos kyi
159a4(1): dbyings rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gyengs pa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa de'i rjes su ni 'brang / chos thams cad kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i
159a5(1): ye shes kyi 'ong de ni shAn tu gsal bar byed/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bye brgyas par 'gengs pa'i mngon pa
159a6(1): shes pa'i stobs de ni mngor bar bsgru ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i las dang dra rA ba thams cad nye bar blangs pas bsums pa mtharang byung ba'i smon pam
159a7(1): de ni yongs su rdzogs par byed cing mdzar kyis yul bgrong dka' ba'i grong khyer rin po ches rgyan pa gang na bder byin te/ bcom pa ma lha'i gshes
159a8(1): gnyen ma yongs su tshol tshol ba dang / de la bcom pa ma lnga'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan mngon par mi shes la ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi tshul la mi
159b1(1): mkhas pa'i mi ji srid pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ mI'i ngade ltar ni nang dul ba'i dbang po dang ldan la de ltar shes ning dang ldan te/ de ltar 'khrul
159b2(1): ba med cing de ltar yid 'khrul pa med pa/ de ltar gan shing gang tsam du lnga ste/ de ltar gnod pas mi tshugs shing de ltar mtshan mar mi 'dzin la/ gzug
159b3(1): kyi rnam pa thams cad la g.yeng ba med pa'i mig dang ldan te/ bdi la bral pa med cing / bsam pa za ba la mngon par mdzes te rgya mtsho'i ltar 'dug
159b4(1): cing sems mi nam mi 'khrug pa de la/ bcom pa malka'i bshes gnyen mas ko ci zhig bya/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod chags pa dga' ba byed de/ 
159b5(1): sems phyin ci log dang ldan yang mi srid ngo // 'di lta bu'i ngag pa ni sdug cig gtsang ma'i 'du shes yongs su rgyu ba meng de 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pas 'a jol
159b6(1): kyang mi srung ngo // 'di lta bu'i ngag la ni sdug cig bud med kyi da bang du 'gyur ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod kyang yul ba skyong ba mi srid do// 
159b7(1): 'di ltar bu dag ni dud kyi spyong yul ba chags pa med de/ 'di lta bu ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying yang mi sring ngo // 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi na bas bcings
159b8(1): bar 'gyur ba med de/ mi dgos pa byed kyang mi srid do snyam mo// gang yang bcom pam lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i yon tan gyi khyad par mngon par
160a1(1): shes shing be shes kyi spyod yul mngon tu gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 'dzar te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bcom
160a2(1): bam lha'i bshes gnyen ma la yongs su dri bar sems pa ni khyod kyi thob par bya ba legs par tho ba legs so lags so// khyod ni nges par sangs rgyas
160a3(1): su smon pa'o khyod ni bdag nges par sems can thams cad kyi gnas su sbyar bar 'dod pa'o// khyod ni nges par sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi
160a4(1): zug rngung byung bar 'dod pa'o// khyod ni nges par sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam gtor bar 'dod pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di re/ bcom pa
160a5(1): ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma ni/ grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs zhig na rang gyi khyim na 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
160a6(1): kyis tshig de zlos nas dga' rangs te/ mgu' zhing nyams bang 'tshim 'di yad bde ba skyes nas/ bcom bam lha'i bra shes gnyen ma'i khyim
160a7(1): gad+han ba der phyin nas de'i khyim che zhing yangs la rin po che'i ra ba rim pa bcus bsor ba/ rin po che'i ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bcus kun nas
160a8(1): bskor ba 'obs spo brgyas gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo dang / ut+pal dang ku mu ha dang / me tog pan+d+ha ri kas chus yongs su khe bas pa
160b1(1): yan lag brgyang dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba zhig gser gyi bye ma brdal ba smos ying du 'ong ba dang 'dres pa'i tshang rnam pas gang ba riri po che'i ma
160b2(1): ma mang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang
160b3(1): khang pa brtsegs pas rnam par dkrigs shing / ba gam dang rna ba bas dang skar khung gi shar bu dang / zla gam seng ge'i shaM thags dang / snang ba'i rgyan
160b4(1): mtshan la stsogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis 'bar ba/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs zangs med pa'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i ngag bai rdur+yas
160b5(1): sbas pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos rim po thams cad kyis 'khor thams cad bdugs shing bsangs pa a ga ru nags po mchog gi bdug sas
160b6(1): kyis dri rim par bdugs/ spos kyi byug pas 'khor kun byugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lan kan gis rtsigs pa ngos kun tu bris pa
160b7(1): sdeng 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gi dra ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu sbas pas kun nas bka ba pa/ gser gi dril bu brgya stong rlung gis
160b8(1): bskyod cing 'khol pa'i sgra yid du 'ong bstan pa 'byung ba/ rin po che'i thams cad kyi me tog gi srani sil ma kun tu bkram pas/ rin po che'i ma
161a1(1): masna chags kyi 'a kyir btu snang ba/ mum pe brjod du nang byung badzin papa'i byin da pa mnan pa bzugs pa ga ngad+ha rang kun gyis sa
161a2(1): bablan bu mchags pas mdzad mi pang snun pa/ de shing bair bcan po bac+doMs brten du mangs/ nganas bam pa mtha' bcos gtanam garnas
161a3(1): mdzes nga bzang bsta na sdug pa rgya rnam pa'i kha dog dam brgyas pa dang ldan pa/ gser gyi khangag ltar 'dug pa'i mdog can/ sku mdzan dza rnga 'dug pa/ 
161a4(1): rdzas kyi ldan gan dang shini le gargyal da 'ang bar rnam par smra ba/ 'dong ba'i khams kyi b+ha dang / mi'i thams cadams lags pa'i khang ga dang 'azugs
161a5(1): da kyi sa mangs pa smra/ mangs palas byed sa byungs sa rdzun pamams camarnams cad kyirgyas kyi tshul ma
161a6(1): brgyan rnams cad dang zhing ming du 'ad pa'i du rgyas can rnam par bar pa'i yi ba'i 'khor ba'i rkyen ma khas pa dang rdzu pa/ baba~M dang bcug pas byams
161b1(1): rini za cha'i sgra zla ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyan pa'i lus yang du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ rin pa chathams cad las byas pa'i nga ba'ang can tu gsal bsams
161b2(1): rab tu brgyan pa/ lnga rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang / lbu ba lbu ba zangs meng pas rab tu brgyan pas lus shin tu 'bar ba/ nor bu rin po
161b3(1): dam pa'i ying bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cong pan thogs pa/ ran pa che'i DUr+ya'i 'phreng ba mdo zungs rdo rje rin po che'i sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che sang
161b4(1): mdzes pa sna tshogs bkye ba 'gul na thogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa de spyad pa la skal ba 'thun pa dang / smon lam gcig pa'i 'khor mang po gzhan gyis
161b5(1): mi phyed cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang beshes kyi chos kyi tshogs kyi rter mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa 'dug pa mthong ste/ des khyim bdag
161b6(1): thams cad dang rin po che'i gnas dang gzhal med khang gi rgyan de dag thams cad kyang rang gi lus las 'byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa/ lus bde ba sems bskyed
161b7(1): pa sems khong nas dga' bar byed pas/ gsal shing snang bar byed pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis bcom pa ma lnga'i banas
161b8(1): gnyen ma'i rkang pa gni sa la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di sad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang
162a1(1): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sna
162a2(1): bal bas pa bar bgyi ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma mtshal te/ 'phag sa ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa gang ma ngag dang rdzas su bsnan pa mdzad
162a3(1): ngo zhes bdag gis rngos na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba la bsla ba par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba
162a4(1): 'phag sngams bdag la bstan du gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par mdzar pa 'dod chags dang dral ba'i
162a5(1): mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba 'jo ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni lha rnams la lha mo'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang byi bas dang / chu nenang las
162a6(1): kyang lhag par kha dog gsal ba dang / rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin tu snang bar byed do// de bzhin duk+Sha dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang l+h+wam
162a7(1): pani dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la yang bud med kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang dbyi bas
162a8(1): ngang chu dang lhag par 'ong gsapa zhing rnam par dag pas cil mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do// sems can gang 'dod chags kyis kun nas 'khor ba'i sa
162b1(1): dang ldan pa dag kho mo'i drung du 'ongs na yang de dag thams cad la kha mo ni 'dod chags dang ngalta bar 'gyur ba'i phyir chos ste/ de dag gis chos dathos nas
162b2(1): kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa zhes bya ba rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni kha
162b3(1): mo'i mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob po// 
162b4(1): la la ni gtam byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral bzo bar 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yang rab tu
162b5(1): 'thob bo// la la ni lag nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'job par 'gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas
162b6(1): kyi zhing thams cad rjes su 'gro zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni gcig tu 'gros pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ 
162b7(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bral bas snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni bltas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'jo ba bar
162b8(1): 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i rgyan ces bya ba rab tu 'jo ba bo// la la ni bral pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par
163a1(1): 'gyurate/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pas kyi rgol ba rnam par thor bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// pha la ni ming
163a2(1): gtsugs pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul snang ba zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'jo
163a3(1): phal ni pang du khyud pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad phongs su sdung
163a4(1): cing mi rtog pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni 'o byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags bral ba thob par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
163a5(1): 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyi mdzod la rig par byed pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'dzub bo// da ltar kho mo ni sems can je srid cig kha ma'i drung du 'ong ba'i
163a6(1): dag rnams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'ding 'dzin rnam par thar pa 'dod pa thal ba'i mthar byin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa chags pa mang pa la mngon du 'gyur ba
163a7(1): 'di na de sar bcu 'gang smras pa 'phags mtshang ngalta ru'i phun sumachags pa dang ldan pa khrod kyis ngag pa'i rtsa ba ni gang tu bskyed 'phrin las ma
163a8(1): lta bu zhig brtsams/ sbas pa rigs kyi bu kho mos dran na'adas pa'i dris shig na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen
163b1(1): ba dang nabs su ldan pa/ bang bar gshegs pa 'jig nan mkhyen pa bla na med bsdus bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyis sngon pa sangs rgyas
163b2(1): bcom ldan 'das shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'jig du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mdza bar gshegs pa de sems can rnams la thugs
163b3(1): brtse ba'i mya ngan du rgyal po'i gnas sngo bzang po zhes bya bar gshegs nas sna tham pa la zhabs kyis gnon pa'i cha/ grong khyer de thams cad rab tu gsos
163b4(1): nas yangs shing rgya che la rin po che du ma las byas par yongs su grub par gyur te/ steng gi bar snang la yang rin po che mang po'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / 
163b5(1): rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang bar dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang lha'i lus kyi sprin chad med par rgya che bas 'khyung
163b6(1): bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho mo de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi chung ma cig tu gyur te blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o// de nas kho mo tsha 'phrul gyis yang dag par bskul ras
163b7(1): khyim ba dang ldan cig ngong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa grang bar gyi mang du gshegs pa la dang pa rgya chen bskyes te/ kho mos rin po che'i dril bu cig bci
163b8(1): phul lo de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i shin tu mtho' bar gshegs pa'i zhabs drung du 'dug ste/ 
164a1(1): des kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod pa dang bral ba'i ma thar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang
164a2(1): chub sems dpa'athabs dang ye shes mnga' yas pa la gnas pa bsod nams rgya che zhing yangs pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi yul la thug pa med pa de dag
164a3(1): gi spyod pa shes pa'am yon tan brjod par nus re skan// // song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba yod de/

164a5(1): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems rapa'i sbyong ba la bskyab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba nis nig/ nganas tshang dpon gyi bu nar ba zangs
164a6(1): kyis btsam pa man+t+ra'i bshes gnyen ma'i nang pa gnyis skye bras phyag 'tsham na/ bcom pa mtha'i bzas gnyen ma la lan bad+d+ha snong du ma sems bya
164a7(1): su bsnur ba byas nas yang dang yang bzlas te bcom pa ma 'i gan ma'i drung nas sung nganas chang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge pa'i b.ras
164a8(1): par khyim bdag nam khrugs kyi khyim gangan bder phyin nas khyim bdag nam thugs kyi rkang pa gnyis bskye bos phyag 'tshal /

164b2(1): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bsrab par bgyi ba dang / ci ltar nan du bgyi balnga 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams pa dang mngag dang
164b3(1): rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos te/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la sra bya bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi 'phags pa
164b4(1): bdag la bshang du gsol des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa'i yongs su mi zad pa ngo ba bste/ rigs kyi bu kho bo
164b5(1): sems kyi rgyud las ni rten 'jig rten 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad ma gartogs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad

165b5(1): yongs su bsgrub 'ang 'jug go// bzod pa bsres pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go// bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnams mthong ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la'ang 'jug go// mngon pa

166a4(1): kyi skang gi gcig gas sangs rgyas brgya yang mdzadza// nga'i 'og ma'i rnams kyi sa sangs rgyas spong bang mdzo nas nga'i ga ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gnas

170b6(1): kyi nab kyi drung nas kyang mi gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa la yangs gon du gnas te sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su bstad // 
170b7(1): dgra snun pa dang don bya dang / ngan 'thun pas kyang sems can yongs su snang ngo // gzungs kyi lus rnam par bstan pas sems can yongs su
170b8(1): smin par byed do// kha dog dang dbyibs dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan te rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang 'od gzer gyi dra ba dgyed pas kyang
171a1(1): sems can rab tu tshim par byed cing yongs su smin par byed do// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbyangs brjod
171a2(1): pas dang cil dga' ba'i spyod lam yongs su bstan pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / tshul 'thun par chos bstan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul
171a3(1): pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dge ba'i chos bsregs par bag mi byed pa'i sems can gyi sems yongs su sgrub pa dang / bsam pa dang mthun par spru pa
171a4(1): sna tshogs chung med pa yongs su bstan pa dang rigs sna tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang bsal bu 'dzin gzugs yongs su bstan pa dang / 
171a5(1): gnas gcig tu 'phrogs pas kyang sems can yongs su bsdus shing yongs su smin par byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
171a6(1): snang rje chen po so thogs pa med pa'i nga yongs su sbyangs pas 'gro ba thams cad rab tu chen pa'i smon lam bskyed de 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi g.yang sa'i
171a7(1): 'jigs pa dang / sems can rnams na g+h+r-i r+m+ma gyi 'jigs pa ni bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mgatshungs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam pa
171a8(1): bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bcings pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su bcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi srogs bab par mi bde ba
171b1(1): 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yod byad kyis 'phongs pa'i 'jigs pa gsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'a
171b2(1): ba med pa'i 'dzags pa'i zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi grags pa med pa'i 'jigs las yongs su bzla ba dang sems can thams cad kyi 'khor
171b3(1): ba'i 'jigs pra rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor du bag cha ba'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad thams
171b4(1): kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las rnam par zla ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad
171b5(1): lam mun pas namang ba'i phyir mi ldog pa'i snang bas gsal bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi skal ba mi mnyam par dang / 'grogs pa'i 'jigs
171b6(1): pa shAn tu bskal pa dang / sems can thams kyi sdug pa dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa dgug par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang 'grogs
171b7(1): pa'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la lus la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad
171b8(1): la sems mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa las dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su
172a1(1): za ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad rab tu brten pa'i smon lam mngon par sgrub pa 'di byas so// sems can thams
172a2(1): cad kyi 'jigs pa rnam par ni bar bya ba'i phyir yang 'jigs rten du rjes su dran pa'i sngo byin gyis brlabs so// sems can thams 'jigs pa
172a3(1): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir rang gi ming gi 'khor lo yang 'jigs rten du rnam par dmigs par bya'o// dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas rnam par bya ba'i
172a4(1): phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam pa'i bye brag mtha' yas pa dang mnyam par nga'i lus kyang byin gyis brlabs so// rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni thabs
172a5(1): 'dis sems can thams cad dang 'jigs pa las yongasu bkrol zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
172a6(1): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / phyir mi ldog par byed do// rigs kyi bungs byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa
172a7(1): ring ba 'di thob par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpe' kun tu bzang po rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par dag pa/ 
172a8(1): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i skyong ba khong du chung bar rdzogs pa/ dge pa'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba rgyun mi tshong pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa
172b1(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin thams cad du gnas ming kyi rgyud la nag tu mnyam par banag pa/ bsal pa thams cad du gnas cing spyong pa las byu
172b2(1): mi ldog pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi tshul rjes su chags pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi grong yangs su la
172b3(1): ba'i rgyud la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mi dag pa'i sems rnam par ni bar byed rnyed dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i sems
172b4(1): yongs su 'phel ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i rgyun las phyir mi ldog par byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes
172b5(1): pa 'am yon tan brjod par nu se re skan/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gapas phyogs su bskor ba byas te gus par bkur stong nas/ nor bzangs
172b6(1): shin tu dul bad+ma phyogs rgyud du song // spyan ras gzigs dbang drang srong snying rje rnams sbyong ba// ran chen raM sul na gnas pa des kyang mthong
172b7(1): rin can sna tshogs rdo d+ha'i srar ljongs na// pad+ma'i snying po'i song ge'i khril brtan la 'dug/ lha dang lA mini klu dang srin po mi 'am ni/ rgyal ba'i sras
172b8(1): kyis bser cing la ches kyang spen// mtshanas nar ba'angs dpa' bcang mang smras par gyur/ bsngon ta yon tan rgya mtsha'i nang sa phyug
173a1(1): nas ci nas bzang po'i spyod pa bdag gis tho bgyur bar/ 'phags pas thugs srung gang ma shing gso
173a2(1): bsod nams brgyas pas rgyun pa'i dri med lag brgyang ste// 'od sbyin dra brgya tshun bzang por ba bton nas// nor bzangs spyi bor banag ste sems can
173a3(1): rnam dag pa/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos mkhas pas tshig 'di smras// sangs rgyas sras po nga ni rnamathar gcig sgo shes// ye shes snying po rgyal
173a4(1): ba kun gyi thugs rjes sdug/ 'gro ba thams cad bskya ba cing yongs su bsdu phyir byung // kun tu bdag nyid rang la byams pa bzhin du rgyu/ 'gro ba mang
173a5(1): po thams cad sdug bsngal kun las skyo ba// gang rnams ngam du bcings shing ngagra lag phyin pa dang // lus la gzer cing de bzhin btson rar bcud pa
173a6(1): yang nga yi ming thos bcangs shi gzung ba 'thar bar 'gyur// rgyal po dag la zhes pa'i g.yon byas gsang spangs pa// de tshe de dag nga'i mang ni dran gyur nas/ 
173a7(1): mnga' 'phangs de'i lus la phog par ma'i gyur te// mtshon rdos bta ba kyang de dag mi 'jug rgal bar 'gyur// dbang po'i 'khor du phyin dang gyur rnams rtsod pa
173a8(1): bya ba dgra' rnam kun las rgyal 'gyur grags pa thob par 'gyur/ grags dang thogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'bal bar 'gyur/ nga'i ma
173b1(1): nganang drug rngub mang bar gyur// gang gis nga'i mdzin rjes su drad byas pa// dngam nan pa 'jigs dgas dmas 'jigs chags dran na// sa
173b2(1): dam gcigagacan gcan gag tsud stsal gang / ngam rnams kun las rgyal ning 'jigs pa meng par 'gyur// gang rnams la las nga'i ming rig ra
173b3(1): zlas na sdang ba'i sems kyis rin chen ljongs su par gyur dam/ sol mdag spyi mdar ba tu 'bar bar 'a bar gyur kyang / maM rnams bcos gang pa'i
173b4(1): tshwa gter du 'gyur/ nga'i ma ni sang 'ga' yung tsa mdzes dranAn/ rgyu mtsha'i chu bair de 'i nang du 'chir mi 'gyur// chu bos mi khyer ma'i dbus tshig mi 'phru
173b5(1): don meng kun tu mi 'gyur ngan rnams 'grub par 'gyur// shing skye ba dbyig chings lcags stog bzhin ltung rnams dang // brnyas cing khyang gsang de bzhin
173b6(1): brid cing bslus pa dang // skyes shing bsdigs te gshe' dang sgrub pa rnams pa las// nga pi mang nam dran par byas na thar pa tho ba// gang rnams na
173b7(1): gzhar sa tshogs glags / rdo snod dang // gang rnams dag tu ni sdang mi stan brjod pa rnams// nga'i ming thos dran byas ldan par brjod par 'gyur// mdzu
173b8(1): btsam gyis mngal byams pa'i sems kyang skyed // nga'i ming tsam li la gang gos ngan byas na// gnong pa 'don du ro 'angs sngags dang pyor bya ba'i
174a1(1): dgra rnams nag tung mi zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/ ma lus drug gis de yi lus la mi chags so// lal
174a2(1): gang gis yi ming dran byas na// klu dbangs ni tshogs mkha' ldadri shA za thams cad dang // grul bum srul che byed gtum pa'i sems ldan dang / mdangs
174a3(1): 'phrogs 'jigs byed rmi lam 'ong ba zhig par 'gyur// nga yi ming ni skad cig yud tsam dran byas kyang // pha dang ma dang gnyen gnyis 'ja' ba kun dang yang // 
174a4(1): bral bar mi 'gyur sdang dang 'grogs par de bzhin mini// nor zang mi 'gyur 'phongs pa'i dngos su mi 'gyur ro// nga yi ming gi rjes su la la dran byed na/ 
174a5(1): 'di nas ni 'phos ma nur ming sems dmyal mi 'gro ste// byol song skye gnas pi dgas mi khom gnas su min// sems can dag pa lnga dang mi yi gnas su
174a6(1): nga'i ming ni lal gang gis dran byas na// dmus long zlar ba'on par na por mi 'gyur te// 'thang po long bar mi 'gyur gsal smra balnga sdug 'gyur// bsal
174a7(1): ba bye ba mang po kun ldan 'gyur/ lal gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes dran na/ sems can dag pa 'di nas shi 'phos phyogs bcu mi 'jig rten gsum du sangs
174a8(1): rgyas mngon sum skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang rngas par 'gyur/ 'di gzhan dag thabs mang ji srid kyis/ 'gro bar sems can
174b1(1): 'dul gnas dang dang mi nus/ sangs rgyas sras bongs ni rnam thar gcig bsgoms twa/ sngon tan can gyi thams cad ngas me shes/ nga'i tshe byang chub sems
174b2(1): dpas gzhan du mi 'gro ba zhes bya ba car phyogs na mkha'i dbyangs las 'ongs te/ mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor yug gi rtse mor 'dug
174b3(1): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro bas mi rjed kyi 'jig rten gi khams kyi khor yug gi rtse mo la rkang pa gnyis bor ma thag tu mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
174b4(1): 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ rin po che du ma'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par 'gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba des ni ma dang zla ba
174b5(1): 'od thams cad zil gyis non pa dang / lnga dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
174b6(1): dang bcwa byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / me dang rin po che dang glog dang skar ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis non pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las
174b7(1): kya ste/ sems canA dmyal ba chen po dag kyang snang bar byas byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad kyang sra
174b8(1): bar byas te/ ngan song gyi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang de ma thag tu no'o// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'ang rnams su mi gnod par gyur to/ 
175a1(1): mya ngan gizung du dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang rtse zhal bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi ning 'di dag thams cad du'ang
175a2(1): rini po che'i sprin gyi char pa ba ste me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang gdugs dang / brgyal
175a3(1): mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par pha ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ 
175a4(1): de'i lus de'i gzugs brnyan ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas su snang ba ste/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sim par byed pa la mngon par gzhol bas
175a5(1): ri gru 'dzin de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung du pang phyin par sdung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi
175a6(1): dbang ngos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba 'khor gyi dkyi
175a7(1): 'khor 'dir phyin pa mthong nga ma smras pa 'phags pa mthong ngo // smras pa rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i gan du song la/ 
175a8(1): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bsra bab bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba rjes shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi phra
175b1(1): nor bzangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' stan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
175b2(1): gzigs kyi dbang po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung nas
175b3(1): song ngo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i be nas kyi gting ma rnyed pa'i sems kyis/ 
175b4(1): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la bltas pas kyang ma ngoms bzhin du bsngo ba dang mi 'gral bar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba gang ba gang na ba
175b5(1): der song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas 'dun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas
175b6(1): 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems
175b7(1): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i stong ba la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'chal 'phags pa ni byang chub sems
175b8(1): dpa' rnams la gdams dgang de rjes su snyan pa mdzad nas bdag kyis zas naji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i stong ba la bslab pa
176a1(1): nga ts+tsha de wA nan d+ha rtsi dugs sa sna na sal ngas smras migs kyi zung
176a2(1): smra pa'i rnam par gyur ba'i sgra kun tu 'dra ba'ab bra ba'o// sbas pa 'dulas pa khyod kyis de bzhin gzigs pa gang gi rabs rlu nas byang chub sems
176a3(1): ngapa'i rnam par thar bsgo kun tu 'gro ba nas bgyi ba 'di bskyed 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'di nas ji skad cig na mchis 'jig rten gyi khams de nas
176a4(1): banang nas ni ji srid cig lags/ sbas pa rigs kyi bre gnas 'di ni lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer
176a5(1): bcas pa'i skye dgu kyang shes par dka' ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu' dang byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus mi ldog pa dang / byang chub sems
176a6(1): dpa'i spyong ba mi 'phrogs pa'i yul te/ de ni rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnan gyis yongs su ma zin pa/ sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba ma
176a7(1): bsrag pa bsam pa yongasu ma dag pa byang chub sems dpa' dbang po thob pa/ shes rab kyi mag dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi thos pa'am/ yongs su bzung
176a8(1): ba'am/ yi ches pa'am khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so// sbas pa sangs rgyas kyi mthu' dang / dge pa'i babs gtan gyi gzungs kyi
176b1(1): datsas par dgying na 'phags pas bdag la ba 'ami sgrub dam/ des smras pa rigs kyi drung ni nar thugs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpal kyi snang ba dang ldan
176b2(1): pa de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'ongs ted bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i
176b3(1): nabs kyi drung nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa so kun tu 'gro ba 'di tho ba bo/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa de nas pa
176b4(1): song nas ni bskal ba sangs rgyas kyi ning brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu rtsa ba snyed cig 'das te/ sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang gom pa
176b5(1): spangs rgyas kyi 'ang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phru ba snang cing bor ro gom par res kyang sangs rgyas kyi ning brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu rdza steng
176b6(1): kyis sangs rgyas kyi ning brjid du med 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi ning de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par shes te/ sangs rgyas bcom
176b7(1): ldan 'das de dag thams cad sa'ang bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa b+han med pa'i ming kyi rang bzhin chos ring mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rgyas bad / 
176b8(1): de bzhini gzugs pas gnang ba byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba yongs su bsrung pas mtshad ba rgyas so// 'jig nan gyi khams dngag rnasems can gyi
177a1(1): rnam smye ba ngag thams cad kyi sems rnaman 'du la du rgyung du// dngag rnams cad kyi dab pa'i 'ar
177a2(1): bang mongasu byas shing bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su bstan to// chos kyi dbyings rab tu bsngags so// 'od kyi
177a3(1): dkyil 'khor yongs su dkye'o// lo byang sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pas kyang nye bar sdud ngo // rang gi lus kyang de dag la byin gyis brlabs nyid ni yongs
177a4(1): sbyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i spyod pa rgyun 'chang ba'i phyir ro// shur phyogs nas ji ltar 'ongs pa de bzhin du lho phyogs nub phyogs dang byang shar gi
177a5(1): phyogs mtshams dang / ra lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs mtshams nas kyang de bzhin te/ 
177a6(1): rigs kyi bungs ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar bso ba kun tu 'gro ba nas bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs kun tu
177a7(1): mngon par gnob patha dad pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rnam par bkod pa sems can thams cad kyi bsam
177a8(1): pa mos paji lnga pa bzhin du mthun par spyong pa'i thams cad lus kyis rgyas par 'gangs pa tshas thams cad rgyud kyi rjes su song ba/ dus gsum gyi rgya
177b1(1): mnam pa ning du gyur pa chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyud dang mnam pa ning du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa 'gro ba'i rgyung thams cad du rnam par snang ba/ de bzhin
177b2(1): gshegs pa'i rgyud thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i rgyud thams cad khong du chud pa/ gnas meng ba'i rgyud la rab tu gnas
177b3(1): pang dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am yon tan brjod par nus ra skan// / song rigs kyi bulho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di zhing na grong khyer sgo dang ldan
177b4(1): pa zhes bya ba yod de/ dzi na lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
177b5(1): la bsra ba par bya ba dang / ji ltar ra na tan du bya ba dri se shig// des tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i
177b6(1): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ 
177b7(1): khang dang yang lhas te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi'i gro ba'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshang dpon gyi bya nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
177b8(1): pa rgya chen po'i rjesu song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can mngon par
178a1(1): shes pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par du bltas pa brtson 'grus brtan pa'i gocha
178a2(1): rab tu dga' khyad par thob pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par mthar pas rnam par brtse ba'i rjes su song ba'i bsam pa ldan pa/ de byang chub sem
178a3(1): dpa'i yon tan gyi sa la ra ra tan du byed/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sa la ni rnam par spyod gzugs kyi sa la ni rab tu gnas par byed/ smon lam gyi sa la ni 'jug
178a4(1): par byed tha dad pa yang dag pa'i shes pa'i sa la ni rjes su spo ba/ stobs kyi sa la ni yongs su bsgrub cing mthar gyis grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa gang ra ba de
178a5(1): song ste lha lha chen po kun tu dris pa dang de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa rigs kyi bu 'di re lnga lnga chen po'i grong khyer gyi lam gi bzhi mngo' bdag nyid shin
178a6(1): tu che bas sems can rnams la chos ston cing 'dug go// nga ras tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lnga lnga chen po gang na ba der song ste/ lnga lnga chen po'i
178a7(1): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mdun tu 'dug ste rngal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces sbas so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag
178a8(1): par rdzogs che bo'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyong pa la bslab pa dang / ji ltar nan tan
178b1(1): bya ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rnams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do nas bdag gis zos na ji ltar byang chud
178b2(1): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sbyong ba la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshang du gsol/ de nas
178b3(1): lha chen pos lag pa bzhi phyogs bzhi re brkyang te rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las shin tu myur ba'i shugs kyis chu blangs te bdag gi gdang bkrus nas/ 
178b4(1): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs pa gser gyi me tog gis gtor te 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthong bar
178b5(1): shin tu dka' ste thos par yang rab tu dka'o// skyes bu mchog ge me tog gi bu na da ri ka ni 'phags 'jig rten gyi phul du byas pa yin pas ngo mtshar rmad
178b6(1): dubyung ba yin te/ 'jig rten gyi gnas su gyur pa'o// 'gro ba'i rten du gyur pa'o// sems can rnams la snang ba chen po'i 'byin pa'o// lam tshungs
178b7(1): ba rnams la lam bde' ba ston pa'o// chos kyi tshul du gzung ba la mgon du gyur pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du phyin par byu ba ded dpon
178b8(1): don chen por gyur pa ste/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so// byang chub sems dpa' chen sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ming ni sems dri ma med
179a1(1): pa rnams la rang gyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan bston can lus rnam par dag pa rnams la mngon par snang ba dang / 
179a2(1): ngag gnyis bsangs pa rnams la dbyangs kyis snang ba yongs su gnon par byed pa dang / bsam pa dag pa rnams la dus thams cad du mngon sum du gyur
179a3(1): par gnas pas lta bang napa 'joms pa yin par bsams so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa srin gyi dra bathob pa'o// 
179a4(1): smras pa 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa'i dra ba de'i yul ji lta bu nig mchis/ de nas lha lha chen pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mdun du
179a5(1): ri chen po tsam gi gser gyi phung po dang dul gyi phung po dang / bai DUr+ya'i phung po dang shel gi phung po dang mu sa la gar pa'i phung po dang / a sma sa gar ba'i phung po
179a6(1): dang nor bu rin po che'i rang gis snang ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che'i dri ma med pa'i snying po'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po'i cha'i rnam par srung ba'i phung po dang
179a7(1): nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu mngon pa'i phung po dang / gtsug gi nor bu rin po che dang tsang pan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis mo'i ngo'i phung po dang
179a8(1): dpung rgyar gyi drang po dang / rna tsa'i rgyar gyi phung po dang / gdu ba du'i b+h+yo dang / sa rags kyi rung dang / rkang gdub kyi phung po dang / mu rigi dmar po'i dra ba'i phung po dang / 
179b1(1): nor bu rin pa cha'i sna tshogs kyi drang po dang / yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad kyi rgyan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i drung dang
179b2(1): matog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang bdug pa thams cad dang 'phreng ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang bri ma thams cad dang / gos
179b3(1): thams cad dang / gdugs thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang / lha'i ba dan thams cad rol mo bdung ba thams cad dang / rol mo krol ba
179b4(1): thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yul thams cad dang / bu mo b+ha ba brgyad stong grangs med pa dag kyang nye bar bstan nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs pa 'a
179b5(1): skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di dag las khyer la sbyin pa mang po ni byin cig/ bsod nams mang po ni gyis shig de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
179b6(1): la ni mchod cin/ sems can mang po ni sbyin pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su bsdus te/ gtong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'khod cing 'jig rten
179b7(1): ni sbyin pa la spobs shig gtang ba dka' ba yongasu gtong ba ni ston cig/ rigs kyi bu khyong pos ji ltar khong byed kyis rnam pas bsrung ba 'di bzhin
179b8(1): du sbyin pa'i bsam dang ma bral ba'i sems can chad med pa dag gi bsam pa'i rgyud kyang gtong bas yongs su bsgo ba byed do// sangs rgyas dang chos dang
180a1(1): dge 'dun dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge pa'i bshes gnyen rnams la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed
180a2(1): cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni sems can 'dod pa'i dngo
180a3(1): bas myos bu yul gyi longs spyod pa yongs su chags pa rnams la yul de dag la mi sdug par byin gyis rlob bo// kho bas non pa dang / nga rgyal can
180a4(1): dang rgyags shing dregs pa dang rnam pa char gcod pas 'dul ba rnams la ni gdum zhing srin po ltar mi sdug pa 'jigs pa'i lus sha za zhing khrag 'azung ba'i tshul
180a5(1): dang ldan pa bstan te/ rnam pa dang bsnams pas 'khrug par dag thams cad zhi bar byed / pa po can brtson 'grus bor ba'i sems can rnams
180a6(1): ni mingadang rgyu dang rgyal ba dang / rkun po dang ga nang ston 'jigs pa yongasasu bstan cing skyo bar byas te/ ra rgyas bya' 'bang du byung
180a7(1): yangs da sa nga dag kyis sa tsun pathams cad kyi phyogs dpa mi thun pa parnam pa dang /  phyin pa rnams pa kyi
180a8(1): bkyims pa 'i ma thams pa ngas 'a ga par nas pasasam mas pa nga ba kyi mdas pangs
180b1(1): ca las rnam par zlog pa ste/ dag pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa 'ang dag par gang pa zang po/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i
180b2(1): rnam par ngar pa srin gyi dra ba 'di shes par zad ni kho bos byang chub sems dpa'ang bang po ltar nyon pa'i lAm pa ni rab tu 'dzam pa/ chu ltar 'gro ba thams
180b3(1): cad kyi sdug bsngag gyi bsngal gyi me'i phung po ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sreng ba'i chu skyems parlang ltar 'dzin pa'i mngon par chags pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par
180b4(1): rarab rdo rje ltar bedag gi 'dre shes sra ba'i bragu rab tu bskul ba de dag gi sdud pa nas pa 'am por ngan brjod par nus ras na/ song rigs kyi bu
180b5(1): 'jam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ya ma ta'i snying po byang chub na sa'i lha mo brten ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang
180b6(1): chub sems dpa'i stong pa'i sa bsgrub par bya ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bya badz+nyA sa shig/ nga nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar gyis lbagA chen po rkyang ba
180b7(1): ba gnyis paspyi bos phyag 'tshal ta/ g+hAl+le chen po la la ni brgya sdong du mar g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas yang yang du bzlas ti pA lnga chen du
180b8(1): drung nas song ngo/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar gyis bral ang gam gzha'i stong po byang chub tu sa'i lha mo ban nam gangan bi der song ba dang / 
182a1(1): 'phags pa ma 'tshal lo// de nas sa'i lha mo brtanams rkang pa'i mthil gyis sa chen po la brda bas te/ rin
182a2(1): bache'i gter bye brgya stong grangs med pas rab tu bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ran po che'i gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di dag kyang
182a3(1): khyod kyis rjes su 'brang ba'o// khyod kyi sngon du 'gro ba'o khyod kyis ji dkar sbyang ba'o// khyod kyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa las 'byung ba'o// 
182a4(1): khyod kyis bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsrungs pa'o// 'di las longs s+ho/ khyod kyis ci dgos de dag gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kha
182a5(1): mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can thob pa ste/ de ltar kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
182a6(1): b.rab 'di dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad du byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'brang zhing rtag du bsrung ba la bzhugs pa ste
182a7(1): de tshun chad du rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par sbyong ngo // ye shes kyi yul la 'jug go// smon lam gyi
182a8(1): dkyil la khor du chung bar byed / byang chub sems dpa'i slong po rnam par dag brjes su rtogs par byung ngo // 'ding 'dzin thams cad
182b1(1): gi rjes su 'brang // byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang sems rgya chen pos rgyas pas 'gangs pa'o// byang chub sems
182b2(1): byang rgyab dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyis nga dang bsgyur ba dang / ning kyi rgya ba thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
182b3(1): da kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par mnor pa dang / dus thams cad du mngon par mtshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan dadang / chos kyi 'a'ar ba
182b4(1): ba'i chul thams cad dang / mang sde yang dag par brjod pa'i chos kyi sani gyi chub thams cad dang / chos snang ba chen pos spang bar bya ba'i chu'
182b5(1): sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad mang dag par bstan pa'i tshul yang rjes su
182b6(1): rgyags par byed de/ yang dag par 'dzin to yang dag par nad do// rigs kyi bu byang chub snyoms dpa'i rnam par thar ba ma zhes thub par dka' ba'i sna
182b7(1): bcan 'di yang bsal pa ri rab kyi rnab shin tu za ba snyed kyi pa la de'i yang pa rab tu cig tu 'jig can gyi khams rna ba'i rgya mtshan rnaMs bya ba bas pa rnye
182b8(1): bas rnam par brgyan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin bzang po las thobaste/ rigs kyi bu ra ltar kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar
183a1(1): be shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di la yongs su spyong spyod rnam par spyong spyod shin drang pyo dang drong / 
183a2(1): yang dag par 'phel bar byed byed do// shin tu rgyas par byed pas/ bskul ba bzang po la thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang ma braba'o// 
183a3(1): de srid kyi bar gyis kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ning brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
183a4(1): tu za ba snyed cig bsten bkur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'ang zong ste/ kho mo ni
183a5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon sum du mthong ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba'i legs
183a6(1): rngub par snying po can 'jigs par zang na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'ang bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang ba/ sangs
183a7(1): rgyas thams cad kyi gsung kyi rjes su 'azang bde bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug par dka' ba'i rab tu zhugs pa sems kyi skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings
183a8(1): rnams cad rgyas par gangs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa bzhin gzugs pa dang mamame pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa
183b1(1): dri ma med pa'i snang por gyur pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad nag tu mngon par bsgru byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin las tha mi dad pa'i bon byur ba dad
183b2(1): sbyong ba shes pa'i ma yon tan brjod par nu sa ra skan/ song rigs kyi dri'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga tA zhes bya ba na/ grong khyeras
183b3(1): skye'i gnas nas bya ba yod de/ de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpying dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
183b4(1): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la srab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan ten du bya ba dris shig de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i
183b5(1): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo brda na ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ 
183b6(1): sa'i lha mo brtan mo'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i gang ma ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / byang chub
183b7(1): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can de rjes su dran par bya ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pasdom pa de rab tu goms
183b8(1): par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul 'di rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par dpyad pa dang / 
184a1(1): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba de la rnam par blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i
184a2(1): ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes tha dad pa re la yid ches par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
184a3(1): bar thar pa'i ye shes shin tu spyad pa de rjes su rtogs par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'bab par bya ba byed cing
184a4(1): grong khyer ser skye'i gnas gang na ba der phyin te/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bya nas/ shar phyogs logs kyi grong khye gyi
184a5(1): sgo nas song ste/ nyi ma nub ras ring po ma lon pa zhig du grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus zhig na byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag mthun par len par
184a6(1): de mtshan mo'i lha mo dpying dang ldan pa mthong bar 'dod cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen yod na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mthong bar 'gyur bar nges pa'i blo gros dang ldan pa/ 
184a7(1): ye shes kyi mig kun du lta ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin gyi brlabs dang ldan pa/ phyogs thams thams cad du mngon par gzhol zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i
184a8(1): sems kyis mos pa dang / ye shes chen po'i snying por gyur pa'i 'du shes kyi sems ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i
184b1(1): ye shes kyi mig dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad du ye shes rgya mtsho 'byam byas pas rgyas 'gengs pa dang ldan pa'i gnas ting nge 'dzin gyi
184b2(1): mig gis phyogs thams cad du shes bya'i rgya mtsho la rnam par lta ba/ ye shes chen po'i mig thob par bya ba la du gzhol
184b3(1): zhing bsam pa rtse gcig tu bzhag nas 'dug 'dug pa dang / mtshan po'i lha mo dbying dang ldan pa de gro khyer chen po ser su
184b4(1): gnas kyi snang gi nam mkhri'i dbyings la nor bu rin pa che sna tshogs dpe' med pa'i khang po brtsegs pazhig na/ rin po che'i ser po
184b5(1): khri chen po smos zhim thams cad kyis pad+ma'i snying po can zhig la lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog du 'dug pa/ sa mang
184b6(1): ning 'jam la mthong zing du 'dugapa mig dkar nag 'bres pa/ gzugs bzang shin tu mdzes pa/ bldan sdug
184b7(1): pa lucan dang lnga ba lnga ba thams kyis klubs shing brgyan pa/ kha ga bskur po'i gas bgos pa/ tshangs pa'i brgya
185a1(1): ban zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis rgyan thogs pa lus la sgyu sar dang / gza' dang / skar zhen dang sar ma'i tshogs
185a2(1): thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa 'dug pa mthong ngo // des sems can gyi khams par dag par mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang
185a3(1): log par ldang ba nas sems can ji snyed cig yongs su bkrol ba de dag thams cad kyang de'i ba sru bsu chung bar mthong ngo // ji snyed cig mtho' ris kyi 'jig rten
185a4(1): du bkod pa dang ji snyed cig nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i
185a5(1): bsku'i su bsu chung par mthong ngo // lus mngon par bsgrubs pa dang gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kha dog mngon par bslab pa'i thabs sna tshog
185a6(1): kyis ji sdad cig yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba sa'i skabs chung bar mthong // nga ro mngon par bsnyungs pa dang / dbyangs kyi yanal
185a7(1): mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / skad kyi tshul sna tshogs yongs su sbyar ba ji snyed cig gis yongs su smin par bya ba de dag kyang de'i bsku'i sgo nas rjes su brjod
185b1(1): bzos so// dus mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi rjes su 'azang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sem
185b2(1): ngapa'i spyod pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / byang chub
185b3(1): sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i !rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su lta ba dang / 
185b4(1): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lnga pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu seng ge chen po'i rnam par
185b5(1): bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba ji snyed cig gis nges sems can yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang
185b6(1): de'i sku'i sku ba su chud par mthong ngo // de za bas sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho de dag mthong zhing mdzes nas dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing
185b7(1): nyams bde la mtsham 'di pang bde ba skyes nas mtshan mi'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i de la lus thams cad kyis pha ba nas phyag 'tshal te/ lang so
186a1(1): nas mtshan mo'i lha mo'i cing dang ldan pa la brgya stong du mar ga pas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mtshan mang
186a2(1): dpyid dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// lha mo bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
186a3(1): sems bskyed de de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bzhis gnyen gyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'byung bar mdzad
186a4(1): bas dge bo'i bshes gnyen gyi phyag tu bdag ning por b.lags na lha mo shul gang la brten na byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu'i sar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i
186a5(1): thams cad mkhyen pa'i shul bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas mchod dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di
186a6(1): skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyis non te// drug pa'i bshes gzhan gyi tshig bstan par 'dod pa rang ba
186a7(1): ba'i bzhes gzhan gyi gang mdag pa nan nang byed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod ni da ltar dge pa'i bshas gnyen gyi gangam dag la nan tan
186a8(1): du byed pas/ gangon mi za ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubatsun par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
186b1(1): ba sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i chos kyi sku thob pa ste/ bsam pa mi mnyam pa
186b2(1): dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems can rnam dang ldan pa'i/ mi dga' ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la snang rje'i sems
186b3(1): dang ldan no// dge ba'i sems kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o// sems mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par ldan pa'i
186b4(1): sems can rnams la mi gnyis pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams pa rnam par spyad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// 'amang bar
186b5(1): gyur pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// dma' bal mos pa rnams la yangs pal mos pa yongs su bskyes pa'i sems dang ldan
186b6(1): pa'o// dbang po zhum pa rnams la brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs rnam par sel ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o// 'khor ba po mngon par mos pa nas
186b7(1): rnams la 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las rnams par bzlog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// rlan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par mos pa'i
186b8(1): sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi las la dgod pa sems dang ldan pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ltar bu'i sems dang ldan lang la
187a1(1): bya bar ldan pa byung chu pa sems phyi rnam par thar ba sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel pa'i cho
187a2(1): kyi snang bas 'gro bas rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'ong dang yang ldan pa'i sems can gang ji snyed cig mun rag skrag tu gyur pa'i rnam pa mi ni nyal bar gyur/ 'byung ngo
187a3(1): tshogs ni rgyu bar gyur rkun tsham mang pos ni rgyas par gyur/ sems can mi srun pa'i chub can ni phyogs sur+g+haM bar gyur/ srin sdug po nag pos kun nus
187a4(1): khebs par gyur/ drang ba dang rdul gyi tshogs kyis kyis ni kun 'gribs par gyur/ rdzi char mi bzangs no rab tu btags par gyur/ zla sar gyi tshogs
187a5(1): ni mi snang bar gyur/ mig gis bya ba'i mthun med par gyur pa'i mun pa la/ sems can gang ji snyed cig rgya mtsho la skyong ngam/ thang la skyong ngam/ 
187a6(1): ril skyong ngam/ nags la skyong ngam/ yul gzhan na la skyong ngam/ grong gnan na skyong ngam/ phyogs gnanan skyong ngam/ phyogs mtshams gnan na skyong
187a7(1): ngam lam gnan na spyod kyong rung ste/ rgya mtsho la spyod stong pa las bru bru ba bar gyur pa 'am/ zang la spyod pa spyod pa la nas nges pa 'am/ rnyil stong
187a8(1): ba las gsangs chen por ltung bar gyur pa'am/ 'brog dgon pa la spyong skyong ba las khazas kyis 'phongs par gyur pa'om/ nags chal 'tha bis po
187b1(1): spa nga'i zang zing la thogs pa'am/ tshul ma yin pa'i nyam nyes shin tu gyur tam/ yul gzhan la skyong skyod pa las chom pos bcom pa'am/ grong gzhan na spyong
187b2(1): pa las mi srun pa'i tshul can gyis gces par gyur pa 'am/ phyogs gnan nas sbyong sbyong pa las 'brog rmongs pa'am/ phyogs mtshams gzhan ra spyod sbyong
187b3(1): ba las mgo rmongs pa'am/ lam gzhan spyong skyong ba las ni nor gyur kyang rung ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can de lta bu la ngag la thabs sna tshogs kyi sa
187b4(1): nas skyabasu gyur par byed pa ste/ 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po la spyong skyong ba rnams kyi rlung srin nag po gtor ba dang / rlung mi bzang ba'i kyil 'khor bzlam
187b5(1): pa dang / chu rnyog pa gdang ba dang / rlung mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzlog pa dang / rlabs kyi shugs chen po zhi bar bya ba dang / glong gi 'jigs pa las
187b6(1): thar bar bya ba dang phyogs bstan pa dang / chu'i lam legs par dmigs pa dang / 'gram bster ba dang rin po che'i gling du phyin par bya ba'i phyir lam yongasu
187b7(1): ston te/ yongs su bsdud pa'i gzugs dang / ded dpon gi gzugs dang / na'i rgyal po rdog ches kyi gzugs dang / glang po che'i rgyal po'i
188a1(1): gzugs dang nus pa kyi rdul po'i gzugs dang rnam byin gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / rnam kha' 'a
188a2(1): rgyal po'i gzugs dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang / rgya mtsho'i lha'i gzugs dang mnyam
188a3(1): ba'i mnyan pa'i lha'i gzugs kyis skyabs su gyur par byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams
188a4(1): cang las yongs su bzlog pa'i skye bos su gyur par shog cig ces yongs su bsngo'o// thang la spyong ba'i sems can mun pa chen po shin tu gnag pa'i
188a5(1): nam pas bzhi 'ong ma dang / tsher ma dang gsag ma dang gyo mos gang ba/ sbrul gdug pa badzum po shin tu mang ba zag thug dang mi bde ba'i lam
188a6(1): can rdul dang phyag dang shin tu 'jal brdzi char drag pos btags pa/ cha dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal yod pa/ sbrul dang gcan gzan gyis bag cha ba
188a7(1): yong ba mthong mi dang / chom po rgyu bar 'gyur ba zhig pa/ mgo 'khor bar gyur pa'i sems can rnam pa ni mo'i gzugs dang zla ba'i gzugs
188a8(1): dang skya rengs 'char ba'i gzugs dang / sar mnga' chen po'i gzugs dang / glog gi 'bring ba'i byung ba'i gzugs dang rin po che'i gzugs dang / 
188b1(1): gza'i 'khor gyi gzugs dang sgyu skar dang / sar pa'i tshogs kyi gnal med khang gi 'od kyi gzugs dang lha'i gzugs dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzug
188b2(1): kyis skyabs su gyur par byedaro// sems kyang dag pa'i rtsa ba 'dis nyon mongs pa'i mun po thams cad rnam par brtsal ba'i phyir sems can thams
188b3(1): cad kyi skyab su sho ga cig par bskyed do// ri'i gsung sa la spyod cing 'chi bas 'jig sdug 'byung ba dang / grags pa'i 'dod dbang por 'gyur ba dang
188b4(1): ldan pa dang / sna'i rgyal mtshan 'dod pa dang longs spyod chal po dang / 'dod pa'i zil gyis gnon pa dang po byang yongs su btsal ba la brtson pa dang /

188b8(1): mngon par bsgrubs pa dang cha ba dang thang ba'i gnan po mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / yang dag pa'i rim bstan pa dang / kal bang ka'i

189a3(1): rA bi rnam par bstsal ba dang / sa'i ba ni mnyam par mngon par bsgrubs pas skye ba su gyur par byed do// sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can
189a4(1): ril sbyong pa 'di dag yongs su bskya byas pa de bzhin du 'khor ba'i ri'i lam rgyud g.yongs la gnas shi na rga shi gdon gyis zin pa de dag gi skyabs su'ang

189a7(1): nAl jibs po 'di'i nang du phyin te/ sdug gi sgra thos pas skrag pa'i snying po can don ma grub pas sems 'khrug par gyur pa dang 'jigs pache ba dang / 
189a8(1): mi dga' ba sna tshogs kyis nyams mi bde ba nags chal sdug po nasa'i byung ba'i phyogs mi shes pa rna rnams la kho mo na bde bar 'gro ba'i lam yongs su
189b1(1): sngon ba byed de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can lta ba'i thabs po sna tshogs la gnas pa sreng pa'i dra bas 'khris pas gyurapa

189b5(1): ngan song thams cad kyis lam du zhugs pa rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su bkrol te/ shin tu phun sum tshogs pa bde ba thams cad

189b8(1): du bskyod par byed do/ sems kyang ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad phung po la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod de/ 
190a1(1): gnas med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod par bya bar shog cig par bskyed de//

190a3(1): gdon sna tshogs nyams su gnod pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyang / skye bar 'gyur ba'i sgo sna tshogs kyis skyo bar byas te/ chags

190a5(1): 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can skye mched drug gi grong la gnas pa rnams 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi skyod yul las gyen tu bskyod de/ thams
190a6(1): cang mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul la 'gong par shog cig par bskyed do// rigs kyi bu gang yang mtshan mo mun pa shAn tu gnag pa'i nang na shar phyogs
190a7(1): pa brtags pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams re rer phyogs srang byar gyur pa sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la mi mnam pa' gabang sur 'du shes bya dang sa

190b6(1): kun dga' yid du 'ong ba yongs su bston to// sdug pa dang bral rnying phrang par 'dod pa rnams 'ab ma dang / bu dang chung ma dang / tsha bo dang blon po dang / 
190b7(1): gnyen ga bshes dang ping du 'ong ba'i gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su ston te/ sems kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can mtshan mo mun pa garlag
190b8(1): gis chong pa/ mag ra ba rib kyis rnams phyogs ba srang ba/ la ma 'khor ba rnam la gzugs kyi rnams sna tshogs rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i
191a1(1): phyir snang ba bskyed de/ 'ong byas de bzhin du bdag gis yun ring po nas 'khor ba'i mun pa na gnas pa'i sems
191a2(1): can yang dag pa nyid kyi phyogs pa bslabs/ ma rig pa'i dmun par 'joms pa ye shes kyi mag mi shes pa'i la tog gis tshod pa/ 'du shes dang sem
191a3(1): dang lta bas phyi nang ci log tu gyur pa mi rtag par 'du shes shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba bde bar 'du shes bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa mi sdug pa

191a5(1): mched la gnas pa/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo 'khor ba mi dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi phyogs su zhugs pa srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa/

191a7(1): kyi sems dang ldan pa/ log par lnga pa can par mi shes pa mar mi shes pa dge sbyong dang bram zer mi shes pa dbang po mi shes pa/ skyes bu dam pa

191b2(1): gnod pa byed pa theg pa chen po la zhe srung ba/ byang chub kyi sems la mos par spong bar byed pa byang chub sems dpa' la mi smin par rjod pa

193a8(1): pa thams cad kyang 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rab tu phyin pa'i khamal bgang thams cad mnyan pa 'di las phyi'i mi sdig par byas la kun tu ba
193b1(1): po'i smon lamachen pos thams cad mkhyen pa 'di la dgong par bya'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad mdul gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i sa las

193b7(1): rje tshad med do// 'di las dus gsum rgyal ba 'jig rten 'byung // des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed/ nor bzangs brtan pas tshul 'di shes par

195a2(1): nga'i mdzad/ des ni rgyal ba rnams la chong byed de// 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yang yin// kho mo'i shesar rab rnam yangs shin tu bdag

195b1(1): de ltar khyod tshul 'di lta bus sems can gyi dor+ya bgyi ba lta sa gon du zhugs pa'i rnam par thar pang ni khyod kyis bAnas na ji srid cig lags pa nang za smras
195b2(1): bdeng mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas tshang dpon gyi bra nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i ring ba kyi rdul nan
195b3(1): zla bsnyed kyi bsngal pa'i pha rol cig tu bskal pa rab tu ni ba'i 'od ces bya ba sangs rgyas bya ba drug lnga brgya skyes pa 'byung sa/ de'i 'jig rten
