195b6(1): dbang bani pan brga bdun dang ldan par 'byung ste/ des so chen po dri yang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa'i mangs bzhugs par chos kyis rtsub ra
195b7(1): thus ras pang bar gnos par rgyam/ rgyal ba tshas rab tu sngags pa'i rgyum sa b+h+rUM tha thos na s+yA d+h+ya d+hA nA/ 
195b8(1): de dga' ba rtsa bam du b.ras nam gyi grang sa btsun ma'i 'khor gyi gnas su phyin pa nas rgya ba'i gnas pa ma
196a1(1): phyogs kyi nags cha' chen po ni pa'i dpal nas bya bar rin po rgya'i rgyal po rgyan po thams cad kyis 'ong dang ldan
196a2(1): pastun can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba'i byang chub kyi shing de chen po drung du de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrogs
196a3(1): pa'i rgyal po'i zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams rin can dpal
196a4(1): 'byung ba thams cad 'od chen po kha dog du ma can gyis rgyas shing gang bar bya'agyur to// rgyal po'i gnas pad+mo'i 'od ces bya ba de mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba zhin
196a5(1): rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug 'dug ste/ de'i rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba'i gan tu song nas rgyan bkrol ba'i sgras sa
196a6(1): par byas te 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar rgyal po'i btsun mo shes bgyis shig nags chal chen po ni ba'i dpal 'byung bar de bzhin gshegs pa
196a7(1): chos thams cad tu klog pa'i rgyal po bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so// de nas nges rgyal po'i btsun mo
196a8(1): de'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyang
196b1(1): pa dang / smon lam rgya cher bshad do// rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i btsun mo de'i yang nga bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te// bsam pa thag pas
196b2(1): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs ras des de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi
196b3(1): dge 'dun du bcas pa la mchod pa dang // rami 'gror cher byas so// rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo chos
196b4(1): kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba de bzhin nig yin pa tsam du sems na ni de ltar mi lnga ste/ kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi
196b5(1): blo gros zla ba zhes bya bar 'gyur to// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni mos pa'i sems bskyed de dang / de bzhi na gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i
196b6(1): rtsa ba nges bskal ba ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba steng tshun chad nam yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma skyes te/ sems n+dan dmyal bar ma yin
196b7(1): byol song gi skye gnasum yin no// yi dgasu mi yin no// nam yang rigs dma' bar mi skyes so// nam yang dbang po dang mi ldan par ma gyur to// 
196b8(1): nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur te de ltar kho mos rtag par lta ba'i nang du l+la'i bdag nyidi che ba 'di thob ste/ mi'i nang du mi'i bdag nying tho ba ste/ 
197a1(1): 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma bral lo// dus dran par yang ma
197a2(1): skyes so rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos sangs rgyas gcig nas cig tu dag pa'i rtsa ba skyed de// bskal pa ri rab kyi rnal sha ni blo ba snyid cig tu lam ba
197a3(1): no mnyam pa nas nye bar phyin kyang de tsam gyis kho mo'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su grub par ma gyur ni/ ri rab kyi rdul shin tu rba ba
197a4(1): snod kyi bskal pa bzang po 'di'i snga rol kyi ni bskal ba chen po stong phrag bcu'i rngog ma la pa babri// de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul
197a5(1): gyi dri ma med pa zhes bya bar bskal pa mya ngan med cing rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi ji
197a6(1): mA med nga'i dpal de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la rnam par dag par gyur ti ra yang sangs rgya su lnga brgya 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag
197a7(1): gis thog ma la de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa dang na bas ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ 
197a8(1): lha dang mi rnams kyi bston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab rgyal mtshan spyan yangs shing ni ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ 
197b1(1): da che kho mo pang tshang dpon snyan pa rnam par grag pa'i bum shA swar ba snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba gzugs mdzes shing bzang ba ldan sdug pa/ kha dog can
197b2(1): tu mdzes cing rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig du gyurad+ha/ mtshan ma'i snam d+hi ba'i shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'ang ces bya ba de yang smon lam gyi dbang gyis ga
197b3(1): nga'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs su mtshan mo'i lha mo mag rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ des kho mo mtshan
197b4(1): mo min la tsam nag nab malal bar gyur pa dang / khyim de yang yongs su dang / 'ang chen pos snang bar byas nas rang gzugs bstan nas sang
197b5(1): rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa brjod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thog mar mngon par sangs rgyas nas nag bdun n+da te snying po byang chub la bzhugs par
197b6(1): bstan to// de nas kho mo pha ma dang gnyen bshes gi tshogs chen po dang 'grogs te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od sngon du bdun
197b7(1): nas de bzhin gzugs pa de'i spyan sngar phyin no// de nas khams de bzhin gshegs pa del mchong ba rgya chen po chos te de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
197b8(1): mtshangam thag tu nga 'dzin 'am 'i 'dul na sangs rgyas mthong bar byang ba nas bya ba dang / 'ang 'dzin dus gsum gyi dbyings mams spang
198a1(1): dkyil 'khor nas zla ba'ang thob par gyur na// nga thob pas kyang kha mas brusal pa ri rab kyi rdub shinaH
198a2(1): bskyed de dag kyang rjes su dran par gyur te// kho mo'i byang chub kyi sems de yang mngon du gyur te// de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos stan
198a3(1): pa thos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ya dza
198a4(1): thob par gyur to// de thob pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi nang bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus kyis rgyas par 'gres te/ 'jig
198a5(1): rten gyi khams de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ning bdag nyid kyang de thams cad
198a6(1): nabs kyi drung na 'dug par shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kho mo'i mag lam du snang ste/ 
198a7(1): de dag gi sgra snang rnam pa tha dad pa'i rnga yang rab tu shes so// sems pa dang / khamasam pa dang dbang po dang / mos pa yang pang rab tu shes so// sngon
198a8(1): gyi mtha' dag pa'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi drung du yongs su sbyin par gyur pa'ang rab tu shes so// de dag la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur ba'i
198b1(1): lus kyang yongs su mun na// kho mo'i rnam par bar ba de yang sems kyi skad cig re re la rnam par 'phel te/ rnam par thar pa'i sems de'i 'og ma'i
198b2(1): sangs rgyas kyi nong 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i rdul sha ni tu ma snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi nang
198b3(1): 'dzag rten gyi khams stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snong lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
198b4(1): khams brgya phrag stong gi rdul shi ni tu zla ba steng lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so// de bzhin du sems kyi skad cig re re 'di srungs rgyas kyi nang 'jig rten
198b5(1): gyi khams brjod du mang po'i rdul shin tu phra ba snod kyi bar dag kyang lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so// sangs rgyas kyi nang de dag na de bzhin gzugs
198b6(1): pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig pham du snang ste/ bdag kyang de dag gi rnabs kyi drung na 'dug par shes so// sangs rgyas
198b7(1): bcom ldan 'das de dag kyis rgyas bstan pa de dag thams cad mar te/ 'dzin to// yongs su 'dzin to// nye bar 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa dadag
198b8(1): sngon gyi rgyal rgya 'tsho la 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ning yongs su dag pa de dag thams cad kyang rang gyi sangs rgyas kyi ning
199a1(1): yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrubs so// sems can ji snyed cig 'jig rteran gyi khams rgya 'tshong dag
199a2(1): che thams cad kyang kho mo'i mag lam du snang ste/ sems can de dag gi bsam pa dang / dbang po dang mos pa'i bye brag ji snyed pa re snyed kyi breg brag tu de dag
199a3(1): yongs su sman par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir lus byin gyis rlo ba ste/ de ltar kho mo'i rnam par thar pa'i nga ni sems kyi skad cig re re la'ang chos kyi dbyings
199a4(1): 'byams klas brgyas 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel lo// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad
199a5(1): kyis mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chu brla pa'i mtha' dang dbus med pa'i
199a6(1): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smor lam gyis byung ba chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul 'byam klas par 'dul ba la 'jug pa rang ba
199a7(1): sbyar ba byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa shes rdo rje'i dpal gyis rnam par rtse ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin
199a8(1): gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad yang dag par bzung ba la slor lam chen pos byung ba'o/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sems kyi
199b1(1): skad cig gcig gis yongs su dag par zla ba'i bsod nams kyi rgya mtsho chen po yongs su grub pa sems kyi sad cig re re la sems can gyi khams thams cad
199b2(1): khongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i ye shes la dbang sbyar ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa thams
199b3(1): cang rnam par sel ba'i ye shes kyi nyi ma'i mig dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la theg pa chen po chen po'i rnam pa dmigs par bya ba
199b4(1): mju' dang ldan pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi the tsom dang nem nur dang / yid gnyis kyi ra ba rib rnam par sel blo thos kyi zla ba dang ldar ba snang rgya
199b5(1): thams cad le mngon par chags pa la gyen tu bskyod pa'i snga dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rdul gyi tshas
199b6(1): rnam par 'jal pa yongs su su la dbang sbyar bri/ dus gsum gyi dbyings kyi zil 'khar ba mags dbyer mong par dag gi bskyed pags pa'am
199b7(1): ra tan brjod byu / sbyong bral la jug pa'am rnam par dzar pas rnam par rtsa ba yongs su bstan par rnas nan/ sa rigs kyi ba
199b8(1): ma san 'di kyi snang ba byang chu bo la khi mo blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed myong pa yang dang yang dang bsrub bskum pa
200a1(1): ba'i mtshan mo'i lA'i lha mo kun tu bzab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug gis nga'i
200a2(1): gan du song ba ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar rar tan du bya ba dris shig/ 
200a3(1): de nas mchong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la/ tshigs su bcad ba 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 
200a4(1): khyod sku shin tu rnam dag par mthong // mtshan kyis rnam brgyan ri bo ji bzhin du/ 'jig rten kun las mngon 'phags 'jig rten du/ phur sum
200a5(1): tshogs sku 'jam dpal bzhin du mdzes// khyod kyi chos sku shin tu rnam dag ste/ dus gsum kun du mnyam zhing rnam mi rtog/ der ni 'dzin
200a6(1): rten ma lus kun 'dus te// 'byung zhing rnam par 'jig kyang tshogs mi mnga'// lam rgyud 'byam klas thams cad kun tu yang / khyod kyi sku na
200a7(1): gzugs brjer rnam par phye/ sar can zla skar gyi skar tshogs bzhin du// sru rtsi kun la'ang khyod ni bdag gis mthong // khyod kyi thugs yangs
200a8(1): na tu rnam ngag ste/ phyogs rnams kun gyi rnam pa'i dbyings su rgyas thugs dar ni phyogs mi mchog kun kyang yongs su 'du// khyod
200b1(1): ye shes mi rtog dam pa mnga'// zhing gi rdul snyed rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin// khyod kyi spu rtsis kun nas mngon thob pa// rgya mang sna tshogs char pa
200b2(1): mngon 'ab bas shing // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhabs drung rgyas par 'gengs// 'gro ba kun steng lus rnams mtha' yas pa// khyed kyi spu rtse
200b3(1): kun nas mngon mngon cing // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rgyas par yongs bkang nas// sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can rnam pa spyod/ U rtse kun
200b4(1): la bsam yas nang gi rnams/ sna tshogs rgyan ldan rnam pa rnga dang mthong // lam rgyud sems can khyod kyis rnam sbyangs pa/ ji snyed de dag bsas
200b5(1): bzhin kun kyang 'byung // gang zhig khyod kyi mtshan thos dga' bar 'gyur// de dag thob bya legs tho ba legs par 'tsho// sems can gang gis khyod kyi
200b6(1): thob pa byang chub lam la mngon tu lhas par 'gyur// de ltar zos nas rab tu sems dga' la/ mthong tsam gyis nyon mongs ni mdzad pa/ 
200b7(1): bskal pa bsam yas ngan song gnas kyang rung // khyod kyi zhal lnga'i don du mos par byed// zhing rnams stong gi rdul snyeng lus byas te/ de snyed bskal
200b8(1): brgyad de khyod 'dra ba'i// su gcig rtsel yon tan legs brjod kyang // legs pa'i mthar phyin nam du'ang mi 'gyur ro// de nas tshang dpon gyi grwa
201a1(1): nor bzangs kyis mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa la tshigs pa la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon
201a2(1): par bstod nas mtshan mo'i ldum dbying ldan pa'i rkang pa gnyis pA spyi bos phrug 'tshal mtshan po'i lham dbring dang ldan pa la lan brgya stong du mar gams
201a3(1): phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang ldas te/ dge ba'i shes gnon la bsnyen bkur bya bas mngoms bzhin du mtshan mo lda dpyid dang ldan pa'i
201a4(1): drung nas song ngo // / 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che nas bya ba shan tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo'// bam po dgu bcu dgu ba'o// 
201a5(1): de nas tshang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mtshan mo'i lha mo dbring dang ldan pa thog ma byang chub tu nugus pa'i byang chub kyi sems
201a6(1): kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i khong du chud par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying po yang dag par 'byung ba la ni rjes su spyod/ byang chub
201a7(1): sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ni yongs su 'jug/ byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam ni yongs su sbyong // byang chub sems
201a8(1): dpa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor ni yongs su gnon// byang chub sems dpa'i spyong ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni rgya cher byed// byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung
201b1(1): brgya mtsha' ni rjes su 'brang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i snang ba chen po rgya mtsho la ni rnam par lnga/ 'gro ba thams cad la bskyab pa la gzhol ba'i byang
201b2(1): chub sems dpa'i snong rje chen po'i srin ni rgya cher byed// mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po bskyod pa dang / 
201b3(1): srin lam gyi dkyil 'khor ni ning thams cad du phyi ma'i mthar bAni gyis rlabs pas mngon par sta bas tsang / mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu za ba pa'i
201b4(1): dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od gang na ba der song ste// mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu za ba pa'i dpa' dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
201b5(1): mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu za ba pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mtshan mo'i lha mo kun
201b6(1): tu gzab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi mdun tu 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa
201b7(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyod pa dang / ji ltar
201b8(1): lngar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal to// smras po/ rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cag/ 
202a1(1): byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyad pa la/ 'byung ba dang yongs su grub pa jim pa legs so legs
202a2(1): so/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su grub pa yin te bcu gang zhe na/ 
202a3(1): 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon tu gyur par mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnam par dag pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mtshan
202a4(1): snam tshogs dang ldan pa/ rnam par lta ba'i mige rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog rgya mtsho mtha' dang byas med pa rnam par dmigs
202a5(1): par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho chang med bal chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshad kyis 'jug pa dang / 
202a6(1): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsku'i sgo nas 'od gzer rgya mtsho sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa/ sems can sna tshogs kyi don tu bkye ba la 'jug
202a7(1): pA dang ba sku'i bu ga re re nas 'od 'phro ba rarin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa rgya mtsho ston pa dang / sems kyi sad cig re ra la sangs rgyas
202a8(1): kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par bkang zhing sems can 'dul ba'i byin gyis rlabs la 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems
202b1(1): can thams cad kyi yan dbyangs kyi lag dang ldan pas dus gsum du byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ste bsgrogs pas mdo sde thams cad kyi srin gyi 'jug
202b2(1): sna 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho tha dwa dang bus med pa la 'jug pa dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul
202b3(1): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su snyan pas sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu pa 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
202b4(1): dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa la yongs su 'gru ba pa yin no// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan
202b5(1): bzhi pa'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mos ni de'i mthus dus gsum du gshegs pa'i thams cad kyang mthong ste
202b6(1): bzhin gzigs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la yang 'jug go// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang / ting nge 'dzin mtha' dang
202b7(1): dbus med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dang sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang / mtshan rgya mtsho la'ang 'jug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'tsha
202b8(1): po rab tu bskor ba rnam par tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go// de bzhini gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i chang sna tshogs dang dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa tha dad
203a1(1): nga bzhi rags pa de dag gi chos kyi dngas mdza' dang bus med pa'i su ba 'ang 'jug sa/ de bzhin
203a2(1): gshegs pa de dag la dngos por mngon par non pa yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ngu btsud pa la 'gegs pa'i phyir
203a3(1): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni bzhud pa med do// rang bzhin gyis byung ba med pas na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni byonab med do// 
203a4(1): mi skye ba chos nyid dang mnyam pa'i sumanga' ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni ma skyes pa'o// maM skye ba'i mtshan 'di dang ldan pa'i phyi bzhin
203a5(1): gshegs pa de dag ni ma 'gags pa'o// sgyu ma'i rnam pa lnga bur mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni bden par
203a6(1): yin pa'o/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du byung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs par dag ni rdzun pa ma yin pa'o// shrI 'phro dang skye ba las rnam par 'das
203a7(1): pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni 'pho ba med do// chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'jigs pa med pa'i chos nid yin pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
203a8(1): pa de dag ni 'jig pa med pa'o// ngag gi lam thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'i phyir de bzhin gzhags pa de dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid gci
203b1(1): pa chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi mthar thug pa'i phyir bzhin gshegs pa de dag mtshan nyid mi mnga' ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo ring
203b2(1): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khong du chud par byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par mthar pa/ bsam gsang na bzhi pa'i bde bas kun tu
203b3(1): rnam par gnon pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan dkyil 'khor snang bas shin tu rgya cher byed ngo // shin tu yangs par byed do// khong du chud par
203b4(1): byed do/ rtog par byed do// mnyam par byed do// mngon par bsgrub bo// bzhi snyoms par byed do// rab tu 'jug go/ rnam par 'phel bar byed
203b5(1): ngo nges par sems so// nye bar rtogs go dran par byed do// skyong yul du byed do// snang brtan par byed do/ spang bar byed do// rab tu brjod do// 
203b6(1): rnam par sbyong ngo ngo/ rnam par 'byed do// tshogs su byed do// yid ches par byed do// bong su rtogs pa thams cad rgyu med po'i snying rje chen po de la yang gnas te/ 
203b7(1): sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la yang dag par spyad par sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir bsam btan dang bo sor mo// yid kyi
203b8(1): las thams cad nye bar ni bar byed pa dang / yeshes kyi stobs dang mthus sems can thams cad yongs bsdu ba la dga' ba'i bde ba la sems
204a1(1): rta gcig tu za ba'i phyir bsam gang nag sa la stsam la// 'khor bar log par dgus pa ba
204a2(1): snyoms su dras te/ sems can thams cad kyi rang ban nges par rtogs par b+hu ba'i byung bsam gtan gsum khasam mo// sems can
204a3(1): thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal rab tu ni bar bya ba'i bsam gtan bde pa 'i sdom mo// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi dkyi
204a4(1): 'khor ni shin tu yangs par b+ha be dang / ting nge 'dzir rgya mtsho mngon thams cad mngon par bsgrubabapa mkhas par bya ba dang / byang chub sems
204a5(1): dpa'i rnam par thar ba rgya mtsha thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rtsa ba'i beshes thams cad mngon par nus par
204a6(1): b+ha ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i stong bas rnam par 'jug pa thams cad mngon par bstabs par bya ba'i phyir sa kun ras chos kyi dbyings pa
204a7(1): 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal yongs su stong ning / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan ni ba'i bde bras kun du rnam par gnon
204a8(1): pa'ong tsam mo// rigs kyi brang lder kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di sdom 'ang thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed nge 'di lngar num
204b1(1): ni bar gyur pa'i tshe gcig dga' ba la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed do// mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang yongs su
204b2(1): skyo ba'i 'du shes dang / bgegs su 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang 'chi ba'i 'du shes dang // srin mo'i 'du shes dang / mI rtag pa'i 'du shes dang
204b3(1): sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang // bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang rdza med pa'i 'du shes dang / gzhan la rag lus pa'i 'du shes dang / rga shi'i
204b4(1): 'du shes dang 'dod pa'i yul dang / longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pa'i 'du shes bskyed do// sems can de dag kyang sems la yongs su bsgom
204b5(1): bas 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med byas chos la mos pa'i dga' ba la 'jug cing khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ 
204b6(1): de dag dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshe'ang tshe sna dang mthun pa'i dad pa'i yongs su skyed de/ sna chen 'jigs pra mi snang ba'i sna thams cad kyang zhi bar byed do// 
204b7(1): mtshan mo zhi bar gyur pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo yang dag par stonato// sdang ba dang mthun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar ston to// khyim gyi sgo'ang
204b8(1): rnam par 'byed do// lam yang yongs su ston to// snang bas kyang mngon par 'byed do// mun pas chod pa rnam par sel te 'jigs pa yang med par byed do// 
205a1(1): rab tu byung ba la yang dag par bsngags par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi legs pa'ang brjod do// chos kyis
205a2(1): legs pa dang dge 'dun gyi legs pa dang // dge ba'i bkres gnyen gyi legs pa'ang brjod do// dge ba'i bzhes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba lang
205a3(1): sngags pa byed do// rigs kyi bu kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di la sdom zhing sems can rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyis zhen pa rnams kyi chos
205a4(1): me pa ni pa'i 'dod chags kyi yongs su rtogs pa rnams kyang med par byed do// tshu lam pa ni nga'i 'dod pas non pa rnams dang / log par yongs su
205a5(1): nog pa'i spyod yul can rnams kyi yongs su rtog pa de dag dang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang med par byed do// srog to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi
205a6(1): skye ba dang / sdig to'i yongs su rtog pa skyes par gyur pa rnams kyang meng par 'gyur ba'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub po// dge ba'i yongs su rtogs pa pha
205a7(1): rol tu dran pa deng ldan pa dang / stong pa dang ldan pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye nas su 'byung ba'i smon lam mngon par bsdub pa dang ldan pa dang
205a8(1): byams pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dang sems can rnams la snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gyed pa dang ldan pa dang / lha dang mi'i bde ba'i rnam par gyi sna tshogs yongs
205b1(1): bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su rtog pa bskyed dang / skyes nas kyang tshul sna tshogs kyi rkyer ny+dze bar sgrub par byed pa nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
205b2(1): dang ldan 'thun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar sgrubs par byed do// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam brtan bzhi pa'i bde bas
205b3(1): kun te rnam par gnod pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po bskyod pa dang / sngon lam gyis byung ba'i byang chub
205b4(1): sems dpa' rnam pa mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rab tu thob pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa de bzhin
205b5(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mthus sems kyi snang ba rab tu tho ba pa/ de bzhir gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan
205b6(1): pa gnas thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i sems dang ldan ring
205b7(1): mtsho thams cad du zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad mthong bar bya ba la zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dag banin gshegs
205b8(1): par dag thams cad kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par gzung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun po rnam par sel ba'i 'khor
206a1(1): / ba'i bde ba la dga' zhing sred pa zad cing mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
206a2(1): snang ba bskyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dag gis spyod pa shes pa'am yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu 'di nyidi nang dang yang rgyang mi ring
206a3(1): bste rnam por snang mdzad kyi snying po byang chub kyi g.yas rol cig na/ mtshan po'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba
206a4(1): 'dug gis de'i gan du song ba la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i lam pa brtson par bya ba dris shig/ de nas mtshan mo'i lha
206a5(1): mo kun tu dang po'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan gzhi pa'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon
206a6(1): ba 'di nyid rnam te bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// dus rnams kun tu 'byung ba'i bde gshegs
206a7(1): rnams mngon du bye bar mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa// de dag myig yangs rnam par dag par 'gyur// ngas ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong ba'ong / 
206a8(1): rgyab ba'i su gsal dri ma med la ltos/ mtshan gyis yongs su brgyan pas shin tu mdzes// rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul tshang dbyings rnams/ 
206b1(1): skad cig re res rgyas 'gengs de la'ang ltos byang chub shing drung sangs rgyas gdan ba la// bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad mngon sangs rgyas
206b2(1): chos dbyings pangs par rgyas par khyab mdzad cing / 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji bzhin 'khor lo bskor// rgyal bas chos nyid lus med rab ni pa
206b3(1): gnyis med rang bzhin med pa thugs chud nas// gzugs sku bzang mo mtshan gyis brgyan pas// 'gro ba ma lus bkang zhing ston pa mdzad// sangs
206b4(1): rgyas sku ni rgya che bsam mi khyab// chos kyi dbyings kun yongs su rgyas bkang zhing // de ni kun nas mnyam par snang ba ste// zhing rgyal ba thams cad
206b5(1): kun tu ston pa mdzad// zhing rnams kun gyi rdul rab phra ba snyed// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas sku// kha dog bzang po dang gzhan gzhan
206b6(1): sdang bas// chos kyi dbyings rgyas par skad cig re re sa 'gengs// rgyal bu'i ba spu'i sngon 'od gser sIn/ rgya che bsam yas myi zad mngon byung
206b7(1): be de dag 'gro ba ma lus 'gyengs byed cing // srog chags sems kyi nyon mongs bdud ba sel// sangs rgyas sprul pa rgya mtsho mi zad pa
206b8(1): rgyal ba'i sku'i 'khor nas yongs gtong cing // chos dbyings yangs brgyas par kun bkang ste// srog chags rnams kyi sdug bsngal ngan sangs la
207a1(1): rgya/ sangs rgyas gsung sman rab tu bsgrog mdzad pa// dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra 'od can// chos char
207a2(1): chen po rab tu 'ab bas mdzad pa/ srog chags byang chub sam pa yongs su bskyed// bskal pa rgya mtshor snang ba spyod pa'i tshe// 'di ni sngon
207a3(1): chad yongs yongasu gzung mdzad pa// de dag kun gyis rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad la// zhing rnams kun tu gzugs bsnan mtshan nyid mthong / 
207a4(1): de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten kun tu 'byung // sems can re re kun la'ang mngon par zhugs// mo sa pa'i tshul bzhin spyod yul gzhan rang gzhan/ 
207a5(1): de dag kho mos kun tu shes mi nus// rgyal sras dam pa thams cad ma lusra bar// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gcig rtse la so'i byung // rnam thar
207a6(1): de las gang rnams bsam yas pa// de dag thams cad kho mos shes mo nus// kho mo'i mang ba na gnas pa'i lha mo 'di/ 'jig rten mgon
207a7(1): pa mngon gyur rab tu dga'// mying du snang ba 'od 'phro mig ces bya// de la byang chub sbyong ba ji ltar dris// de nas tshong nga pon gyi bu nor bzangs
207a8(1): kyis mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu za ba pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la skye bos phyag 'tshal/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu za ba pa'i
207b1(1): dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od lalan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bsdus te/ mtshan mo'i lA mo kun tu za ba pa'i
207b2(1): dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i gos gnyer gyi gang ma ngag gi byin gyis rlabs dge pa'i
207b3(1): bshes gnyen gyi tshigs lanan tan du bya ba'i sems yang dag par skyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes kyi skur ba la nang pa'i 'du shes kyis yongs su sbyong
207b4(1): pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thowa~M mthong ba yidi la byed pa ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bcos
207b5(1): gnyen blta ba la skye bi nga'i ri thams cad rnam par gto ru ba'i glags rnyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa// dge pa'i bshes gnyen mdzang ba'
207b6(1): sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyeb pa'i snying rje chen po'i chu'i rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes
207b7(1): gar+b+hen mthong ba la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa de/ mtshan mo'i lha mor btu dga' ba'i
207b8(1): mig 'gro ba rnam par snang ba gang na ba der song ngo // de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mag 'gro bar rnam par snang bas tshong dpon gyi bu
208a1(1): nor bzangs de bas kyang dge ba'i bcas gzhan gyi drung d+ma gro ba dag pa'i rtsa ba'i tshogs las byung bas phongs
208a2(1): su smin par bya ba'i phyir dag pa'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po las byung bar byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen
208a3(1): gyo drung du 'gro ba rnam par gnon pa chen por byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba brtson 'grus kyi las 'jug par dka'
208a4(1): bar byin gyi brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang nga cing shin tu legs par byin gyis brlabs so// brlabs so// 
208a5(1): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba phyogs mtha' dngang bus med pa la 'jug par byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes kyi drung du phun ring
208a6(1): por gnas pas byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba don mdza' yas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam par dmigs pa
208a7(1): 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes pa sha brnyes b+h+rUM drung du 'gro ba lam gyi rgyun mdza' dang dbus med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su gan
208a8(1): par byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bsgo kun nas rnam par gnon pas 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i
208b1(1): nas gnan gyi drung du 'gro ba g.yo bayed par 'ong bas rnam par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas tshang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs thams cad mkhyen pa'i
208b2(1): tshogs kyi brtson 'grus pa rab tu brtson pas dge ba'i bgos gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / smon lam chen po rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrubs pa'i
208b3(1): rnam par gnon pasadage ba'i bkres gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang sems can gcig don du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskul ba'i mur thug par sdug bsngal
208b4(1): nyams su blang ba'i na non pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / rdul shini tu pra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams dusgra sgrog cing phyi na ring
208b5(1): bor gnas pa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus chen po'i 'gro bgos dag pa'i gshegs gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / phyogs rgya mtsho'i byam
208b6(1): klas pa thams cad du shugs kyis 'gro bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / ba sra'i sbu bas gcig tu phyi ma'i mtha' bskal bar byang
208b7(1): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pras dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la gnas pas kyang sems kyi
208b8(1): skad cig re ro la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bgengs pa'i gnas par bya bas dag pa'i bshos gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / dus gsum
209a1(1): gshegs pa'i rnam par gyu rtan dang / lam yongs su gtsun pas zla ba'i babras gnan b+hi
209a2(1): du 'gro ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i lam yongs su gnan pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / chos
209a3(1): sbyor byings kyi rgyal thams cad la dmigs pa las ma gosos par chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gyings pas dge ba'i bshes gnan gyi drung du 'gro bas/ mtshan
209a4(1): mo'i rtse mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba gangan bder phyin pa dang / de nas mchen po'i lha mo rab tu dga' bo'i mig 'gro bar rnam
209a5(1): bar snang ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na seng gA'i khrim tog srung po can la 'dug cing/ byang chub sems dpa' ding de 'a
209a6(1): kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba yengs pa'i dga' ba yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi 'angs pa/ sems can thams cad kyis bldan nam su dang / 
209a7(1): mtshan la mnyam par bzhug pa mdzad // de'i bcu'i bu ga thams cad nas sbyin pa la stsogs papa rab tu ni pa'i spong ba mngon pa sam
209a8(1): nimams can thams cing mngon par dga' ba/ sems can thams cad kyis med du dzas sems camathams cad kyis parda ram
209b1(1): sems can thams cad kyis dz+nyAn sdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'ang mthong ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad lab na 'dags shin
209b2(1): rtsong ba med par bya ba dang / dngos pa thams cad 'bangs pa med par rtse bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad sbyor ba mtshungs pas yongs su gtang ba
209b3(1): bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems su b+ha ba dang / sems can thams cad la brnyas pa med par yongs su gzung ba dang / 
209b4(1): nang dang phyi'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang dka' ba chen po yongs su gtong bar snyan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du sems can gyi
209b5(1): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs
209b6(1): pa dang 'thun pa'i sras sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa'i sprin dang / dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams gtong ba ranga' ba
209b7(1): yongs su gtong ba'i sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i srin 'dzin nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas par gtogs pa'i sems can gyis
209b8(1): rnam par dmigs par gyur pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba dang rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi
210a1(1): khyab badzes pas bcu'i brag thams cad nas sems thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs su smra
210a2(1): ba'i lus kyi sprin mngon par 'thong ste/ 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la rgyas par khyad par byas nas
210a3(1): mngon sum tu brtul zhugs thams cad kyi yi dam las mi g.yo bar yongs su ston pa dang sems can gyi khams dang mnyam pa'i dka' thub dang brdul zhugs kyi
210a4(1): dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rab tu ston pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du gnas pa med pa dang yul thams cad la ltos pa med pa dang / 'khor ba thams
210a5(1): cang du gnas pa las phra ri phrogs pa dang lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa rgung pa'i sgor gzhol ba yongs su ston pa dang / mi sdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu ston
210a6(1): pa dang 'jig rten gyi sdug pa'i 'du shes kyi phyin ci log rnam par zlog pa dang / mi rtag pa dang g.yo ba dang 'jigs pa dang 'gyur ba'i chos nyid yongs su ston
210a7(1): pa dang / 'du byed thams cad kyi chos nyid sdug bsngal zhing bdag nyid med pa yongs su ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gnas pa dang mi zal
210a8(1): bar mos par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims shin tu dag par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams le yang dag par bskul ba dang / 
210b1(1): sems can rnams cud kyis bstam ba nar ba bzhin gyi skyes tshul khams kyi srung ba sangs su mun pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mtsham
210b2(1): bar byung ba'i tshul khams kyi rmirnam pa yongs su ston pa zung cing / sems can yongs susun par byed pa mtha nga // bcu'i se thams cad nas sems
210b3(1): can thams cad dang mnam pa'i lus kha dog sna tshogs su sprul pa'i smani 'dzinaH/ yan lag dang 'ang lag rnams cad kyang rnams su bzod pa/ sems
210b4(1): can thams cad la yongs su ston pa sems can thams cad kyis lus la gnod par tho 'tshams kyang nyams su bzod par byed pa dang sems can thams cad kyis
210b5(1): tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i tshig gis spyod pa dang brgyad pa dang / spang ba dang / bsnang ba dang / brdeg pa dang / sdigs pa rnams su bzod par byed pa yongs su
210b6(1): ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis mi skul ba yongs su ston pa dang / rim gro bya ba dang rim gror ma byas pa thams cad kyis mtho ba dang dma' bar mi 'byung
210b7(1): ba yongs su ston pa dang sems can thams cad lang rgyas med pa yongs su ston pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la bzod pa mi zad pas be shes
210b8(1): zad pa ston pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir bzod pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang / 
211a1(1): sems can thams cad kyi lus dbyibs mi sdug cing kha dog mi mdzes pa'i gzugs rnam par zlog par byed pa dang / 
211a2(1): sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // 
211a3(1): bsku'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs kyi lus kha dog dang dbya bis dang chu zheng sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'dzin te sems
211a4(1): can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par khyab par byas nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs chen po la brtson 'grus kyis sngon du 'dor ba
211a5(1): yang dag par ston pa dang bdud kyi dkrug snga ma thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / byang chub tu brtsams pa mi 'khrugs mi'i rdzogs
211a6(1): ba'i brtson 'grus dang / mi shes pa'i ri rnam par gtogs pa'i brtson 'grus dang / dri bzhin gzugs pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur
211a7(1): bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can tha sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par blang ba dang / yongasu gzung ba'i
211a8(1): brtson 'grus dang / slob pa thams cad kyi ri rab tu gnom ning rnam par gdor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad 'angs skye sbyin

211b1(1): bar dru ba dang gadrug pas ma spro ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bangams dag par bya ba'i bcan 'grus dang / dang
211b2(1): gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa bla na mong pa yongs su ston cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // bsu sgo thams cad na
211b3(1): nas lus sna tshogs kha dog dang dbyibs rnam pa tha dad par sprul pa'i sprin 'dzin \u0f7f/ thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi dga' ba yongs
211b4(1): bskyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba rnams par bzlog pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnamya par spong ba dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i chos nyi 'jig
211b5(1): rten du sgrog pa dang dbang po bsdams pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa bla na med pa yang dag par bsngags par byed pa
211b6(1): dang 'dod pa'i 'jig rten bdud kyi yul 'jigs pa dang bcas par yongs su ston pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba rnams pa 'jig rten
211b7(1): gyi 'dod pa dang dga' ba'i yul thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / chos la mos shing dga' ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mthar gyis
211b8(1): bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams
212a1(1): ma myu byu pa gas sa rgyas yongs su snang ba nga / 
212a2(1): chub sems dpa'i 'angang 'dzin dang / mtsha'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam sa nang yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngore shes pa dang rnam
212a3(1): par 'phrul ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su ston pa byed cing sems can rnams kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / spro ba 'phel bar
212a4(1): bya ba dang rnams bde ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba brlob pa dang sems skyon mong po yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sems can srung bar bya
212a5(1): bsam pa rnam pAr skyong ba dang / dbang po gsal bar bye ba dang lus kyi bde ba yongs su bsgreng po dang / chos la dga' bo'i thugs
212a6(1): rnam par 'phral bar bya ba byed cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas skye ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus
212a7(1): kyi sbyin sna tshogs 'dzin te/ zhing thams cad kyang khong du chud po'i sems can thams cad kyang yid bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du
212a8(1): 'gro bas skyo ba med yongs su ston pa dang slob dpon dang / bla ma dang dag pa'i bags gzhan la rim zer bya ba dang bstan bkur bar bya ba yongs su ston pa
212b1(1): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba yang dag par blang zhing yongs su bzung bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus yongs su ston pa dang
212b2(1): sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud bar bya ba'i tshul yang dag par brjod pa dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang / chu
212b3(1): chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin dang / tshul mngon par brjod pa dang / chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi sngor yongs su stor ba dang / sem
212b4(1): can thams cad kyi dri ba dang the tsom rgya mtsho rnam par sel pas shes rab kyi yul yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lte ba'i ri shin
212b5(1): 'dzom pa'i shes rab rdo rje yongs su ston pa dang sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par

212b7(1): can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba sku'i sgo thams cad nas kha dog dang dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus mang po 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam
212b8(1): ba'i sgrub pa'i srin 'dzin to// bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la mngon du gnas shing sgra skad sna tshogs kyis yongs su
213a1(1): snang ba'i sman pas 'dzag rten gyi bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par ston pa dang /

213b3(1): rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba rgyun mi 'chang ba yongs

213b8(1): mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / ning thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang ston par byed cing /
